text: Kupwur mahk, page me ke raparapahki sohte dierek.
Menlau tehk URL ma spelling pwung oh capital pwung. Ma komw sohte kak diar page ehu nan LDS.org, song kohla nan LDS.org home page de daipiheng lepin lokaia me ke raparapahki pah.

chapters.name: Iralaud 1
summary: Nihpai tapiada ntingihedi poadoapoad en nah aramas akan—Lihai kilangada nan kaudiahl uhr en kisiniei ehu oh wadekasang nan pwuhk en kokohp ehu—E kepinga Koht, kohpada ketidohn Mesaiao, oh kohpada kamwomwalahn Serusalem—Mehn Suhs akan kailongkihla. Ele Sounpar 600 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Ngehi, Nihpai, ipwidisangehr nohno oh pahpa mwahu, I esehlahr mehkoaros me ahi papaho kaskuhlikinie; oh I kilangehr kahpwal tohto nan ahi mour, ahpw, I kenikenla douluhl rehn Kauno rahn koaros; iei, pwehki ahi wehwehkihla laud duwen sapwellimen Koht kalahngan oh me rir kan, kahrehda I wiahda poadoapoad en ahi wiewia kan nan ahi mwehi.
Iei, I wiahda ehu poadoapoad ni lokaia me ahi pahpa kin doadoahngki, me audaudki kaskuhl en mehn Suhs akan oh lokaiahn mehn Isip kan.
Oh I ese me poadoapoad me I ntingiada e mehlel; oh I pein wiahkihda pehi kat; oh I wiahda nin duwen ahi loalekeng.

Kedekedeo ni tepidahn keieun pahr en mwehi en Sedekaia, [me wia] nahnmwarki en Suda, (ahi pahpao, Lihai, kin koukousoan erein pahr tohto kei nan Serusalem); oh nan pahrohte soukohp tohto kohdo, kokohp ong aramas akan me irail anahne koluhla, pwe ma soh a kahnimw en Serusalem pahn kamwomwomwla.
Eri kedekedeo ahi pahpao, Lihai, ni eh patohla, e ahpw kapakap ong Kauno, mehlel, sang nan ah mohngiong unsek, pwehki nah aramas akan.

Kedekedeo ni eh kapakap ong Kauno, uhr en kisiniei ehu pwarada oh mih pohn paip ehu mwohwe; oh soahng tohto e kilangada oh rongada; oh pwehki soahng kan me e rongehr oh kilangehr kahrehda e mwekidida oh rerer kouwahlap.
Oh kedekedeo e pwurala ni imweo nan Serusalem; oh wendi pohn dowe pehto, pwehki eh inenen direkihla Ngehno oh soahng kan me e kilangadahr.

Oh pwehki [ah] direkihla Ngehno, e mihla nan kaudiahl ehu, ih eri kilangada nanleng eh ritpeseng, oh e medewe me e kilangada Koht ketiket pohn mwoaleo, oh tohnleng ngedehrie kapelpene oh wie kokoul oh kepikepinga arail Koht.
Kedekedeo e kilangada Emen eh ketiketdihdohsang nanleng, oh e kilangada me sapwellime maraino lingan sang marain en ketipin nisouwas.
Oh e pil kilangada meh ehk-riemen ar ideidawehn ih, oh marainparail lingan sang marain en usu kan nanleng.
Oh irail ketdihdo oh ketiketseli pohn sampah; oh me keieuo ketido oh uh mwohn ahi pahpao, oh ketikihong pwuhk ehu, oh mahsaniheng en wadek.
Kedekedeo nindoken eh wie wadwadek, e ahpw direkihla Ngehn en Kauno.

Oh e wadek, ketihtihki: Meid suwed, meid suwed, ong Serusalem, pwehki I kilangadahr ahmw suwed akan! Ei, oh soahng tohto me ahi pahpao wadekadahr me pid duwen Serusalem—me e pahn kamwomwomwla, iangahki towe kan me kin koukouson wasao; tohto me pahn kamakamkihla kedlahs, oh tohto me pahn sellahng Papilon.

Kedekedeo ni ansou me ahi pahpao wadekehr oh kilangehr soahng kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei tohto, e ahpw kepingahki Kauno soahng tohto; me duwehte; Sapwellimahr doadoahk kan me kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei mehlel, Maing Kaun Koht Wasa Lapalahpie! Mwoalemwi me ileile nanleng, oh sapwellimahr manaman, oh kupwur sapan, oh kupwur kalahngan kohieng aramas koaros pohn sampah; oh, pwehki sapwellimomwi kalahngan, Re sohte pahn ketin mweidohng irail akan me kohdo rehmwi irail en kamwomwomwla!

Oh ih mwomwen koasoai me ahi pahpao kepikepingahkihong Koht; pwehki palingenio uhdahn pereperen, oh ah mohngiong direkihla Ngehno, pwehki soahng kan me e kilangehr, iei, me Kauno ketin kasalehiong ih.

Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte ntingihdi soahng koaros me ahi pahpao ntingiedier, pwe e ntingiedier soahng tohto me e kilangada nan kaudiahl oh ouraman kan; oh e pil ntingiedi soahng tohto me e kohpadahr oh kaweidiki nah seri kan, ihme kahrehda I sohte pahn ntingiedi ni unsek.

Ahpw I pahn ntingiedi duwen ahi wiewia kan nan ahi mwehi. Kilahng, I pahn wiahda poadoapoad mwotomwot en ahi pahpao, pohn pileit kan me I pein wiahkihda pehi kat; eri, mwurin ei pahn wiahda poadoapoad mwotomwot en ahi pahpao I ahpw pahn uhd ntingiedi duwen pein ahi mour.

Eri, I men kumwail en ese, me mwurin Kauno eh ketin kasalehiongehr ahi pahpa, Lihai, soahng kopwuriamwei tohto, iei, duwen kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem, kilang e kohla rehn aramas akan, oh tepda kokohp oh kasalehiong irail duwen soahng kan me e kilangehr oh rongehr.

Kedekedeo mehn Suhs akan ahpw kepitki pwehki soahng kan me e kadehdehiongehr irail; pwe e kadehdehiong irail ni mehlel duwen arail wiewia suwed akan oh arail sapwung kan; oh e kadehdehki me soahng kan me e kilangehr oh rongehr, oh pil soahng kan me e wadekehr nan pwuhko kasaledahr ni sansal duwen ketidohn Mesaia men, oh pil poadoandoarlahn sampah.

Oh ansou me mehn Suhs akan rongehr mepwukat irail ahpw lingeringerda pah; ei, duwehte dahme wiawihongehr soukohp en mahs oko, me irail kausalahr, oh koastakaier, oh kemelahr; oh irail pil rapahki wiepen arail pahn kemehla ih. Ahpw kilang, ngehi, Nihpai, pahn kasalehiong kumwail me sapwellimen Kauno limpoak kalahngan kan miehr rehn koaros me E ketin piladahr, pwehki arail pwoson, pwe en kihong irail en kehlail pwe irail en kak komourla.

chapters.name: Iralaud 2
summary: Lihai wahla ah peneinei nan sapwtehno limwahn Sehd Weitahta—Irail kohkohlahsang arail dipwisou kan—Lihai wiahda meirong ong Kauno oh padahkihong nah pwutak kan ren kapwaiada kosonned akan—Leiman oh Lemuel kaulimki arail pahpao—Nihpai peik oh kapakap ni pwoson; Kauno mahsenieng ih, oh e pilipildahr en kaunda rie pwutak kan. Ele sounpar 600 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Pwe kilang, kedekedeo Kauno mahsenieng ahi pahpao nan ouraman ehu, oh mahsanih: Mehd pai kowe, Lihai, pwehki soahng kan me ke wiadahr; oh pwehki ahmw loaloapwoat oh ahmw kalohkiheng aramas akan soahng kan me I padahkihong uhk, kilang, irail songosong kemeiukala.
Kedekedeo Kauno mahsaniheng ahi pahpao, nan ouramano, me e uhdahn pahn wahda ah peneinei oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno.
Kedekedeo ohlo ahpw peikieng mahsen en Kauno, ih eri kapwaiada dahme Kauno mahsaniheng en wia.

Kedekedeo e ahpw mweselahngehr nan sapwtehno. Oh e kohkohlahsang imweo, oh sapwe sahpw me e sohsohki, oh nah kohl, oh nah silper, oh ah dipwisou kesempwal akan, oh e sohte wahda mehkot, ihte ah peneinei, oh kenerail mwenge, oh imwarail impwal akan, oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno.

Oh e kohdihla limwahn oaroahr en Sehd Weitahtao; oh e seiseiloak ni irepen saptehno limwahn Sehd Weitahtao; oh ah peneinei iang seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, ahi nohno, Saraia, oh riei pwutak laudko, Leimen, Lemuel, oh Sam.
Kedekedeo ni ansou me e seiloangkiher rahn siluh nan sapwtehno, e ahpw kauwada imwe impwalo nan wahu ehu ni keilen pillapo.
Kedekedeo e ahpw wiahda pehi sarawi ehu, oh wia meirong ehu ong Kauno, oh kaping kalahngan ong Kauno aht Koht.
Kedekedeo e ahpw kihengehr eden pillapo, Leimen, oh e kin pwilipwilla nan Sehd Weitahta; oh wahuo mihte limwahn irepen sahpwo karanihte ewen pillapo.

Oh ansou me ahi pahpao kilangada me pillapo pwilipwilla nan Sehd Weitahtao, e patohwanohng Leimen, ketihtihki: O [I men] ken kak duwehte pillap pwoatet, me kin pwilipwilwei ansou koaros nan utuhnpil en pwung koaros!
Oh e pil ndahieng Lemuel: O [I men] ken kak duwehte wahu wet, me tengetengedi oh kehlail, oh tengediong kolokol sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan!

E koasoia met pwehki Leimen oh Lemuel ara keptakai; pwe kilang soahng tohto me ira kaulimahki ara pahpao, pwehki e wia ohl en kaudiahl men, oh e kahluwairail sang nan Serusalem, sang nan sapwerail sahpw en sohso, oh neirail kohl, oh neirail silper, oh arail dipwisou kesempwal akan, pwe ren mehla nan sapwtehno. Oh ira koasoaia me e wia met pwehki madamadau likamw akan en ah mohngiongo.
Oh met Leimen oh Lemuel, me keieu laud, kaulima ara pahpao. Oh ira kaulima pwehki ira sohte ese duwen wiewia kan en Kohto me ketin kapikirahda.

Ira pil sohte kamehlele me Serusalem, kahnimw kehlailo, kak kamwomwomwla nin duwen mahsen en kokohp en soukohp oko. Oh ira duwehte mehn Suhs akan me mihmi Serusalem, me song kihsang mour en ahi pahpao.

Kedekedeo ahi pahpao ahpw panawihrahier nan wahu en Lemuel, sang ni manaman, pwehki eh direkihla Ngehno, lao paliwarara ko rerada mwowe. Oh ira pwuriamweikihla eh penouo, ihme kahrehda ira masak akipwungieng ih; kahrehda, ira wia dahme e ndahieng ira en wia.
Oh ahi pahpao kin kousoan nan impwal ieu.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ime pwulopwul mehlel, ahpw paliwereiet me lapala, oh pil inangih mehlel esehla duwen me rir en Koht akan, eri, ngehi peki rehn Kauno; oh kilang e ketin pwarohngie, oh ketikihdo popohl nan ahi mohngiong kahrehda I kamehlele koasoai koaros me ahi pahpao koasoaiahier; eri, I sohte kahngohdihong duwehte riei pwutak ko.
Oh I koasoaiong Sam, kehsehki soahng kan me Kauno ketin kasalehongie sang rehn sapwellime Ngehn Sarawio. Kedekedeo e ahpw kamehlelehla ahi koasoai kan.
Ahpw, kilang, Leimen oh Lemuel sohte men rong ahi koasoi kan; oh pwehki ei nsensuwedikihla uwen ara keptakai, I kapakapikin ira ong Kauno.
Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw mahsendohngie, mahsanih: Mehd pai kowe, Nihpai, pwehki ahmw pwoson, pwehki ahmw nannantihong rapahkinie, ni mohngiong karakarahk.

Oh sang ni ahmwail pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan, kumwail pahn pweida, oh [I] pahn kaluwaikumwailahng nan sahpw en inouo; iei, sahpw ehu me I kaunopadahng kumwail; iei, sahpw ehu me wia sahpw pilipil nan pwungen sahpw koaros.
Oh ma riomw kan pahn kahngohdihenguhk, irail pahn lekideklahsang mwohn sihlangin Kauno.
Oh sang ni omw pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan, ke pahn wiahla kaun oh sounpadahk ong riomw pwutak kan.
Pwe kilang, ni rahno me re pahn kahngohdihongie, I pahn keriahkinirailla keriah ehu me kamedek, oh irail sohte pahn ahniki manaman en kaunda kadaudokemw kan ihte ma irail pil pahn kahngohdiongie.
Oh ma irail kahngohdihongie, irail pahn kaloke kadaudokemw kan, pwe en kamwakid irail en tamanda koasoandi kan.

chapters.name: Iralaud 3
summary: Nein Lihai pwutak ko pwurala Serusalem pwe ren ale pirahs pileit ko—Leipen kahng kiheng irail pileit ko—Nihpai kangoange oh kakehlaka rie pwutak ko—Leipen pirapahsang arail dipwsou ko oh song en kemeirailla—Leimen oh Lemuel woakih Nihpai oh Sam oh tohnleng men lipwoare ira. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, pwurasang ahi koasokoasoi ong Kauno, pwuralahng ni imwen ahi pahpao impwalo.
Kedekedeo e koasoaiong ie, ndinda: Kilang I ouramankihda ouraman ehu, [nan ouramano] Kauno poahngokihong ie me kowe oh riomw pwutak kan anahne pwurala Serusalem.
Pwe kilang, Leipen kolokol poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan oh pil ntingdi en kadaudok en ahi pahpa kahlap ako, oh re ntingdi pohn pileit prahs ko.
Eri, Kauno pahngokihong ie me kowe oh riomw pwutak kan pahn kohla ni imwen Leipen, oh rapahki poadoapoad kan, oh wahdihdo wasaht nan sapwtehne.
Ahpw met, kilang riomw pwutak ko kaulimalahr oh ndinda me mehkot apwal ehu me I anahne sang ira; ahpw kilang kaidehn ngehi me anahne sang ira, ahpw iei kosonned en Kauno.
Eri kohla, samwa, oh ke ahpw pahn kenikenla mehlel rehn Kauno, pwehki ke sohte kin kaulim.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ndahieng ahi pahpao: I pahn kohla oh wia soahng kan me Kauno pahngokih, pwe I ese me Kauno sohte kin ketkihdo kosonned rehn aramas akan, ihte ma e pahn ketin kaunopada wiepen arail pahn kapwaiada dahme e pahngokihong irail.
Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me ahi pahpao rongada koasoi pwukat e udahn perenda mehlel, pwe e ese me Kauno kapaiedahr.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, oh riei pwutak wahda imwat impwal akan oh seiloakla nan sapwtehno, pwe sen kohdahla nan sahpw en Serusalem.
Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me se lelladahla nan sahpw en Serusalem, ngehi oh riei pwutak ko kapwungada nan pwungat.
Oh se ahpw usuhski—ihs nanpwungat me pahn kohla ni imwen Leipeno. Kedekedeo Leimen ahpw uhsada; oh Leimen kohlongala nan imwen Leipeno, oh mwohndi nan imwehu oh koasoaieng ih.
Oh e peki rehn Leipen poadoapoad akan me ntingdi pohn pirahs pileit kan, me audaukihda ntingdi en kadaudok en ahi pahpao.
Oh kilang, kedekedeo Leipen lingeringerda, oh kausasang ih nan imwehu; oh e sohte men mweidehng en ale poadoapoad ko. Eri, e ndahieng: Kilang kowe lipirap men, oh I pahn kemeiukala.
Ahpw Leimen tangasang reh, oh [kohdo] ndahieng kiht soahng kan me Leipen wiahieng. Oh se ahpw pahtoukihla mehlel, oh riei pwutak ko ahpw pahn pwuralahr rehn ahi pahpao nan sapwtehno.
Ahpw kilang I kahukihong irail me: Ni mehlel pwehki Kauno eh ieias, oh kitail momour, kitail sohte pahn kohdihla rehn atail pahpao nan sapwtehno lao kitail kapwaiada dahme Kauno pahngokihong kitail.

Eri, kitail loalloapwoationg kolokol kosonned akan en Kauno; eri kitail kohdihla nan sapwen atail pahpao sahpw en sohsou, pwe kilang e pwilikihdi kohl oh siliper, oh soahngen dipwsou en pai kei. Oh e wiahier soahng pwukat pwehki kosonned akan en Kauno.
Pwehki e ese me Serusalem pahn kamwomwomwla, pwehki suwed en aramas akan.

Pwe kilang, irail soikalahr mahsen en soukohp akan. Eri, ma ahi pahpao pahn mihmihte nan sahpwo mwurin eh pahngokehng en kohkohlahsang nan sahpwo, kilang, e pahn kamakamala. Eri, e konehng en tangasang nan sahpwo.
Oh kilang, iei Sapwellimen Koht eripit me kitail en alehdi poadoapoad kan, pwe kitail en kak kolokolehng neitail seri kan ehn atail pahpa kahlap oko arail lokaia;
Pwe kitail en pil kak peusehieng irail mahsen akan me miehier sang nan dawesen soukohp sarawi kan, me kohdohng irail sang Ngehno oh manaman en Koht, sangete ni tepdahn sampah, lelledohr ahnsou wet.
Kedekedeo I nantihong I en panawih ira ni soahngen wiepen koasoi pwukat, pwe ira en kak loalloapwoationg kolokol sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan.
Kedekedeo se kohdihla nan sapwat sahpwo, oh kiht eri kihpene nait kohl, nait silper, oh aht dipwsou kesempwal akan.
Oh mwurin aht kihpene soahng pwukat, se pwurehng pwuradahla ni imwen Leipeno.

Kedekedeo se aphw pidolongalahr rehn Leipen, oh peki reh ma e kak kiheng kiht poadoapoad kan me ntingdi pohn prahs pileit kan, a se pahn kawelialihkihong nait kohl, oh silper, oh aht dipwsou kesempwal akan.

Kedekedeo ni ahnsou me Leipen kilangada aht dipwsou kan, oh pwehki eh inenen tohto mehlel, e noahrokehda, kahrehda e kauskit, oh kadar nah ladu kan ren kemeikitala, pwe en kak kihsang aht dipwsou kan.
Kedekedeo se tangasangehr nein Leipen ladu ko, oh se pwilikihdi aht dipwsou ko pwehki sohte aht ansou mwahu en wahda, oh Leipen ahnekilahr.
Kedekedeo se ahpw tangalahr nan sapwtehno, oh nein Leipen ladu ko sohte kolkihtdi, oh se rukila nan pwoahr en paip ehu.

Kedekedeo Leimen lingeringerida pahi, oh pil pahn ahi pahpao; oh Lemuel pil iangala, pwehki e kin rongala ehn Leimen koasoi kan. Eri Leimen oh Lemuel wiahier koasoi sapwung tohto ong kiht riara pwutak tikitik kan, oh ira woktuhkehihkit.

Kedekedeo nindoken ara wokwoktuhkehihkit, kilang, tohnleng en Kauno men ahpw pwaredo oh kesihnenda mwora, oh patohwanong ira, ketihtihki: Dahme kumwa kemekemehki riomwa pwutak tikitik kan lepin tuhkehn? Kumwa sehse me Kauno pilada pwe en wiahla amwa kaun, oh met pwehki amwa wiewia suwed akan? Kilang kumwail pahn pwurehng pwuradahla Serusalem, oh Kauno ahpw pahn ketkiheng kumwail Leipen.
Oh mwurin tohnlengo e patohieng kiht, e ahpw patpatohla.

Oh mwurin tohnlengo eh patpatohla, Leimen oh Lemuel pwurehng tepda kaulim oh nda: Ia mwomwen Kauno e pahn kak kiheng kitail Leipen? Kilang, e wia ohl kehlail men, oh e kak ruwese meh limehk, mehlel, e kak kemehla meh limehk; a dahme kitail sohki?

chapters.name: Iralaud 4
summary: Kauno mahsanihong Nihpai en kemehla Leipen oh alehdi prahs pileit ko ni wiepen pilahn—Sohram pilada en patehng ahn Lihai peneineio nan sapwtehno. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo I ahpw ndahiong riei pwutak ko: Kitail pwuradahla Serusalem, oh kitail loaloapwoatieng kapwaiada Sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan; pwe kilang Kauno manaman sang sampah pwon, a dahme e sohte pahn manaman sang Leipen oh nah aramas limehko, ei, de pil nah aramas nen ko?

Eri kitail kohdahla; kitail alasang Moses me kehlail; pwe ni mehlel e lokaiahiengete pihl en Sehd Weitahtao eri sehdo ahpw pwalpeseng wiahda riau palimeing oh palimaun, oh atail pahpa kahlap oko kotehla ni arail keid pohn ngalangal, oh pitsang mour en kaludu, oh sapwellimen Parao sounpei ko eri pwakihirailla oh duhla nan Sehd Weitahtao.

Kilang met kumwa ese me e mehlel; oh kumwa ese me tohnleng men mahseniong kumwa; eri dahme kumwa peikasaliki? Kitail kohdahla; Kauno pahn ketin doareikitailla, duwehte atail pahpa kahlap ako, oh kemehla Leipen, duwehte mehn Isip ko.
Ni ansou me I koasoaia mepwukat, ira wie lingeringerte, oh pil doulahte kaukaulim; ahpw ira pil idawehniedahla lao se lel likin kelen Serusalem.
Oh e nihpwongdi ni aht lella mwo; ngehi eri ndahiong irail me re pahn rukila maslikin kehlo. Oh mwurin arail rukilahr, ngehi, Nihpai, wailong nan kahnihmwo oh kohla ni ihmwen Leipeno.
Oh Ngehno kahluwa ie, ni ahi sohte ese soahng koaros me I pahn anahne wia.
Ahpw I kohlahte, oh ni ei karenlahng ihmwen Leipeno I kilangada ohl emen, oh e pwupwidier nan pwehlo mwohi, pwehki e sakaukilahr wain.
Oh ni ansou me I lella reh I diarada me Leipen mwo.

Oh I kilangada nah kedilahso, ngehi eri usadahsang nan kidipeo; oh mangileo wiawihkihda kohl tohr, oh mwomwen wiawihdahn kedilahso uhdahn kaselel mehlel, oh I kilang me paliweren kedilahso wiawihkihda mete sdihl me keieu mwahu.
Kedekedeo Ngehno eri ketin idingohng ie I en kemehla Leipen; ahpw nan ahi mohngiong nda: Saik pak ehu I kemehla aramas emen. Oh I pweiek sang oh sohte men kemehla.

Oh Ngehno pwurehng mahsanihong ie: Kilang Kauno me ketikihenguhk ohl menet. Iei, oh I pil ese me e song en kihsang ahi mour; ei, oh e sohte men kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan; oh e pil kihsangehr aht dipwisou ko.
Kedekedeo Ngehno pwurehng mahsanihong ie: Kemehla, pwe Kauno me ketikihonguhk ohl menet;
Kilang Kauno kin ketin kemehla me suwed kan pwe sapwellime koasoandi pwung kan en kak pweida. Emen aramas en kamakamala mwahusang wehi ehu eh pwupwidi oh kamwomwomwla nan arail soupwoson.

Oh met, ansou me ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr mahsen pwukat, I tamanda mahsen en Kauno me e ketin mahsanihong ie nan sapwtehno, ketihtihki: Ma kodoudokemwail kan pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan, irail pahn pweida nan sahpw en inouo.
Mehlel, oh I pil medewehla me irail sohte pahn kak kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan nin duwen kosonned en Moses, ihte ma kosonnedo miehier rehrail.
Oh I pil ese me kosonned ko ntingdi pohn pileit pirahs ko.
Oh pil ehu, I ese me Kauno me ketikihong ie Leipen pwehki kahrepe wet—pwe I en kak alehdi poadoapoad kan nin duwen sapwellime kosonned akan.
Kahrehda I peikieng kepitien Ngehno, oh koledi pitenmoangen Leipeno, oh I ahpw lupungkihsang moangeo nah kedilahso.
Oh mwurin ei lupungkihsang moangeo nah kedilahso, I kihsang ahn Leipen likouo oh likawiada; iei, mehkoaros; oh ngehi likawiada ah tehtehn mahwino oh katengehdi ni lukopeie.

Oh mwurin ei wiahier met, I kohla wasahn nekid ahn Leipen dipwisou kesempwal akan. Oh ansou me I kohkohlahng wasahn nekid ahn Leipen dipwisou kesempwal ko, kilang, I kilangada nein Leipen soun papah me kin kol kih en wasahn nekineko. Oh ngehi eri ruwese ni ngilen Leipen, me en iangie kohla wasahn nekid dipwisou kesempwal oko.
Oh e wiahki me ngehi ah kauno, Leipen, pwe e kilang likou ko oh pil kedilahso me katengetendi ni lukopeie.
Oh e koaskoasoaiong ie me pid soumas en mehn Suhs akan, pwehki e ese me ah kauno, Leipen, kohla rehrail nisoutiko.
Oh I koasoaiong ih duwehte ngehi me Leipen.
Oh I pil ndahiong me I pahn wahla nting ko, me ntingdi pohn pileit prahs ko, rehn riei ohl laud kau, me mihmi likin kehlo.
Oh I pil ndahiong en idawehnie.
Oh e, medemedewe me I koasoakoasoaia ohl en nan mwomwohdiso, oh mehlel ngehi Leipen me I kemehlahro, eri e ahpw idawehnie.
Oh e koasoaiong ie pak tohto duwen soumas en mehn Suhs akan, ni ei kohkohlahng riei pwutak ko, me mihmi maslikin kehlo.

Kedekedeo ansou me Leimen kilangiehdao e inenen masepwehkada, oh pil Lemuel oh Sam. Oh irail tangasangie; pwe irail wiahki me ngehi Leipen, oh me e kemeiehlahr oh pil raparapahkinirail pwe en kemeirailla.
Kedekedeo I lukuwerirail, oh irail ahpw rongada ngileie; irail eri sohla tangasangie.
Kedekedeo ansou me nein Leipen laduo kilangada riei pwutak ko e ahpw masepwehkada, oh e kerenieng tangasangie oh pwurala nan kahnihmw en Serusalem.
Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, pwehki paliwareiet lapala, oh pil Kauno ketin kakehlailihie, ngehi eri parokedi nein Leipen laduo, oh koledi, pwe en dehr tang.
Kedekedeo I kawehwehiong, me ma e pahn rong ahi koasoai kan, nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias, oh ahi momour, iei ma e pahn rong ahi koasoai kan, se sohte pahn kemehla.
Oh I ndahieng, ni ei kahukihla, me e sohte anahne periki mehkot; me e uhdahn pahn wia aramas saledek men duwehte kiht ma e pahn iang kiht kohdihla nan sapwtehno.

Oh ngehi pil ndahieng: Mehlel Kauno me mahsanihong kiht sen wia met; oh kitail sou pahn loaloapwoat ong kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned kan? Eri, ma komw pahn iang kiht kohdihla nan sapwtehno rehn ahi pahpao e pahn mie dewemw reht.

Kedekedeo Sohram koapwoaroapwoarkihla koasoai kan me I koasoaia. Sohram iei eden laduo; oh e inoukihda me e pahn iang kohdihla nan sapwtehno rehn aht pahpao. Iei, oh e pil kahukihong kiht me e pahn mihmihla reht sang ansouwo kohkohla.
Met se inangih mehlel me en mihmihla reht pwehki kahrepe wet, me mehn Suhs akan en dehr ese duwen aht kohkohlahr nan sapwtehno, pwe irail dehr pwakih kiht oh kemeikitala.
Kedekedeo ansou me Sohram kahulahr ong kiht, se ahpw sohla pwunodiki ih.
Kedekedeo kiht eri wahda pileit prahs ko oh nein Leipen laduo, oh mweselahng nan sapwtehno, oh seiloaklahng ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.

chapters.name: Iralaud 5
summary: Seraia kaulimohng Lihai—Ira koaros perenkihda pwurodohn neira pwutak ko—Irail eri wia meirong—Pileit pirahs ko audaudkihda ahn Moses oh soukohp akan nting kan—Nan pileit ko kasalehda me Lihai wia kadaudoken Sosep—Lihai kohpada duwen kadaudoke kan oh nekineklahn pileit ko. Ele Sounpahr 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo mwurin aht pwuredihdo rehn aht pahpao nan sapwtehno, kilang, e direkihla peren, oh pil ahi nohno, Seraia, perenda mehlel, pwe e wie mwahmwahieikin kiht.

Pwe e lemehieng me se mehlahr nan sapwtehno; oh e pil kaulimkihong ahi pahpao, ndahiong me ih ohl en kaudiahl men; ndinda: Kilang ke kahreikitail sang nan sapwetail sahpwen sohso, oh solahr nei pwutak ko, oh kitail pahn mehla nan sapwtehne.
Oh iei koasoai wet me ahi nohno kaulimkihong ahi pahpao.

Kedekedeo ahi pahpao eri koasoaiahong, patohwan: I ese me ngehi emen ohl en kaudiahl; pwe ma I sohte kin kilang soahng kan me pid duwen Koht nan kaudiahl I sohte pahn ese kalahngan en Koht, ahpw I pahn mihmihte nan Serusalem, oh iang rieiko kamakamala.
Ahpw kilang, I aledier ehu sahpw en inou, me kapereniehda; ei, oh I ese me Kauno pahn ketin doarehla nei pwutak kan sang nan pehn Leipen, oh pwurehng kapwureiraildihdo rehta nan sapwtehne.

Oh ih mwomwen lokaia me ahi pahpa, Lihai, koaloalamwahuieki ahi nohno, Saraia, me pid duwen kiht, ni ansou me se seiseiloak kohdalahng nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwe sen alehdi poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan.
Oh ansou me se pwurodohr ni imwen ahi pahpao impwalo, kilang irail perenda mehlel, oh ahi nohno pil nsenamwahula.

Oh e koasoaia: Met I esehier ni mehlel me Kauno me ketin mahsaniheng ahi pwoudo en kohdo nan sapwtehn; ei, oh I pil esehier ni mehlel me Kauno me ketin sinsile nei pwutak kan, oh doareirailsang nan pehn Leipen, oh ketikiheng irail manaman en kak kapwaiada dahme Kauno ketin pahngokihong irail. Oh met iei duwen lokaia me e koasoaia.
Kedekedeo irail eri perenda mehlel, oh wia meirong oh meirong isihs ong Kauno; oh irail eri kapingkihong Koht en Israel.
Oh mwurin arail kaping kalahnganongehr Koht en Israel, ahi pahpao, Lihai, eri ale paodoapoad kan me ntingdier pohn pileit pirahs kan, oh wadeksang ni tapio.
Oh e kilangada me re audaudkihda pwuhk limau en Moses, me koasoaiahda duwen kepikipikdahn sampah, oh pil duwen Adam oh Ihp, me wia tepin atail pahpa oh nohno;
Oh pil poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan sangete ni tapio, lelledo ni tepdahn mwein Sedekaia, nahnmwarki en Suda;
Oh pil kokohp kan en soukohp sarawi kan, sangete ni tapio, leledo ni tepdahn mwein Sedekaia; oh pil kokohp tohto me Seremaia kohpadahr.

Kedekedeo ahi pahpao, Lihai, pil diarada nan pileit pirahs ko kadaudok en ah pahpa kahlap oko; ih eri esehda me e wia kisehn kodoudok en Sosep; iei, ih Sosep me wia nein Seikop pwutak, me netila pwe en wisiklahng Isip, oh me poadoandoarla ni limen Kauno, pwe en kak doarehla ah pahpao, Seikop, oh ah peneinei koaros pwe ren pitisang mehkihla lehk.
Oh irail pil pitsang selidi oh kohkohsang nan sapwen mehn Isip kan, ih Kohtohte me pil doareiraila.
Oh iei me ahi pahpao, Lihai, diaradahr nan ntingdi en kadaudok en ah pahpa kahlap ko. Oh Leipen pil iang wia kadaudok en Sosep, eri ih oh ah pahpa kahlap ko kolokol poadoapoad kan.
Oh met ansou me ahi pahpao kilangehr soahng pwukat, e direkihla Ngehno, oh tepda kohpada duwen kadaudoke kan—
Me pileit pirahs pwukat uhdahn pahn kowohng wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas akan me wia kadaudoke.
Eri, e koasoaia me pileit pirahs pwukat sohte pahn ohla; oh me re sohte pahn sohrala mwurin ansou. E pil kohpada soahng tohto me pid kadaudoke kan.
Kedekedeo ansouo ngehi oh ahi pahpao eri kapwaiadahr kosonned akan me Kauno pahngokihong kiht.

Oh se alehdier poadoapoad kan me Kauno ketin pahngokihong kiht, oh se rapahkier nan kosonned pwukat oh diarada me re kesempwal; mehlel, kesempwal ong kiht, ihme kahrehda se kak kadakadaurekihdo kosonned akan en Kauno ong nait seri kan.
Eri, e wia erepit en Kauno me se uhdahn pahn weuwa, ni aht pahn seiseiloak nan sapwtehno kohkolahng nan sahpw en inouo.

chapters.name: Iralaud 6
summary: Nihpai ntingihdi soahng kan me pid duwen Koht—Kahrepen ahn Nihpai nting iei pwe en sewese aramas akan en kohdo rehn Koht en Eipraam oh komourla. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte pahn ntingihdi irekidi en kodoudok en ahi pahpa kahlap ko nan ahi poadoapoad wet. Sang met kohla I pil sohte pahn ntingihdi pohn pileit me I wie ntingting powe; pwehki e ntingdier nan poadoapoad me ahi pahpao kin apwalih; eri, I sohte pahn ntingihdi nan poadoapoad wet.
Pwe ihte me I anahne nda me se wia kisehn kadaudok en Sosep.

Oh e sohte katapan ongie ma I oaritikih koasoaiepen soahng koaros me pid ahi pahpao, pwe re sohte pahn ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat, pwe I men en mie dewen soahng kan me I pahn ntingihdi me sang rehn Koht.
Pwe uhdahn kahrepen ahi wia met iei I en kak kamantiki aramas akan en kohdo rehn Koht en Eipraam, oh Koht en Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, oh komourla.
Eri, I sohte pahn ntingihdi soahng kan me kaperen ong sampah, ahpw I pahn ntingihdi soahng kan me kin kaperanda kupwur en Koht oh irail akan me sohte wia kisehn sampah.
Eri, I pahn kiheng kadaudokei kan kosonned, me irail sohte pahn audehki pileit pwukat soahng kan me sohte kesempwal ong aramas akan.

chapters.name: Iralaud 7
summary: Nein Lihai pwutak ko pwurala Serusalem oh luke Ismael oh ah peneinei en iangirailda nan arail seiloako—Leimen oh ekei irail uhongada—Nihpai kangoange rie ohl oko en pwoson Kauno—Irail saliekihdi sahl oh lemehda ren kemehla—E saledekla sang ni manaman en pwoson—Rie ko pekmahk—Lihai oh ienge ko wiahda meirong oh meirong isihs. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met I men kumwail en ese, me mwurin ahi pahpao, Lihai, eh kaimwsakalahr ah kokohp me pid duwen kadaudoke kan, kedekedeo Kauno ahpw pwurehng mahseniong, ketihtihki me e sohte konehng Lihai en kelehpw wahla ah peneinei nan sapwtehno; ahpw nah pwutak kan anahne wahda ekei serepein ren wia arail pwoud, pwe irail en kak apwaliada sapwellimen Kauno aramas nan sahpw en inouo.
Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsani me ngehi, Nihpai, oh riei pwutak ko, anahne pwurehng pwuradahla nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh wahdihdo Ismael oh ah peneinei nan sapwtehno.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, iangahki riei pwutak ko ahpw pwurehng kohla nan sapwtehno pwe sen pwuradahla Serusalem.
Kedekedeo se ahpw lelladahlahr ni imwen Ismaelo, oh se ahpw masamasala mwohn Ismael, kahrehda aht kak koasoaikiheng mahsen en Kauno.
Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw ketin kamalailaiedi mongiong en Ismael, oh pil tohn imweo, kahrehda arail iangkitada nan aht seiloak oh pwuredihla nan sapwtehno ong ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.

Kedekedeo ansou me se wie seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, kilang Leimen oh Lemuel, oh riemen nein Ismael serepein ko, oh riemen nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail peneinei ko, peliankitada; mehlel, uhwong ngehi, Nihpai, oh Sam, oh arail pahpao, Ismael, oh ah pwoud, oh nah serepein silimen teiko.
Kedekedeo irail peliankitada pwehki arail inangih pwurala nan sahpw en Serusalem.

Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, nsensuwedkihla pwehki keptakain arail mohngiong kan, ngehi eri koasoai ong irail, ei, mehlel ong Leimen oh Lemuel: Kilang kumwa riei pwutak laud, oh ia mwomwen mohngiongimwa kan eh nohn keptakai, oh amwa lamalam akan nohn masukun, me kahrehda kumwa anahnehki, riamwa pwutak me tikitik, en kaweid kumwa, mehlel, oh wia ehu mehn kahlamangi ong kumwa?
Ia mwomwen amwa sohte kak peikiong sapwellimen Kauno mahsen?
Ia duwen amwa kak manokehla me kumwa kilangehr emen tohnleng en Kauno?
Mehlel, oh ia duwen amwa kak monokehla soahng kopwuriamwei kan me Kauno ketin wiahiong kitailehr, ni eh ketin kapitkitail sang nan pehn Leipen, oh pil me kitail uhdahn anahne alehdi poadoapoado?
Mehlel, oh ia duwen amwa kak monokehla me Kauno kak ketin wia soahng koaros me e kupwurki, ong aramas akan, ma iei irail kin kasalehda arail pwoson Ih? Eri, kitail loaloapwoat ong Ih.

Oh ma kitail kin loaloapwoat ong Ih, kitail pahn alehdi sahpw en inouo; oh kumwa pahn ese me nan ansou me kohkohdo mahsen en Kauno pahn pweida me pid kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem; pwe mehkoaros me Kauno mahsaniher me pid kamwomwomwlahn Serusalem uhdahn pahn pweida.

Pwe kilang, Ngehn en Kauno kereniengehr sola ieiang irail; pwe kilang, irail soikalahr soukohp akan, oh irail kesehlongehr Seremaia nan imweteng. Oh irail song kemehla ahi pahpao, kahrehda arail koakoahk sang nan sahpwo.

Met kilang, I ndahiong kumwa me ma kumwa pahn pwurala Serusalem kumwa pahn iang irail mehla. Oh met, ma iei me kumwa pilada, kumwa kohla nan sahpwo, oh tamataman dahme I ndahiong kumwa, me ma kumwa pahn kohla kumwa pil pahn mehla; pwe ih met me Ngehn en Kauno ketin kangoangehkinie I en koasoaia.

Kedekedeo ni ansou me ngehi, Nihpai, koasoaiahier koasoai pwukat ong riei pwutak ko, ira lingeringerda pahi. Kedekedeo ira ahpw koliehdi, pwe kilang, ira inenen mwehl, oh ira salihkiniehdi sahl kei, pwe ira men kemeiehla, pwe ira pahn keseiehla nan sapwtehno pwe mahn lawalo kan en kangiehla.

Ahpw kedekedeo ngehi eri kapakap ong Kauno, patohwanohng: Maing Kaun, nin duwen ahi pwoson komwi, komw ketin doareiehsang nan pehn riei pwutak ko; ei, ketikihdo kehl pwe I en kak mweidpeseng sahl pwukat me salihiepenehr.
Kedekedeo ansou me I koasoaiahier koasoai pwukat, kilang, sahl oko sapwedekda oh kohsang ni pehi oh nehi kan, oh I ahpw kesihnenda mwohn riei pwutak ko, oh ngehi pwurehng koasoaieng ira.

Kedekedeo irail pwurehng lingeringerda pahi, oh song koliehdi; ahpw kilang, emen nein Ismael serepein kau, ei, oh pil ah nohno, oh emen nein Ismael pwutak ko, peki mahk rehn riei pwutak ko, lao irail kameleileidi ara mohngiong ko; oh ira eri sohla men kemeiehla.
Kedekedeo ira eri pahtoula, pwehki ara wiadahr mesuwed, lao ira poaridi mwohi, oh peki rehi I en mahkohng ira pwehki sapwung me ira wiahiengie.

Kedekedeo ngehi eri mahngkihengira soahng koaros me ira wiahier, oh ngehi eri kangoangehkinira en kapakap ong Kauno ara Koht pwe en ketin mahkohng ira. Kedekedeo ira eri wia. Oh mwurin ara kapakapohngehr Kauno se ahpw pwurehng douluhla nan aht seiloaklahng ni imwen aht pahpao impwalo.

Kedekedeo se ahpw leledihdo ni ihmwen aht pahpao impwalo. Oh mwurin ngehi oh riei pwutak ko oh tohn imwen Ismael koaros kohdihdohier ni imwen ahi pahpa impwalo, irail kapingkihong Kauno arail Koht; oh wiahda meirong oh meirong isihs ong Ih.

chapters.name: Iralaud 8
summary: Lihai kilangada ehu kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro—E tungoale wahn tuhkeo oh mwahuki ah peineinei en pil iang tungoale—E kilangada reil reirei pwoat, ahl ehu me inen oh tehtikitik, oh pwoaik rotorot me kipehdi aramas akan—Saraia, Nihpai, oh Sam tungoale wahn tuhkeo, ahpw Leimen oh Lemuel soikala. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo se ahpw kihpene soangoasoangen werentuhke koaros, soangen weren krein koaros, oh pil soangen weren wahn tuhke koaros.
Kedekedeo ni ansou me ahi pahpao mihmiher nan sapwtehno, e ndahieng kiht: Kilang, I ouramanda ouraman ehu; de, me wehwehki, I kilangada kaudiahl ehu.
Oh kilang, pwehki ei kilangehr soahng wet, mie kahrepen I en kapingahki Kauno pwehki Nihpai oh pil Sam; pwe mie kahrepen I en kamehlele me ira, oh pil tohto kadaudokera, pahn komourla.
Ahpw kilang, Leimen oh Lemuel, I pwunodada mehlel pwehki kumwa; pwe kilang, I leme me I kilangada nan ahi ouramano, ehu sapwtehn me rotorot oh kansensuwed.
Kedekedeo ngehi eri kilangada ohl emen, oh e likawih likou pwetepwet oh reirei ehu; oh e kohdo oh kesihnenda mwohi.
Kedekedeo ih eri koasoaidohng ie, oh peki rehi I en idawehn ih.
Kedekedeo ni ei wie ideidawehn ih I ahpw tehkada me I mihmi wasa kis me rotorot oh kansensuwed.
Oh mwurin ei seiseiloangki awa tohto nan rotoroto, I tepda kapakap ong Kauno pwe en ketin mahkohngie, nin duwen sapwellime kalahngan limpoak kan.
Kedekedeo mwurin ei kapakapohngehr Kauno I kilangada lapalahn mohs tehlap ehu.
Kedekedeo I ahpw kilangada tuhke pwoat, me wah ko mas iou oh kak kaperenda emen aramas.

Kedekedeo ngehi eri kohla oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo; oh I diarada me e inenen mem sang soahng koaros me I tungoaledahr. Mehlel, oh I kilang me wahn tuhkeo pwetepwet, oh pwetepwet sang douluhl soahng koaros me I kilangehr.
Oh ni ansou me I tungoale wahn tuhkeo palingeniet direkihla peren kouwahlap; eri, I ahpw mentehn ahi peneinei en pil iang tungoale; pwe I ese me e inenen iou sang wahn tuhke teikan koaros.
Oh ni ei kilengseli, ma I sou pahn kak pil kilangada ahi peneinei, I kilangada pillap pwoat; oh e pwilipwildo, oh e karanih tuhke me I wie tungtungoale waho.

Oh I kilengla pwe I en kilang wasa me e pwilipwildohsangieo; oh I kilangada me utuhnpilo ekis doh; oh I kilangada ahmw nohno Saraia, oh Sam, oh Nihpai ni utuhn pihlo; oh irail kesikesihnen likamwete re sehse wasa me re pahn kohlaie.
Kedekedeo I ahpw oaleirail; oh I pil lukwerihrail ni ngihl laud pwe irail en kak kohdo rehi, oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo, me inenen iou sang wahn tuhke koaros.
Kedekede oh irail ahpw kohdo rehi oh pil iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo.
Kedekede oh I ahpw mentehn Leimen oh Lemuel en pil kohdo oh iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo; eri, I kilengla wasa me pillapo pwilipwilsangieo, ma I pahn kak kilangirahda.
Kedekede oh I ahpw kilangirahda, ahpw ira sohte men kohdo rehi oh iang tungoale wahn tuhkeo.
Oh I kilangada reil reirei pwoat, oh e peiante keilen pillapo, oh uhdohng ni tuhke me I kesikesihnenieo.

Oh I pil kilangada ahl inen oh tehtik pwoat, me peiandohte reil reireio lel ni tuhke me I keskesihnenieo; oh e pil peiando pillapo oh lel ni tuhkeo, kohlahng nan mohs lapala oh tehlap ehu, me duwehte sampah ehu.
Oh I kilangada aramas ngedehrie, me tohto irail wie nannantihlahte mwowe, pwe irail en kak lella nan ahl me uhla ni tuhke me I wie kesikesihnenieo.
Kedekedeo irail eri kohdo, oh tepda keid nan ahl me uhla ni tuhkeo.
Kedekedeo pwoaik rotorot ehu ahpw kohda; iei, pwoaik rotorot ehu me inenen mosul mehlel, kahrehda irail akan me tepida keid nan ahlo ahpw salongala, irail keidila ekis wasa tohrohr oh salongala.

Kedekedeo ngehi eri pil kilangada ekei me nannantihla mwohrail, oh irail kohdo oh koledi imwin reil reireio; oh irail nantihla mwohrail nan pwoaik rotoroto, kolokol reil reireio, lao irail lelodo ni tuhkeo oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo.
Oh mwurin arail tungoalehier wahn tuhkeo irail kilengseli mwomwen me irail namenekda.
Oh I pil kilengseli, oh kilangada, me palio pillapo, mie ihmw kalaimwon oh lapala ehu; oh duwehte e mihmi nan wehwe, ilehdahsang pohn sampah.

Oh e diren aramas mihmi loale, me mah oh pwulopwul, ohl oh lih, oh mwomwen arail likou ko me inenen kaselel; oh irail kin wie kepikepitiki oh idihdihki sendinpehrail kan irail akan me kohdohr oh tungetungoale wahn tuhkeo.
Oh mwurin arail songehr wahn tuhkeo irail ahpw namenekda, pwehki irail akan me kepikepitkinirail; oh irail eri pwupwidilahng nan ahl keinepwi kan oh salongala.
Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte koasoaiahda mehkoaros me ahi pahpao ndahngie.

Ahpw, ni nting mwotomwot, kilang, e kilangada pokon en aramas ekei arail nannantihla mwohrail; oh irail kohdo oh koledi imwin reil reireio; oh irail eri nantihla mwowe, wie kolokol teng reil reireio, lao irail kohdo oh poaridi oh tungoale wahn tuhkeo.
Oh e pil kilangada ekei pokon en aramas me dedehmseli alarail kohkohlahng ni ihmw kalaimwun oh lapalao.
Kedekedeo tohto me duhla nan wasa loal en pihlo; oh tohto irail me solahr sansal mwohn meseo, sansalongseli nan ahl ehusoahng kei.
Oh lapalahn pokon me pidelong nan ihmw ehusoahngo. Oh mwurin arail pidelong nan ihmwo irail ahpw ididohng ie oh kepitkin ie oh irail akan me iang tungtungoale wahn tuhkeo; ahpw se sohte rong irail.
Mepwukat me ahi pahpao koasoaia: Pwe koaros me kin rong irail, kin pwupwudi.
Oh ahi pahpao koasoaia me Leimen oh Lemuel sohte tungoale wahn tuhkeo.

Kedekedeo mwurin ahi pahpao eh koasoaiadahr soahng koaros me pid ah ouramano de kaudiahlo, me uhdahn audapan, e ndahieng kiht, me e inenen salohki Leimen oh Lemuel pwehki soahng kan me e kilangada nan kaudiahlo; ei, e periki ira de lekideksang mwohn sihlangin Kauno.
Oh e ahpw kangoangehkin ira pepehm koaros en pahpa men me limpoak, me ira en rong ah kaweid kan, pwe Kauno en kak ketin mahkohng ira, oh sohte ketin lakidirahla; iei, ahi pahpao padahkohng ira.
Oh mwurin eh padahk ong ira, oh pil kohpada soahng tohto ong ira, e peki ira en kolokol kosonned akan en Kauno; oh e ahpw kairala ah koasoaieng ira.

chapters.name: Iralaud 9
summary: Nihpai wiahda kepen poadoapoad riau—Koaros ahdaniki pileit en Nihpai—Pileit me laud ko audaudki poadoapoad en sampah; me tikitik ko pid mehlel duwen soang kan me sarawi. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh soahng pwukat koaruhsie ahi pahpao kilangehr, oh rongehr, oh koasoaiahier, ansou me e kin mihmi nan impwalo, nan wahu en Lemuel, oh pil soahng tohto kei, me sohte kak ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat.

Oh met, nin duwen ei koasoaiahier me pid pileit pwukat, kilang kaidehn pileit pwukat me I pahn ntingihdi poadoapoad unsek en nei aramas akan; pwe pileit kan me I pahn ntingihdi unsek duwen nei aramas akan, I kiheng adarail Nihpai; eri, re adaniki pileit en Nihpai, sang ni pein edei; oh pileit pwukat pil pahn adaniki pileit en Nihpai.
Ahpw, I alehdier kosonned en Kauno me I uhdahn pahn wiahda pileit pwukat, ong kahrepe kesempwal me e uhdahn pahn mie ehu nting me pid duwen doadoahk sarawi ong nei aramas akan.

Pohn pileit teiko uhdahn pahn ntingidi duwen mwehin nanmwarkih kan, oh mahwin kan oh pingiping en nei aramas akan; eri pileit pwukat me ongete pali laud en doadoahk sarawi kan; oh pileit teikan ongete duwen pali laud en mwehin nanmwarki kan oh mahwin kan oh pingiping kan nanpwungen nei aramas akan.
Eri, Kauno ketin kehkehlingkihongie I en wiahda pileit pwukat ong kahrepe kesempwal ehu reh, me kahrepe I sohte wehwehki.

Ahpw Kauno ketin mwahngih soahng koaros sangete ni tepin kawa; eri, e ketin kaunopada wiepen kaunsakala sapwellime doadoahk koaros rehn aramas akan; pwe kilang, e sapwellimaniki manaman koaros en kapwaiala sapwellime mahsen koaruhsie. Oh iei met me mehlel. Ahmen.

chapters.name: Iralaud 10
summary: Lihai kohpada me mehn Suhs akan pahn sella rehn mehn Papilon kan—E koasoaiahda ketidohn Mesaia, Sounkomour, Soundor rehn mehn Suhs akan—Lihai pil koasoaiahda ketdohn emen me pahn pepdaisi Sihmpwul en Koht—Lihai koasoaiahda duwen pwoulahu oh iasadahn Mesaiao—E karasahieng kapwurpwurpenehn mehn Israel tuhkehn olihp—Nihpai koasoaia duwen Sapwellimen Koht, duwen kisakis en Ngehn Sarawi, oh anahnepen en mie pwung. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, pahn doula oh ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat ahi wiewia kan, oh ahi mwei en kaun oh doadoahk en kalohk; eri, pwe I en kak doula nan ahi nting, I anahne ntingihdi soahng kan me pid duwen ahi pahpao, oh pil riei ohl kan.
Pwe kilang, e wiawiher me mwurin ahi pahpao kanekelahr ah koasoaiahda audepen ah ouramano, oh pil [kanekelahr ah] kangoangehki irail en lalloapwoat, e patowan ong irail duwen mehn Suhs akan—

Me mwurin arail pahn kamwomwala, iei kahnimw lap en Serusalemo, oh tohto irail pahn sellahng nan Papilon, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno ansou, irail pahn pwurehng kopwuropwurodo, iei, irail pahn kopwurupwurdohsang wasa irail sella ie; oh mwurin arail pahn kopwurupwurdo sang arail selidi irail pahn pwurehng sapwanikihla sahpwerail sahpw en sohsohu.
Iei, sounpar wenepwiki mwurin ahi pahpao mweselsang Serusalem, Soukohp men me Kauno Koht pahn apwaliada rehn mehn Suhs akan—iei Mesaiao, de pil ehu ahd, Sounkomour en sampah.
Oh e pil koasoaia duwen soukohp akan, duwen tohtohn irail me kadehdehkier soahng pwukat, duwen Mesaiao, me e patohwanehr, de Soundor en sampah.
Eri, aramas koaros me mih nan mour wet salongalahr oh pwupwidier, oh ihte me irail pahn komourkihla ma irail idawehn Soundoro.
Oh e koasoaia duwen soukohp men me pahn kohdo mwohn Mesaiao, pwe en kaunopada mwohn Kauno—

Ei, e pahn kohwei oh kalohk ki nan sapwtehn: Kumwail kaunopada ahl en Kauno, oh kainenehla ahl akan wasa me e pahn keid ie; pwe mie ohl emen me pahn ketido mwuri, me lapalapasang ie mehlel; me pirapir en sapwellime suht I sohte warohng en sapwadada. Oh ahi pahpao koasoakoasoaia laud duwen met.
Oh ahi pahpao patohwan me e pahn pepdaisla nan Pedapara, palio Sordan; oh e pil patohwan me e pahn pepdaiski pihl; iei e pahn pepdaisihkihla Mesaiao pihl.
Oh mwurin eh pahn pepdaisihkihla Mesaiao pihl, e pahn kilangada oh kadehdeh me e pepdaisihla Sihmpwul en Koht, me pahn ketkihsang dihp en sampah.

Kedekedeo mwurin ahi pahpao eh patohwanehr koasoi pwukat e ahpw patohwanohng riei pwutak ko duwen rongamwahu me pahn kalohkehng rehn mehn Suhs akan, oh pil duwen mehn Suhs akan arail pahn pwupwikihdi arail soupwoson. Oh mwurin arail pahn kemehla Mesaiao, me pahn ketido, oh mwurin eh pahn ketin kamakamala e pahn iasadahsang mehla, oh ketin pwarehng Mehn Liki kan sang Ngehn Sarawi.
Iei, ahi pahpao pil koasoia duwen Mehn Liki kan, oh pil duwen peneinei en Israel, me irail pahn rasohng tuhkehn olihp pwoat, me rah kan pahn tipwasang oh pahn kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros ni sampah.
Eri, e mahsanih me e pahn konehng kitail en ehupene kohla nan sahpw en inouo, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno mahsen, me kitail pahn kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah.

Oh mwurin peneinei en Israel ar pahn kamweremwerpeseng irail pahn pwurehng kopwurupwurpene; de, ni oarelap, mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn alehdi rongamwahuo ni unsek, uhdaken rahn tuhkehn olihpo, de luhwen peneinei en Israel kan, pahn pwurehng poadehng tuhkehu, de wewehkihda udahn Masaiao, arail Kaun oh arail Soundor.

Oh ih mwomwen koasoai kan me ahi pahpao kohpada oh patohwanohng riei pwutak ko, oh pil soahng tohto me I sohte ntingihdi nan pwuhk wet; pwe I ntingihdi tohto irail me kesempwal ongie nan nei pwuhk teio.
Oh me pwukat koaros, me I koasoaiadahr, wiawiher ansou me ahi pahpao mihmi nan impwal, nan wahu en Lemuel.

Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr ahn ahi pahpao koasoai kan koaros, duwen dahme e kilangada nan kaudiahl, oh pil soahng kan me e pil koasoaia sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, manaman me e alehdi sang ni eh pwoson Sapwellimen Kohto—oh Sapwellimen Kohto iei Masaiao me pahn ketdo—Ngehi, Nihpai, inangih I en pil kak iang kilang, oh rong, oh ese soahng pwukat, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, me iei kisakis en Koht ong koaros me loalloapwoatehng rapahki ih, duwehte mahso pil duwehte ansou me e pahn kapwarahieng pein ih ong aramas akan.
Pwe e ketin duduwehte aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte; oh ahlo kaunopdahngehr aramas koaros sangete ni tepin sampah eh koasoansoandi, ma irail pahn koluhla oh kohdo reh.

Pwe mehmen me pahn loalloapwoatieng rapahki pahn diar; oh me rir kan en Koht pahn kasansalieng irail, sang ni manaman en Ngehn Sarawi, duwehte rahn pwukat e pahn pil duwehte mahso, oh duwehte mahso e pahn pil duwehte ansou kohkohdo kan; eri, sapwellimen Kauno koasondi de ahl kin duduhwehte kokohlahte.
Eri tamataman, maing ohl, pwe ahmw wiewia koaros pahn sansalada nan ansou en kopwungo.

Eri, ma kumwail kin wiewia suwed nan rahn en amwail kaunopadahu, kumwail pahn dierekda samin mwohn mwoalen-kopwung en Koht; oh sohte mehkot samin kak mihmi rehn Koht; eri, kumwail pahn lekidekla kohkohlahte.
Oh Ngehn Sarawi me ketkihongie mweimmwei en koasoaia mepwukat, oh sohte kahmahmki.

chapters.name: Iralaud 11
summary: Nihpai kilangada Ngehn en Kauno oh kasansalieng kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro—E kilangada inen Sapwellimen Kohto oh wehwehkihda duwen Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih—E kilangada pepdais, doadoahk en kalohk, oh kalohpwualahn Sihmpwul en Koht—E pil kilangada malipilip oh doadoahk en kalohk en sapwellimen Sihmpwulo Wahnparon Ehk-riemeno. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Pwe kedekedeo, mwurin ahi inangihada I en esehla dahme ahi pahpao kilangehr, oh pwehki ahi kamehlele me Kauno kak kasalehiengie, ansou me I wie mwomwohd medemedewe nan ahi mohngiong Ngehn en Kauno
Oh Ngehno mahsanihongie: Kilang, dahme ke inangih?
I ahpw nda: I inangih kilang soahng kan me ahi pahpao kilangehr.
Oh Ngehno mahsanihongie: Ke kamehlele me ahmw pahpao kilangada tuhke me e koasoaiadahro?
Oh I sapengki: Ei, komw mwahngih me I kamehlele ahn ahi pahpao koasoai koaros.

Oh mwurin ahi nda koasoai pwukat, Ngehno kapitie laudida, mahsanih: Ohsahna ong Kauno, Koht wasalapalahpie; pwe ih me iei Koht en sampah pwon, iei, me lapalapasang koaros. Oh meid pai kowe, Nihpai, pwehki ahmw kamehlele Sapwellimen Koht wasalapalahpie; eri, ke pahn kilang soahng kan me ke inangih kilang.

Oh kilang ape wet pahn kasansalehnguhk ni kilel ehu, me mwurin ahmw pahn kilang tuhke me ahm pahpao songehr wahu, ke pahn pil kilang emen ohl ketketdihdo sang nanleng, oh ke pahn kadehde ih; oh mwurin ahmw pahn kadehdehda ih ke pahn kin kadehdehki me ih iei Sapwellimen Kohto.

Kedekedeo, Ngehno ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilengla oh kilangada tuhkehieu; oh e duwehte tuhke me ahi pahpao kilangadahu; oh linganih udahn lingalingsang lingan koaros; oh pwetepwetih pwetepwetsang pwetepwet en sinoh.
Kedekedeo, mwurin ahi kilangehr tuhkehu, I ndahieng Ngehno: I ese me komw kasalehiongie tuhke me keieu kesempwalasang koaros.
Oh e kalelapak rehi: Dahme ke inangih?

Oh ngehi sapengki: I en esehla kawehwehpe—pwe I koasoaieng duwehte aramas ar kin koasoakoasoaipene; pwe I kilang me paliware duwehte aramas; ahpw, I ese me ih iei Ngehn en Kauno; oh e koasoaiong ie duwehte aramas ar kin koasoakoasoaipene.
Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilenglahng pwe I en kilang ih, oh I sohte kilangada; pwe e sohrasang ie.

Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada kahnimw lap en Serusalemo, oh pil ekei kahnihmw kan. Oh I kilangada kahnihmw en Nahsared; oh nan kahnihmw en Nahsared I kilangada lih meipwon men, oh e pwetepwet oh lingan kowahlap.
Kedekedeo I kilangada nanleng ritida; oh tohnleng men ketdihdo oh uh mwohi; oh mahsanihongie: Nihpai, dahme ke kilangadahro?
Oh ngehi sapengki: Meipwon men, me keieu masamwahu oh kaselel sang meipwon koaros.
Oh e mahsanihongie: Komw wehwehki Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih?
Oh ngehi sapengki: I ese me e ketin poakohng sapwellime seri kan; ahpw, I sohte ese wehwehn soang kan koaros.
Oh e mahsanihongie: Kilang, meipwon me ke kilangada iei inen Sapwellimen Kohto, ni paliwar en uduk.
Kedekedeo I kilangada me Ngehno wahsang; oh mwurinte ansou kis me Ngehno wahsang, tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang!
Oh I kilengla oh pwurehng kilangada meipwono, kolokol seri men nan pehko.
Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang Sihmpwul en Koht, ei, iei Sapwellimen Sahm Soutuk! Ke ese wehwehn tuhke me ahmw pahpao kilangadahu?
Oh I sapeng ih oh koasoaia: Ei, E wia limpoak en Koht, me e ketin kihong nan mohngiong en aramas akan; eri, ih me keieu anahnepe nan soang koaros.
Oh e mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ei, oh me keieu kaperen ong palingehn.

Oh mwurin e mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsenihongie: Kilang! Oh I kilengla, oh I kilangada Sapwellimen Kohto e ketketseli rehn aramas akan; oh I kilangada tohto me kin poaridiong ni alualuwe kan oh pwongih ih.

Kedekedeo I kilangada me reil reirieo, me ahi pahpao kilangadahu, iei mahsen en Koht, me kahluhwahla ni utun pihl en komouro, de tuhkehn komouro; pihl wet me wehwehki limpoak en Koht; oh I pil kilang me tuhkehn komouro wehwehki limpoak en Koht.
Oh tohnlengo pwurehng mahsanihongie: Kilengla oh kilang Koht e pein ketkihdi pein ih!

Oh I kilengla oh kilangada Soundor en sampah, me ahi pahpao koasoaiadahr; oh I pil kilangada soukohp me pahn kaunopada mwowe. Oh Sihmpwul en Koht ketla oh pepdaisla reh; oh mwurin eh pepdaisla, I kilangada nanleng ritida, oh Ngehn Sarawi ketdihdo sang nanleng oh ketket powe ni mwomw en mwuroi.
Oh I kilang me e ketketseli kalkalohkehng aramas akan, ni manaman oh lingan lapalahpie; oh pokon tohto kohpene pwe irail en rong ih; oh I kilang me irail kausasang ih nan pwungarail.
Oh I pil kilangada meh ehk-riemen ideidawehn ih. Kedekedeho Ngehno pil wairailsang mwohn meseie, oh I sohla kilang irailda.

Kedekedeo, tohnlengo pwureng mahsandohngie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla, oh kilangada nanleng pwurehng ritpeseng, oh I kilangada tohnleng kei ketketdihdo rehn aramas akan; oh irail kalohkehng irail.

Oh e pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla, oh I kilangada Sihmpwul en Koht ketketseli rehn aramas akan. Oh I kilangada lapalahn pokon en aramas me soumwahu, oh lokolongki soangoasoangen soumwahu, oh tepel kan oh ngehn saut akan; oh tohnlengo mahsanih oh kasalehongie soahng pwukat koaros. Oh irail kamwahula sang ni manaman en Sihmpwul en Kohto; oh tepel kan oh ngehn saut akan pekeusla.

Kedekedeo tohnlengo pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh I kilengla oh kilangada Sihmpwul en Koht, me aramasako wahsangehr; ei, sampah kadeikadahr Sapwellimen Koht Soutuk Ieroso; oh I kilang oh kadehdehki.
Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, kilang me e kalohpwuala pohn lohpwuo oh kamakamkihla dipen sampah.
Oh mwurin eh kamakamala I kilangada pokon kan en sampah, arail kohpene pwe irail en pelian wahnpoaron en Sihmpwulo; pwe tohnleng en Kauno kahdanikinirail meh ehk-riemeno.

Oh pokon en sampah kapokonpene; oh I kilangada me irail mih nan ihmw lapala oh tehlap ehu, duwehte ihmw me ahi pahpao kilangada. Oh tohnleng en Kauno pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang sampah oh eripitih; ei, kilang peneinei en Israel kan kapokonpenehr pwe irail en peiong wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.

Kedekedeo I kilangada oh kadehdehki, me ihmw kalaimwon oh tehlapo iei kahngohdi en sampah; oh e pwupwidi, oh eh pwupwidio udahn lepelepen pwupw. Oh tohnleng en Kauno pwurehng mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ih pahn mwomwen kamwomwalahn wehi kan, keinek kan, lokaia kan, oh aramas akan, me pahn peiong wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.

chapters.name: Iralaud 12
summary: Nihpai kilangada nan kaudiahl sahpw en inouo; wiewia mwahu, suwed, oh pwupwulahn towe kan; ketidohn Sihmpwul en Kohto rehrail; duwen Tohnpadahk Ehk-Riemeno oh Wahnpoaron Ehk-Riemeno arail pahn kadeikada Israel; oh duwen samin oh kanamenek en irail akan arail pwupwidieng nan sohpwoson. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo tohnlengo ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilengla, oh kilang kadaudokemw kan, oh pil kadaudoken riomw ohl akan. Ngehi eri kilengla oh kilangada sahpw en inouo; oh ngehi kilangada aramas ngederie, iei, me tohto rasehng pihk en nan sehd.
Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada pwihn kei me pokonpene pwe irail en mahwin, ehu pwihn pelian ehu; oh I kilangada mahwin kei, oh rohng en mahwin kei, oh me tohto nei aramas me kamakamkihla kedlahs.
Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada dih tohto mehla, pwehki mahwin oh pingiping en nan sahpwo; oh I kilangada kahnihmw tohto, iei, me I sohte kak wadekeda.

Kedekedeo ngehi kilangada rotorot mosul ehu pohn sahpw en inouo; oh I kilangada lioal kei, oh I rongada nansapwe ar posopos, oh rerrer en sahpw, oh soangsoangen ngihl katairong kei; oh I kilangada pwehl oh takai kan me pwalpeseng; oh I kilangada nahna kan ar rengkidi; oh I kilangada wasa patapat akan en sampah ar ohla; oh I kilangada kahnihmw tohto ar kihrla; oh I kilangada me tohto ar mwasingkihla kisiniei; oh I kilangada kidalap ar pwupwidieng pohn pwehl, pwehki rerrer en sahpwo.

Kedekedeo mwurin ei kilangehr soahng pwukat, I kilangada edied en rotorot, me kohsang pohn sampah; oh kilang, I kilangada aramas ngeder ar sohte iang pwupwikihdi sapwellimen Kauno kalokolok laud oh kamasepwehk en Kauno.
Oh I kilangada nanleng eh ritpeseng, oh Sihmpwul en Koht ketiketkohdi sang nanleng; oh e ketdihdo oh kasalehiong irail pein ih.
Oh I pil kilangada oh kadehdehki me Ngehn Sarawio ketin tiada pohn aramas ehk riemen; oh irail pilipilda oh kasarawihla rehn Koht.
Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang irail tohnpadahk ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, me pilipilda pwe irail en sewese kadaudokemw kan.

Oh e mahsanihongie: Ke tamataman wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo? Kilang iei irail me pahn kadeik keinek eisek-riaun en Israel ko; eri, tohnpadahk ehk-riemen en kadaudokemw kan pahn kadeik rehrail; pwe kumwail iei mehn en Israel.

Oh irail sounsawas ehk-riemen me ke kilangehro pahn kadeik kadaudokemw kan. Oh, kilang, re pahn mour pwung kohkohlahte; pwehki arail pwoson Sihmpwul en Koht arail likou kan pahn pwetepwetkihla sapwellime ntao.

Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang! Oh ngei eri kilengla, oh kilangada dihen aramas siluh me mehla ni ar mour pwung; oh arail likou kan pwetepwetala duwehte Sihmpwul en Kohto me pwetepwet. Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Mepwukat pwetepwetkihla ntahn Sihmpwulo, pwehki arail pwoson ih.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, pil kilangada kidelepen aramas en dih kapahieu me melahr ni mour pwung.
Kedekedeo I kilangada kidelepen aramas en sampah ar pokonpene.
Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang kadaudokemw kan, oh pil kadaudoken riomw pwutak ko.
Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada kisehn kadaudokei kan ar pokonpene pwe ren uhwong kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh irail pokonpene pwe ren mahwin.
Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang utuhn pihl samin me ahmw pahpao kilangadahro; iei, pihl me e koasoaiahiero; oh uwen loalih iei uwen loal en nan ehl.

Oh pwoaik kan en rotoroto iei kasongosong kan en tepelo, me kin karotongala mahs akan, oh kakeluwakiala mohngiong en aramas akan, oh kahluweirailahng nan ahl tehlap akan, pwe irail en mehla oh salongala.

Oh ihmw kalaimwun oh tehlap, me ahmw pahpao kilangadao, iei lamalam mwahl akan oh pohnmwahso en aramas akan. Oh wahu kalaimwun oh keper ieu ireirailpeseng; iei, duwehte mahsen en pwuhng en Koht Soutuko, oh Mesaiao me iei Sihmpwul en Koht, me Ngehn Sarawi kadehdehkiher, sangete ni tepin sampah oh lelodo ansouet, oh sang met kohla oh kohkohlahte.

Oh ni ansou me tohnlengo mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, I kilengla oh kilangada me kadaudoken riei pwutak ko pil uhwong kadaudokei ko, nin duwehn dahme tohnlengo mahsaniher; oh pwehki pohnmwahso en kadaudokei ko, oh kasongosong kan en tepelo, I kilangada me kadaudoken riei pwutak ko kalewehdier kadaudokei ko.
Kedekedeo I kilengla, oh kilangada kisehn kadaudoken riei pwutak ko arail kalowedier kadaudokei ko; oh tohto irail audehlahr pohn sahpwo.
Oh I kilangada arail kin pokonpene; oh I kilangada mahwin kei oh rohng en mahwin kei nanpwungarail; oh nan mahwin kan oh rohng en mahwin kan I kilangada dihen aramas tohto mehla.
Oh tohnglengo mahsanihongie: Kilang irail pwukat pahn pwupwidi nan arail sohpwoson.
Kedekedeo I kilangada, mwurin arail pwupwidier nan arail sohpwoson irail ahpw wiahla aramas rotorot, oh kanamanek, oh samin, direkihla pohnkahke oh soangsoangen wiewia suwed kan.

chapters.name: Iralaud 13
summary: Nihpai kilangada nan kaudiahl mwomwohdiso en tepelo eh kokouda rehn mehn liki kan, tepin Amerikca eh dierekda oh aramas tepda kousoanlaie, salonglahn kedelepen ire mengei oh kesempwal akan nan Pwuhk Sarawi, imwilahn ahn mehn liki kan pwupwulao, kopwurupwurodohn rongamwahuo, pwaradahn pwuhk sarawi en imwin-rahn akan, oh kokoudahn Saion. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo, tohnlengo mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Kilang! Oh ngehi kilengla oh kilangada wehi oh sahpw tohto.
Oh tohnglengo mahsanihong ie: Dahme ke kilangada? Oh I sapengki: I kilangada wehi oh sahpw tohto.
Oh e mahsanihongie: Wehi oh sahpw pwukat iei wehin mehn Liki kan.
Kedekedeo I kilangada wiawidahn mwomwohdiso kehlail ehu rehn mehn liki kan.

Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang wiawihdahn mwomwohdiso me keieu suwed sang mwomwohdiso koaros, me kemehla souleng kan en Koht, iei, oh kaloke irail oh salihraildi, oh katoutouwiekinirail mehn wesik mete, oh kaluduwihrailla.
Kedekedeo I kilangada mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwed wet; oh I kilangada tepel me tepin wiahdao.
Oh I pil kilangada kohl, oh silper, oh silik kan, oh likou weitahta kan, oh likou linen kaselel kan, oh soangoasoangen likou kesempwal koaros; oh I kilangada kidelepen lih en nenek.

Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang kohl, oh silper, oh silik kan, oh likou weitahta kan, oh likou kaselel, oh likou kesempwal, oh lih en nenek kan, iei me mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwed wet kin mwahuki.
Oh pil pwehki sampah eh kin kepinga irail iei me irail kemehkihla souleng kan en Koht, oh kaluduwihrailla.
Kedekedeo, I kilengla oh kilangada sehd tohto; oh re irepeseng mehn liki kan oh kadaudoken riei pwutak ko.
Kedekedeo tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Kilang engieng en Koht kipedier kadaudoken riemw pwutak ko.

Oh I kilengla oh kilangada ohl emen nan pwungen Mehn Liki kan, me sehdo irepeseng ih oh kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh I kilangada Ngehn en Koht, me ketidihdo oh tiada pohn ohlo; oh e kotehla sehdo, kolahng rehn kadaudoken riei ko, me kin koukousoan nan sahpw en inouo.
Kedekedeo I kilangada Ngehn en Koht, me tiadahr pohn ekei Mehn Liki kan; oh irail eri saledeklahr oh seiloakla pohn sehd akan.
Kedekedeo I kilangada kidelepen Mehn Liki nan sahpw en inouo; oh I kilangada Koht eh ketin engiengda pahn kadaudoken riei pwutak ko; oh re kamweremwerpeseng rehn Mehn Liki kan oh kalokolok.

Oh I kilangada Ngehn en Kauno, me ieiang Mehn Liki kan, oh irail pweida oh alehdi sahpwo pwe en wia arail sohso; oh I kilangada me irail pwetepwet, oh inenen kaselel oh masamwahu, duwehte nei aramas oko mwohn arail kamakamala.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me Mehn Liki ko me saledek sang arail selidi karakarahkala mwohn Kauno; oh manaman en Kauno ieiangirail.
Oh I kilangada inoandehn wehi laud en Mehn Liki ko arail pokonpene pohn sehdo, oh pil pohn sahpwo, pwe ren mahwiniong irail.
Oh I kilangada me manaman en Koht ieiang irail, oh pil Koht ketin engiengda pahn irail koaros me kohpene pwe ren mahweniong irail.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me Mehn Liki kan me saledeksangehr arail sensel, irail kasaledekla sang nan pehn wehi teikan sang ni manaman en Koht.
Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada me irail pweida nan sahpwo; oh I kilangada pwuhk ehu, oh irail kin weuwa pwuhko.
Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie: Ke ese ia wehwehn pwuhko?
Oh I sapengki: I sehse.

Oh e mahsanih: Kilang e kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs. Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kilanganda; oh e mahsanihongie: Pwuhk me ke kilangadahro iei pwuhk en mehn Suhs akan, me audaudkihda sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, me E ketin wiahiongehr peneinei en Israel; oh e pil audaudkihda kokohp tohto en soukohp sarawi ko; oh audepe kan me duwehte nting kan me ntingdi pohn pileit me pirahs ko, ihte me malaulau; ahpw, e audaudkihda sapwelllimen Kauno inou kan, me E ketin wiadahr ong peneinei en Israel kan; eri, re kesempwalohng Mehn Liki kan.

Oh tohnleng en Kauno ahpw mahsanihongie: Ke kilangehr pwuhk me kohsang rehn mehn Suhso; oh ni ansou me e kohsang rehn mehn Suhso e audaudkihda rongamwahu unsek en Kauno, me wahnpoaron ehk-riemeno kadehdehkiher; oh irail kadehdehki nin duwen dahme mehlelo me iei Sihmpwul en Koht.
Eri, e unsek ni eh kohwei sang rehn mehn Suhs akan ong rehn Mehn Liki kan, nin duwen me mehlel me iei sang rehn Koht.

Oh mwurin arail kohwei sang rehn wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, sang mehn Suhs akan kolahng Mehn Liki kan, ke kilangehr wiawihdahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me keieu suwed sang mwomwohdiso koaros; pwe kilang, irail kihsang nan rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo soahng tohto me keieu kesempwal oh sansal; oh irail pil kihsang sapwellimen Kauno inou tohto.
Oh irail wia mepwukat pwehki irail me kasapwungehla koasoandi pwung kan en Kauno, pwe irail en kak karotongehla mesen aramas akan oh kekelwakiala mohngiongarail kan.
Eri, ke kilangehr me mwurin pwuhko eh kolahr nan pehn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, nting kesempwal oh sansal tohto kohsang nan pwuhko, me iei pwuhk en Sihmpwul en Koht.

Oh mwurin ire kesempwal oh sansal pwukat kohsangehr nan pwuhko eri kohieng wehi koaros en Mehn Liki kan; oh mwurin eh kolahng nan wehi koaros en Mehn Liki kan, iei, pil kotehla madau tohto wasa me ke kilangehr Mehn Liki kan ar saledekla ie, ke kilangehr—pwehki ire kesempwal oh sansal tohto me kohsangehr nan pwuhko, me mengei ong aramas en wehwehki, nin duwen padahk sansal kan me sang Sihmpwul en Koht—pwehki soahng pwukat eh kohsang nan sapwellimen Sihmpwulo rongamwahuo, aramas ngeder kin pwupwikihdi, mehlel, kahrehda Sehdan ahneki manaman kehlail pohrail.

Ahpw, ke kilang me Mehn Liki ko me saledeksangehr arail sensel, oh manaman en Koht ketin kapairailda sang wehi kan koaros, pohn sahpw me wia sahpw pilipilda nan pwungen sahpw kan koaros, sahpw me Kauno Koht ketin inoukihongehr ahmw pahpao me kadaudoke kan pahn sohsohki; eri, ke kilang me Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan en kamwomwala douluhl kadaudokemw kan, me iangala riomw kan.
Oh e pil sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan en kamwomwala kadaudoken riomw kan.

Oh pil Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng Mehn Liki kan ren mihmihte nan rotorot kohkohlahte, me ke kilang irail mihmi loale, pwehki ire kesempwal oh sansal kan en rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo me kohsangehr sang ni mwomwohdiso suwedo, me ke kilangehr eh wiawihdao.
Sihmpwul en Koht ahpw mahsanih: I pahn mahkohng Mehn Liki kan, ni ahi pahn kalokehki kisehn kadaudoken peneinei en Israel kan kalokolok mwuledek.

Kedekedeo tohnleng en Kauno ahpw mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang, Sihmpwul en Kohto mahsanih, mwurin ahi pwarekehr kisehn kadaudoken en Israel kan—oh kadaudok wet me I koasoiahier me wia kadaudoken ahmw pahpao—eri, mwurin ahi pahn kadeikirailda, oh kalokeirail sang rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn dipekelekel, Kauno mahsanih, pwehki mwomwohdiso suwedo, me wia nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar, eh ekihla ire kesempwal oh sansal kan en rongamwahu en Sihmpwulo—I pahn mahkohng Mehn Liki kan ni rahno, lao I pahn wahdohng irail rongamwahuo, sang ni pein ahi manaman, me pahn kesempwal oh sansal, Sihmpwulo me mahmahsen.

Sihmpwulo mahsanih, kilang: I pahn pwarohng kadaudokemw kan, oh irail pahn ntingihdi soahng tohto me I pahn padahkihong irail, me pahn sansal oh kesempwal; oh mwurin kadaudokemw kan arail pahn kamwomwomwla, oh pwupwidi nan arail sohpwoson, oh pil iangahki kadaudoken riomw ko, kilang, soahng pwukat pahn ekiekla, pwe en uhd kohdohng Mehn Liki kan, sang ni kisakis oh manaman en Sihmpwulo.
Oh ahi rongamwahuo pahn ntingdi loale, oh ahi paipalap oh ahi komour, Sihmpwulo me mahmahsen

Oh meid pai irail akan me pahn kin nantihong kaukauwada Saion ni rahno, pwe irail pahn alehdi kisakis oh manaman en Ngehn Sarawi; oh ma irail pahn dadaur lel ni imwi, irail pahn kesepwilda ni imwin rahno, oh pahn komourla nan wehi poatopoat en Sihmpwulo; oh mehmen me pahn kalohki popohl, iei, rohng kaperen, meid lingan pohn nahna me irail pahn miheo.

Kedekedeo I kilangada luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko, oh pil Sapwellimen Sihmpwul en Koht pwuhko, me kohdo sang rehn men Suhs, oh kohdo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan oh kohieng luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko.

Oh mwurin eh kodohng irail I kilangada pil ekei pwuhk, me kohdo sang ni manaman en Sihmpwulo, sang rehn Mehn Liki kan kodohng rehrail, pwe en padahkihong Mehn Liki kan oh luhwen kadaudoken riei pwutak ko, oh pil mehn Suhs akan me kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah, me nting kan en soukohp akan oh wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo me mehlel.

Oh tohnlengo mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Keimwiseklahn nting pwukat, me ke kilangehr rehn Mehn Liki kan, pahn kadehdehda mehlel en [nting] keieuo, me sang rehn wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo, oh pahn kasalehda soahng kan me sansal oh kesempwal me kohsang irail; oh pahn sansalada ong keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros, me Sihmpwul en Kohto iei ih Sapwellimen Sahm Soutuko, oh Soundoar en sampah; oh me aramas koaros anahne kohdo reh, ma soh, irail sohte kak komourla.

Oh irail pahn kohdo nin duwen mahsen me pahn koasoandi sang nan douwas en Sihmpwulo; oh mahsen en Sihmpwulo pahn sansalda nan nting en kadaudokemw kan, pil iangahki nan nting en wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo; eri ira koaros pahn kin utuhtpene; pwehki Koht metehmen mie oh Silepen Sihpw metehmen mie ong sampah pwon.

Oh ansou pahn kohdo me e pahn ketin pwarehng wehi kan koaros, ong mehn Suhs kan oh pil ong Mehn Liki kan; oh mwurin eh pahn ketin pwarohng mehn Suhs akan oh pil mehn likih kan, e pahn uhd pwarohng Mehn Liki kan oh pil mehn Suhs akan, oh me mi mwuhr pahn uhd mihla mwowe, oh me mi mwowe pahn uhd mihla mwuhr.

chapters.name: Iralaud 14
summary: Tohnleng men mahsanihong Nihpai duwen kapai kan oh keria kan me pahn kohieng Mehn Liki kan—Mwomwohdiso riaute me mie: Mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto oh mwomwohdiso en tepelo—Souleng kan en Koht nan wehi koaros kin lokolok pahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo—Wahnpoaron Sohn pahn ntingihda duwen imwiseklahn sampah. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh e pahn wiawi, me ma Mehn Liki kan pahn idawehn Sihmpwul en Kohto ni rahno, ansou me e pahn ketin kasalehiong irail pein ih sang ni sapwellime mahsen, oh pil sapwellime roson oh mwekid, pwehn ketikihsang mwohrail arail takain dipekelekel kan—

Oh dehr keptakaiala arail mohngiong kan mwohn Sihmpwul en Kohto, irail pahn iang wiahla kisehn en kadaudoken ahmw pahpao; iei, irail pahn iang wiahla peneinei en Israel; oh irail pahn wia aramas pai kei pohn sahpw en inouo kohkohlahte; irail sohte pahn pwurehng selidi; oh peneinei en Israel sohla pahn namenekla.

Oh lapalahn pwoahro, me mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo weiradahng irail, [iei mwomwohdisou] me tepelo oh nah seri kan wiahdao, pwe en kak kahluwahdilahng aramas akan nan ehl—iei, lapalahn pwoahro me weiweida ong kamwomwalahn aramas pahn uhd audaudkihda irail akan me weiradao, ong kasohrala mehlel en pein irail, [nin duwen] Sihmpwul en Kohto eh mahsanih; kaidehn kasohralahn aramas, ahpw lekideklahng nan kisinieio me sohte imwi.
Pwe kilang, met iei duwen tepelo eh kin kalowehdi aramas, oh pil nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kopwung, [me pahn wiawi] ong irail kan me kin wia doadoahk en mwersuwed oh dipan mwohn silahngi.

Kedekedeo tohnlengo eri mahsanihong ngehi, Nihpai, ketihtihki: Ke kilangehr me ma Mehn Liki kan pahn koluhla e pahn mwahu ong irail; oh ke esehier duwen inou kan en Kauno ong peneinei en Israel; oh ke pil rongehr me mehmen me sohte pahn koluhla e uhdahn pahn mehla.
Eri, meid suwed ong Mehn Liki kan ma iei arail mohngiong kan pahn keptakaila mwohn Sihmpwul en Koht.

Sihmpwul en Koht mahsanih, ansouo kohkohdo me I pahn wiahda doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei nan pwungen aramas akan; doadoahk ehu me pahn poatoapoat, ong pali koaros—pwehn kahreiraillahng popohl oh mour soutuk, de ong arail selidiong keptakain mohngiongirail kan oh rotalahn arail lamalam pwehki arail lohdieng nan kaludu, oh pil ong kamwomwomwla, ni paliwar oh ni palingehn, nin duwen selidi en tepelo, nin duwen me I mahsaniher.
Kedekedeo ni ansou me tohnglengo mahsaniher mahsen pwukat, e ahpw mahsanihongie: Ke tamatamante sapwellimen Sahmo inou kan ong peneinei en Israel? I ahpw sapeng patohwan, Ei maing.
Kedekedeo e ahpw mahsanihongie: Kilengla, oh kilang mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me iei nohnohn suwed akan koaruhsie, me tepelo wiahdahro.

Oh e mahsanihongie: Kilahng mwomwohdiso riaute me mie; ehu iei mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto, a mehteio iei mwomwohdiso en tepelo; eri, mehmen me sohte iang mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto kin iang towe mwomwohdiso suwedo, me iei nohnohn suwed koaros; oh ih me wia lih suwed en sampah unsek.
Kedekedeo I kilengla oh kilangada lih en netiki paliwar en sampah pwon, oh e mih pohn sehd tohto; oh e kaunda wasa koaros pohn sampah, nan wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros.

Kedekedeo I kilangada mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwul en Kohto, oh towe kan me malaulau, pwehki wiewia suwed akan en lih en netiki paliwere me mih pohn pihl akan; ahpw, I kilangada mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwulo, me iei souleng kei en Koht, arail pil iang mihseli pohn sampah; oh wasa me re kaunda kan me tikitik, pwehki uwen mwersuwed en lih en netiki paliwar ndand me I kilangadao.
Kedekedeo I kilangada nohno ndand suwedo kihpenehr kidelepen aramas pohn sampah, nan wein Mehn Liki kan, pwe irail en pelian Sihmpwul en Kohto.

Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada manaman en Sihmpwul en Kohto, eh kohkohdi pohn souleng kan en mwomwohdiso en Sihmpwulo, oh pohn sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inou kan, me kamweremwerpeseng wasa koaros pohn sampah; oh irail tehtehki pwuhng oh manaman en Koht ni lingan kowahlap.
Kedekedeo I kilangadahr me engieng en Koht kipehdier mwomwohdiso ndand suwedo, kahredahr mahwin kan oh rohng en mahwin kan nan pwungen wehi kan koaros oh keinek kan en sampah.

Oh ni ansou me mahwin oh rohng en mahwin kan tepda wiewiawi nan pwungen wehi kan koaros me iangih nohno suwedo, tohnlengo eri mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Kilang, engieng en Koht miher pohn nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar kan; oh kilang, ke kilangehr soahng pwukat koaruhsie—

Oh ni ansou me rahno pahn leledo me engieng en Koht pahn kipehdi nohnohn lih en netiki paliwar kan, me iei mwomwohdiso ndand suwedo en sampah pwon, me tepelo wiahdao, eri, ni rahno, sapwellimen Sahmo doadoahk pahn tepida, pwe en kaunopdahng ahlo ong pweidahn sapwellime inou kan, me e ketin wiahiongehr sapwellime aramas akan me iei peneinei en Israel.
Kedekedeo tohnlengo eri mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Kilahng!
Oh ngehi kilengla oh kilangada aramas emen, oh e likawih likou pwetepwet ehu.
Oh tohnlengo eri mahsanihongie: Kilang emen wahnpoaron ehk-riemen en Sihmpwulo.
Kilahng, e pahn kilahng oh ntingihda luhwen soahng pwukat; ei, oh pil soahng tohto me wiawiher.
Oh e pahn pil ntingihda duwen imwiseklahn sampah.

Eri, soahng kan me e pahn ntingihda e pwung oh mehlel; oh kilang e ntingdier nan pwuhk me ke kilangehro me kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs; oh ni ansou me e kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs, de, ni ansou me [mahsen en] pwuhko kohsang nan ewen mehn Suhs, soahng kan me ntingdier sansal oh unsek, oh keieu kesempwal oh mengei ong aramas koaros en kak wehwehki.
Oh kilang, soahng kan me wahnpoaron en Sihmpwul menet pahn ntingihdi iei soahng tohto me ke kilangehr; oh kilahng, luhwe kan me ke pahn kilang.
Ahpw soahng kan me ke pahn kilang sang met kohla ke sohte pahn ntingihdi; pwe Kauno Koht ketin kasarawialahr wahnpoaron en Sihmpwul en Kohto me ih me pahn ntingihdi.

Oh pil ekei me kohdo mahs, ong irail e ketin kasalehiengehr soahng koaros, oh irail ntingihdier; oh nting ko katengetengdier pwe ren kohdo ni unsek, nin duwen me mehlelo me mih rehn Sihmpwulo, ansou me Kauno pahn ketin koasoanehdi, ong peneinei en Israel.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, rongehr oh kadehdehki, me eden wahnpoaron en Sihmpwulo iei Sohn, nin duwen me tohnlengo mahsanih.

Oh kilang, Ngehi, Nihpai, sohte mweimweieng I en ntingihdi luhwen soahng kan me I kilangehr oh rongehr; eri soahng kan me I ntingihdier I itariki; oh I ntingihdi ekiste duwen soahng kan me I kilangehr.
Oh I kadehdehki me I kilangehr soahng kan me ahi pahpao kilangehr, oh tohnleng en Kauno me ketin kasalehiongie soahng pwukat.

Oh met I kaimwsakalahr ahi koasoai me pid soahng kan me I kilangehr ni ansou me Ngehno waiehsangehr; oh ma soahng koaros me I kilangehr sohte ntingdi, a soahng kan me I ntingihdier pwung. Oh met mehlel. Ahmen

chapters.name: Iralaud 15
summary: Kadaudoken Lihai kan pahn alehdi rongamwahuo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan ni imwin rahn akan—Kopwurupwurpenehn mehn Israel kan rasohng tuhke olihp me uhdahn rahn tuhke kan pahn pwurehng kapatapatohng paliweren tuhkeo—Nihpai kawehwehdi duwen kaudiahl en tuhkehn komouro oh koasoaia duwen sapwellimen Koht pwuhng ni eh pahn ketin katohrepeseng me suwed sang me mwahu. Ele sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, mwurin Ngehno tiada pohi, oh [I] kilangehr soahng pwukat koaros, I pwurodo ni imwen ahi pahpao impwalo.
Kedekedeo I kilangada riei pwutak ko, oh irail wie mwoaroamwoarongkipene duwen soahng kan me ahi pahpao koasoaiahengirailehr.

Pwe e koasoaiahiong irailehr ni mehlel soahng kesempwal tohtoh, me apwal [aramas] en wehwehki, ihte ma aramas pahn peki rehn Kauno; oh mohngiongirail kan keptakai, kahrehda ar sohte kin kilenglahng Kauno nin duwen me irail konehng wia.
Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, nsensuwed pwehki keptakai en mohngiongirail kan, oh pil, pwehki soahng kan me I kilangehr, oh ese me re uhdahn pahn wiawi pwehki uwen suwed me aramas kan kin wiahda.
Kedekedeo ngehi eri luwetla pwehki ahi kahpwal akan, pwe I leme me ahi kahpwal akan laud sang mehkoaros, pwehki kamwomwalahn nei aramas akan, pwe I kilangehr arail pwupwilao.
Kedekedeo mwurin ahi kehlaildahro I koasoaieng riei pwutak kan, pwe I men esehda mehlel kahrepen arail mwoarmwoarong.
Oh irail nda: Kilang, se sohte kak wehwehki soahng kan me aht pahpao koasoaiahier me pid rahn tuhke olihpo, oh pil duwen Mehn Liki kan.
Oh I kalelapak rehrail: Kumwail pekier rehn Kauno?
Oh irail sapengkinie: Soh; pwe Kauno sohte kin ketin kasalehiong kiht soahng pwukat.
Kilang, I ndahieng irail: Ia duwen amwail sohte kin kapwaiada kosonned en Kauno? Ia duwen amwail pahn lekidekla, pwehki mohngiongimwail kan kekeluwakalahr?

Kumwail sohte tamataman soahng kan me Kauno ketin mahsaniher?—Ma kumwail sohte pahn kekeluwakiala mohngiongimwail kan, oh peki rehi ni pwoson, kamehlele me kumwail pahn alehdi, iangahki kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan, ni mehlel kumwail pahn wehwehkihla soahng pwukat koaruhsie.

Kilang, I ndahieng kumwail, me peneinei en Israel rasohng tuhke olihpo, sang ni Ngehn en Kauno me mie rehn atail pahpao; oh kilang kitail seu tipwasangehr peneinei en Israel, oh kitail seu wia apwoat rahn tuhkehn peneinei en Israelo?

Oh met, wehwehn dahme atail pahpao koasoiadahr me pid rahntuhke mehlel kan ar kapatapatehng ni tuhkeo sang ni unseklahn Mehn Liki kan, iei, me nan imwin rahn akan, ansou me kadaudoketail kan pahn pwupwikihdi ar sohpwoson, iei, erein sounpar tohto, oh dih tohto mwurin Mesaia eh pahn ketin pwarohng aramas akan ni paliwar, eri rongamwahu unsek en Mesaiao pahn kohieng Mehn Liki kan, oh sang rehn Mehn Liki kan e ahpw pahn uhd kohieng kadaudoketail kan me luwehdi—

Oh ni ansouo kadaudoketail kan me luwehdi pahn esehda me irail iei kisehn peneinei en Israel, oh me irail iei sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inouo; oh irail ahpw pahn esehda oh wehwehkihda duwen arail pahpa kahlap oko, oh pil wehwehkihla rongamwahu en arail Soundoro, me pein ih ketin padahkihong arail pahpa kalahp oko; eri, irail pahn wehwehkihla duwen arail Soundoro oh uhdahn karepen sapwellime padahk, pwe irail en kak ese duwen arail pahn kohdohng reh oh komourla.

Oh ni rahno irail seu pahn perenda oh kapingahki arail Koht soutuk, arail paipalap oh komourparail? Iei, ni rahno, irail sou pahn ale kakehlaparail oh ketihnaparail sang ni tuhkehn wain me mehlelo? Iei, irail sou pahn kohdohng nan udahn sapwellimen Koht kehl mehlelo?
Kilang, I ndahieng kumwail, Mehlel; irail pahn pwurehng tamanirailda nan pwungen peneinei en Israel kan; irail pahn poadehng tuhkehn olip mehlelo, pwehki arail wia rahn tuhke mehlel en olipo.

Oh iei met me atail pahpao kawehwe; oh e kawehwe me e sohte pahn wiawi lao lel mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn kamwereirailpeseng; oh e kawehwe me e pahn kohdo sang rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh Kauno kak ketin kasalehieng Mehn Liki kan sapwellime manaman, pwehki mehn Suhs akan, de peneinei en Israel arail soikala.

Eri, atail pahpao sohte koasoiahte kadaudoketail kan, ahpw pil peneinei en Israel koaros, nin duwen inouo eh pahn pweida nan imwin rahn akan; inouo me Kauno ketin wiahieng samatail Eipram, mahsanih: Nan kadaudokemw kan seri koaruhsie nan sampah pahn kapaida.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, koasoaiahiong irail soahng tohto me pid duwen soahng pwukat; mehlel, I koasoaiahiong irail duwen kopwurupwurdohn mehn Suhs akan ni imwin rahn akan.

Oh I wadekohng irail mahsen akan en Aiseia, me mahsanih duwen kopwurupwurodohn mehn Suhs akan, de peneinei en Israel; oh mwurin arail pahn pwurodo re sohlahr pahn pwurehng namanekla, de re solahr pahn pwurehng mwerpeseng. Kedekedeo I koasoaiahieng riei pwutak ko soahng tohto, kahrehda re meleileidi oh akitikitikla mwohn Kauno.
Kedekedeo irail pwurehng koasoaiong ie, ndinda: Ia wehwehn soahng wet me atail pahpao kilangada nan ouramano? Ia wehwehn tuhke me e kilangadao?
Oh ngehi eri ndahiong irail: E wehwehki tuhkehn koumouro.
Oh irail ndahiong ie: Ia wehwehn reil mete me atail pahpao kilangadahro, me uhlahng ni tuhkeo?

Ngehi ndahng ira me iei mahsen en Koht; oh mehmen me pahn rong mahsen en Koht, oh koledi teng, irail sohte pahn lekidekla; oh pil sohte lohdi pahn manaman en arail kasongosong kan oh kesik ketieu kan en soun kasongosongo, me pahn kahluwairaillang mehla.

Eri, Ngehi, Nihpai, kangoangehkinirail ren rong mahsen en Kauno; mehlel, I kangoangehkinirail sang ni kehl en palingeni koaros, oh sang ni koahiek koaros me I ahneki, pwe irail en kak rong mahsen en Koht oh tamataman ren kin kapwaiada sapwellime kosonned akan ansou koaros ni mehkoaros.
Oh irail kalelapak rehi: Ia wehwehn pillap me atail pahpao kilangadao?
Oh I ndahiong irail me pihl me atail pahpao kilangadahro me inenen samin; oh uwen ah madamadau eh direkihla soahng teikan karehda e sohte kilang uwen samin en pihlo.
Oh I ndahiong irail me iei wahu kamasepwehko mwo, me katohrehsang me suwed kan tuhkehn komouro oh pil sapwellimen Koht souleng kan.
Oh I ndahiong irail me e wehwehki ehl kamasepwehko, me tohnlengo mahsanihong ie me [e] kaunoupdahr ong me suwed akan.

Oh I ndahiong irail me aht pahpao pil kilangada me sapwellimen Koht pwuhng me katohrepeseng me suwed kan sang me mwahu kan; oh marainpeo duwehte marain en mpwul en kisiniei, me kin kohkohdahla rehn Koht kohkohlahte, oh sohte imwi.
Oh irail pil kalelapak rehi: Soahng wet wehwehki kalokolok en paliwar nan mour wet, de e wehwehki dahme ngehn pahn wiahla mwurin mehlahn paliwar, de e koasoakoasoaia duwen soahng kan me pid sampah?

Kedekedeo I ndahieng irail me e wehwehki mehkan me pid paliwar oh palingehn; pwe rahno pahn lelledo me irail pahn pakadeingki arail wiewia kan, iei, wiewia kan me [irail] wiahda ni arail momour ni sampah nan arail ansou nan erein mour wet.

Eri, ma irail pahn mehla nan arail suwed akan irail pahn pil iang lekidekla, pwehki soahng kan me sang palingehn, me pid duwen [mour de wiewia] pwung; eri, irail pahn udahn uh mwohn sihlangin Koht, pwe irail en pakadeingki arail wiewia kan; oh ma arail wiewia kan samin re uhdahn pil pahn samin; oh ma irail pahn samin re sohte pahn kak kousoan nan wein Koht; pwe ma soh, a wein Koht pil pahn samin.
Ahpw kilang, I ndahiong kumwail, wein Koht sohte samin, oh sohte mehkot samin kak pidelong nan wein Koht; eri e pahn mie wasa samin me kaunopdahngehr me samin kan.

Oh mie wasa me kaunopdahr, iei, nan ehl kamasepwehko me I koasoaiahiero, oh tepelo me kaunopadahr wasao; eri wasa me mour en aramas men pahn lel iei nan wehin Koht, de lekidekla pwehki pwuhng me I koasoaiahier.

Eri, me suwed kan pahn posoikla sang rehn me mwahu kan, oh sang ni tuhkehn komouro, me wah kan inenen kaselel oh mwahu sang wahn tuhke koaros, iei, oh ih me keieu mwahu nanpwungen sapwellimen Koht kisakis kan. Oh ih met me I ndahiong riei pwutak kan. Ahmen.

chapters.name: Iralaud 16
