summary: Me suwed kan kin apwaliki padahk mehlel—Nein Lihai pwutak kan pwoudikihda nein Ismael serepein kan—Liahona kasalehda wasa re pahn keidie nan sahpwtehno—Ekei ansou mahsen en Kauno kin ntingdi pohn Liahona—Ismael mehla; ah peneinei kaulim pwehki arail kahpwal akan. Ele Sounpar 600–592 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri kanekelahr ahi koasoai ong riei pwutak ko, kilang ira ndahiong ie: Ke ndahng kiht soahng kei me inenen apwal ong kiht en rong.

Kedekedeo I ndahiong ira me I ese me I koasoaia soahng apwal akan ong me suwed akan, nin duwen padahk mehlel; oh me pwung kan I ale iraildahr, oh kadehdehki me irail uhdahn pahn pwekipwekda ni keimwseklahn rahno; eri, me sapwung kan pahn apwaliki me mehlelo, karehiong arail lingeringerda kowahlap.

Oh met riei ohl oko, ma kumwa pwung oh inangih rong me mehlelo, oh idawehn, pwe kumwa en kak weid ni pwung mwohn Koht, a kumwa sohte pahn kaulimkihla me mehlelo, oh nda: Ke koasoaiahieng kiht soahng apwal ekei.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri kangoange riei ohl oko, sang ni ngoang koaros, pwe [ira] en kak kapwaiada kosonned en Kauno.
Kedekedeo ira eri karakarahkala mwohn Kauno; kahrehda I perenkihda oh ahneki koapwoaroapwoar laud ong ira, me ira pahn weid nan ahl en mour pwung.
Met, soahng pwukat koaros wiwiawi nan ansou me ahi pahpao kin koukousoan nan impwal nan wahu me e kahdanki Lemuel.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri pwoudikihda emen nein Ismael serepein ko; oh pil, riei pwutak ko pwoudikihda nein Ismael serepein teiko; oh Soram pil pwoudkihda nein Ismael serepein me keieu laudo.
Oh met ahi pahpao kapwaiadahr sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan me kohiengehr. Oh pil, ngehi, Nihpai, kapaidahr mehlel sang rehn Kauno.
Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahseniong ahi pahpao nihpwongo, oh kehkehlingkiheng me lakapw e pahn seiloaklahng nan sapwtehno.

Kedekedeo ni ansou me ahi pahpao pwourda ni mensengo, oh kohla ni wenihmw en impwalo, e pwuriamweikihla eh kilangada nan pwehlo mpwei pwonopwon ehu me wiawihkihda doadoahk lingan; oh e wiawihkihda pirahs. Oh nan mpweio mie kisin arep mete riau; oh ehu kin idilahng wasa se pahn keidla ie nan sapwtehno.

Kedekedeo kiht eri kihpene soahng kan koaros me se anahne wa kohla nan sapwtehno, oh mwenge oh dipwsou koaros me luhwehdi me Kauno ketikihong kiht; oh se wahda soangsoangen weren tuhke koaros me se kak wa kohla nan sapwtehno.
Kedekedeo se ahpw wahda imwat impwal oko oh mweselahng nan sapwtehno, palio pillap en Leimen.
Kedekedeo se seiseiloangkiher erein rahn pahieu, kohkohlahng pali eir de pali eir en pali mese, oh se ahpw pwurehng kauwada imwat impwal akan; oh se kiheng eden wasao Saser.

Kedekedeo se ahpw ale nait kesik ketieu ko oh arep ko, oh kohla nan sapwtehno pwe sen kasikihdi kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge; oh mwurin aht kasikihdier kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge, se pwurala rehn aht peneinei ko nan sapwtehno, wasa me adaniki Saser. Oh se ahpw douluhla nan sapwtehno, weweidlahte nan ahl me se keid loaleo, kekeidte wasa me keieu pwelmwahu nan sapwtehno, me iei wasa kan me mihte limwahn Sehd Weitahtao.
Kedekedeo se ahpw seiseiloangkiher erein rahn kei, kasikasikiekihdi kanat mwenge nait kesik ketieu kan oh arep kan oh nait pahi kan oh takai kan nan aht seiseiloako.
Oh se ahpw kin ideidawehn kaweid kan en mpweio, me kin kahluwaikit wasa kan me keieu pwelmwahu nan sapwtehno.
Oh mwurin aht seiloangkiher erein rahn tohto, se ahpw kauwada imwat impwal akan nan erein ansou kis, pwe sen kak pwurehng koammoal oh alehdi kenen aht peneinei kan mwenge.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw kohlahn kasikiedi kanat sali, ahpw, I kawehla nei kesik ketieuo, me wiawihkihda mete; oh mwurin ei kawehla nei kesik ketieuo, kilang, riei pwutak ko lingeringerda pahi pwehki nei kesik ketieuo eh ohla, eri se sohte koledi kanat sali.
Kedekedeo kiht eri pwurala rehn aht peneinei kan oh sohte wa sali, oh irail pwangada, pwehki arail seiseiloak, re alehkihdi apwal uwen arail duhpekla.

Kedekedeo Leimen oh Lemuel oh nein Ismael pwutak ko eri tepda kaulim kouahlap, pwehki arail lokolok kan oh kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh ahi pahpao pil tepida kaulime Kauno ah Koht; mehlel, oh irail koaruhsie inenen nsensuwedla, lao irail koaruhsie ahpw kaulime Kauno.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri iangehr riei ko lokolongkiher kahpwalo pwehki nei kesik ketieuo eh ohlao, oh sahl en neirail kesik ketieu ko pil mweipeseng, e ahpw tepda apwal kowahlap, mehlel, kahredahr aht sohla kak alehdi kanat sali.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaieng riei ohl oko, pwehki arail mohngiong ko pwurehng keptakaila, lao irail kaukaulime Kauno arail Koht.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw wiahkihda kesik ketieu ehu tuhke pwoat, oh oapwoat arep sang ni tuhke inen pwoat; eri, I wahda nei kesik ketieuo oh arepo, iangahki ehu pahi oh takai kei. Oh ngehi kalelapak rehn ahi pahpao: Ia wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kaskihdi kanatail sali?
Kedekedeo e ahpw peki rehn Kauno, pwe irail karakarahkalahr pwehki ahi koasoai ong irail; pwe I padahkieng irail soahng tohto sang ni kehl en palingeni.
Kedekedeo kepitien Kauno ahpw peidohng ahi pahpao, oh e lokolok ki mehlel eh kaulime Kauno, ih eri pahtoukihla.
Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihong ih: Kilang pohn mpweien, oh tehk soahng kan me ntingdier powe.
Kedekedeo ansou me ahi pahpao kilangada soahng kan me ntingdi nan mpweio, ih oh pil riei ohl oko oh nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail pwoud ko masepwehkada oh rerrer kowahlap.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, kilangada kisin arep mete ko nan mpweio ar kin doadoahk ma se pahn kin pwoson oh loaloapwoat oh peikiong.

Oh pil mie nting kapw ntingdi powe, me mengein aramas en wadek, me kawehwehiong kiht duwen sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan; oh e ntingdi oh kin weliweliali, ma se pahn kin pwoson oh loaloapwoatieng kaweido. Oh se kilang me sang ni wiewia tikitik kan Kauno kin ketin wiahkihda [doadoahk] kapwuriamwei kan.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, eri idawehn kaweid kan me kohsang nan mpweio oh kohdahla pohn nahnao.
Kedekedeo ngehi eri kaskihdi mahn lawalo kan, ngehi eri alehdi kenen aht peneinei kan sali.

Kedekedeo I ahpw pwuralahng ni imwat mpwal oko, wahla mahn akan me I kaskihdi; oh ni ansou me re kilangada me I koledier kanat sali, irail inenen perenda kowahlap! Kedekedeo irail karakarahkala mwohn Kauno oh wia arail kaping kalahngan ong ih.

Kedekedeo kiht eri pwurehng wenla nan aht seiloako, kekeid nan ahlohte me se keid ie nin tapio; oh mwurin aht seiloangkiher erein rahn tohto se ahpw pwurehng kauwada imwat impwal akan, pwe sen kak koammoal erein ansou ieu.
Kedekedeo Ismael eri mehla, oh seridi nan sahpw ehu me adaniki Neiom.

Kedekedeo nein Ismael serepein ko ahpw mwahiei ki kowalap arail pahpao eh melahr, oh arail kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh irail kaulim ki ahi pahpao eh wairailsang nan sahpw en Serusalem oh ndinda: Aht pahpao mehlahr; ei, oh kitail wie kohkohseliher nan sapwtehnet, oh kitail lokolongkiher kahpwal laud, duhpek, men nimpil, oh pwangadahr; oh mwurin lokokok pwukat kitail uhdahn pahn mehkihla duhpek nan sapwtehnet.
Oh met irail kaulime ahi pahpao, oh pil ngehi; oh irail men pwurehng pwuralahng Serusalem.

Oh Leimen eri ndahiong Lemuel oh pil nein Ismael pwutak ko: Ser, kitail kemehla atail pahpao, oh pil rietail Nihpai, me wiahkilahr me ih me pahn wia atail kaun oh atail sounpadahk, kitail me wia rie pwutak laud akan.

Met, e nda me Kauno mahseniong ih, oh tohnleng kan pil sewese ih. Ahpw kilang, kitail ese me e kin pitipitih kitail; oh e kin ndahiong kitail soahng pwukat, oh e kin wiewia doadoahk likamw, pwe en kak pitiekinkitaildi, pwe mwein e medemedewe, me e pahn kahluwaikitailahng wasa kei nan sapwtehn me kitail sehse; oh mwurin eh pahn kahluwakitaila, e medewedahr me e pahn wiahla atail nahnmwarki oh kaunkitailda, pwe en kak wiahiong kitail nsene oh dahme e men wia. Oh iei soahng pwukat me riei Leimen koasoaia me kahrehieng arail lingeringerda.

Kedekedeo Kauno eri ketin ieiang kiht, iei, kepitien Kauno ahpw peido oh mahsanihong irail mahsen tohto, oh angiangih irail kouwalahp; oh mwurin arail rongehr ngilen engieng sang ni kepitien Kauno, irail ahpw meleileidi, oh koluhkihla diperail kan, kahrehda Kauno pwurehng ketin kapaiahkinkitada kanat mwenge, pwe sen dehr mehla.

chapters.name: Iralaud 17
summary: Poahngoak kohieng Nihpai en wiahda sohp pwoat—Rie ko uhwong—E kangoange ira sang ni eh padokada duwen sapwellimen Koht wiewia kan ong Israel—Nihpai direkihla manaman en Koht—Rie pwutak ko irairdi ira en dehr doahke, pwe ira de mengidi duwehte ahlek pwoat me mengilahr. Ele Sounpar 592–591 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo se ahpw douluhla nan aht seiloak nan sapwtehno; oh se ahpw kohlahng palimese sang ansouo kohla. Oh se ahpw lellohng kahpwal tohto nan aht seiseiloak nan sapwtehno; oh aht pwoud kan naitikiedi seri nan sapwtehno.

Oh sapwellimen Kauno kapai laud kin kodohng kiht, oh ni aht kin momouriki uduk me amas nan sapwtehno, aht pwoud kan kin kadihdi mwahu neirail seri kan, oh irail kehlail, mehlel, duwehte ohl akan; oh irail tepdahr sohla kaulimki arail seiloak.

Oh kitail kak kilang me sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan uhdahn pahn pweida. Oh ma aramas pahn kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Koht kosonned akan e uhdahn pahn apwalih irail, oh kakehlaka irail, oh ketikihong irail wiepen arail pahn kak kapwaiada soahng kan me e kin ketin kehkehlingkiheng irail; eri, e ketin apwalih kiht erein aht seiseiloak nan sapwtehno.
Oh se ahpw seiseiloangki erein soupar tohto, iei, sounpar waluh nan sapwtehno.

Oh se ahpw kohdo nan sahpw me se kahdankihla Sahpwen Rahk, pwehki e diren wahn tuhke oh pil sukehn loangalap; oh Kauno me ketin kaunopada soahng pwukat koaros pwe se en dehr mehla. Oh se kilangada sehdo, me kahdaniki Iriandom, me wehwehki pihl tohto.

Kedekedeo se ahpw kauada imwat impwal akan ni keilen oaroahro; oh mehndahte aht lokolok laud nan kahpwal akan oh kasongosong kan, iei, me tohto me se sohte kak ntingihdi, ahpw se ahneki peren laud ni ansou me se lelledo ni oaroahro; oh se kahdanihkihla wasao Sahpwen Rahk, pwehki e diren wahn sahpw.

Kedekedeo mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei mihmihkiher nan Sahpwen Rahk erein rahn tohto, I rong kepitien Kauno eh peidohng ie, mahsanih: Pwourda, oh kohdahla pohn nahnao. Oh ni ansouohte I pwourda oh kohdahla pohn nahnao, oh lukuweriong Kauno.
Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihong ie, ketihtihki: Ke pahn wiahda sohp pwoat, ni wiepe me I pahn kasalehienguhk, pwe I en kak wahla noumw aramas akan kotehla sehd wet.

Oh ngehi eri patohwan: Maing Kaun, ia wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kak diar takai me mete me I pahn inimada lao peipeseng, pwe I en kak wiahda dipwisou kan me pahn doadoahkohng wiahda sohp me komw mahsanihongieo?
Kedekedeo Kauno mahsanihongie wasa me I pahn kohla ie pwe I en kak diar takai me mete, pwe I en kak wiahkihda dipwisoun doadoahk kan.

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw wiahda mehn pepeuk me I pahn peuk ki kisinieio, [mehn pepeuko wiawikihda] kilin mahn; oh mwurin ei wiahda mehn pepeuko, pwe I en kak peungki kisinieio, I ale takai riau oh idingpene pwe I en kak saunda kisiniei.
Pwe Kauno sohte kupwurki sen kalapw saunda kisiniei, ni aht wie seiseiloak nan sapwtehno; e ketin mahsanih: I pahn wiahieng kenemwail mwenge kan en memla, pwe kumwail en dehr kukih;

Oh ngehi me pahn wia kamarainpamwail nan sapwtehno; oh I pahn kaunopada ahlo mwohmwail, ma kumwail pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan; eri, ni amwail pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan [I] pahn kahluwaikumwaillahng nan sahpw en inouo; oh kumwail pahn ese me ngehi me kahluwaikumwail.

Eri, Kauno pil mahsanih: Mwurin amwail pahn lella nan sahpw en inouo, kumwail pahn ese me ngehi, Kauno, iei Koht; oh me ngehi, Kauno, me kapitkumwailla sang kamwomwala; ei, I waikumwaildo sang sahpw en Serusalem.
Eri, ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw nantihong kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan, oh I ahpw koangoangehki riei ohl akan en mehlel oh loaloapwoat.
Kedekedeo I ahpw wiahda dipwisoun doadoahk kan sang ni takai me mete me I inimada lao peipeseng.

Oh ni ansou me riei ohl akan kilangada me I pahn wiahda sohp pwoat, irail tepda kaulimeie oh nda: Riatail pwutako pweipwei, pwe e lemehieng me e kak wiahda sohp; ei, oh e pil lemehieng me e kak kotehla lapalahn madau kat.

Oh riei ohl akan eri kaulimahkinie, oh sohte men iang wia doadoahk, pwe irail sohte kamehlele me I kak wiahda sohp pwoat; oh irail pil sohte kamehlele me Kauno me ketin mahsanihong ie dahme I pahn wia.

Kedekedeo, ngehi, Nihpai, pahtoukihla mehlel pwehki keptaikai en arail mohngiong kan; oh met ahnsou me irail kilangada ahi tepda pahtou irail perenda nan arail mohngiong kan, lao irail kouruhrkinie oh ndinda: Se ese me ke sohte kak wiahda sohp pwoat, pwe se eseier me ahmw madamadau sohte itar; eri, ke sohte kak wiahda soahngen doadoahk laud duwehte men.

Oh ke duwehte atail pahpao, me mihla pan madamadau likamw en ah mohngiongo; mehlel, e kahluwaikitail sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh kitail kokohseli mwahl nan sapwtehn erein sounpar tohto; oh atail pwoud kan wiahier doadoahk laud, ni ar liseiandahr; oh irail naitikihdi seri nan sapwtehno oh lokolongki soahng koaros, ihte re sohte mehla; oh e pahn mwahute ma re mehla mwohn arail kohkohlahsang Serusalem oh wie lokolongki kahpwal pwukat.
Kilang, erein sounpar tohto kitail wie lokolok nan sapwtehn erein ansouo kitail kak wie nsensenamwahuki atail dipwisou kan oh sapwatail sahpwo; ei, oh mwein kitail pahn pereperen.

Oh kitail ese me aramas akan me mihmi nan sahpw en Serusalem wia aramas pwung kei; pwe irail kin kapwaiada sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan oh kopwung kan, oh sapwellime kosonned akan koaros, nin duwen kosonned en Moses; eri, kitail ese me irail wia aramas pwung kei; oh atail pahpao kadeik irail, oh kahluwaikitailsang pwehki atail kin rong eh koasoai kan; mehlel, oh riatail pwutako pil duwehte ih. Oh ih mwomwen koasoai me riei pwutak kan kaukaulimkihong kiht.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaieng irail oh nda: Kumwail kamehlele me atail pahpa kahlap oko, me wia seri en Israel akan, kak pitisang mehn Isip kan ma irail sohte rong mahsen en Kauno?
Mehlel, kumwail medemedewe me irail kak pakahrlahsang arail wia lidu ma Kauno sohte mahsanihong Moses en kahluwairail sang arail wia lidu?

Met kumwail ese me seri en Israel wia lidu; oh kumwail ese me irail kin wiewia doadoahk laud, me uhdahn kansensuwed mehlel; eri, kumwail ese me e wia mehkot mwahu ong irail, me irail en kasaledeksang mour en kalidu.
Met kumwail ese me Kauno kehkehlikieng Moses pwe en wia doadoahk kesempwal wo; oh kumwail ese me sang ni sapwellime mahseno Sehd Weitahtao pwalpeseng, oh irail eri kotehla, keid pohn ngalangal.
Ahpw kumwail ese me mehn Isip ko, me wia nein Parao sounpei kan ahpw duhla nan Sehd Weitahtao.
Oh kumwail pil ese me [Kauno] ketin katungoalehkinirail manna nan sapwtehno.
Mehlel, oh kumwail pil ese me Moses, sang ni eh mahsen nin duwen manaman en Koht me mihmi reh, [e] poakih paipo oh pihl ahpw kusieisang loale, pwe seri en Israel kan en kak nimpil.

Oh mendahte Kauno arail Koht, arail Sounkomour, eh ketin kahluwairail oh ketiket mwohrail, kahkahluwa irail nirahn oh kamkamarainih irail nihpwong, oh kin ketin wiahiong irail soahng kan koaros me kesempwal ong aramas en alehdi, irail ahpw keptakaila oh karotongala arail madamadau kan, oh lahlahwe Moses oh Koht mehlel oh ieiaso.

Kedekedeo nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin kamwomwirailla; oh nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin kahluwa irail; oh nin duwen sapwellime mahsen e kin ketin wiahieng irail soahng koaros; oh sohte mehkot kin wiawi ihte sang ni sapwellime mahsen.
Oh mwurin arail kotehla pillap en Sordan e ketin kakehlairailda pwe irail en pwakihpeseng tohn sahpwo, ei, pwe irail [tohn sahpwo] en mwerpeseng oh mehla.
Oh met, kumwail medemedewe me tohn sahpwet, me mihmi nan sahpw en inouo, me atail pahpa kahlap oko kasareirailao, kumwail leme me irail aramas pwung kei? Kilang, I ndahiong kumwail, Soh.
Kumwail wiahki me atail pahpa kahlap oko kesempwalasang irail ma irail aramas pwung kei? I ndahiong kumwail, Soh.

Kilang, Kauno kin ketin kesempwaliki aramas koaros; mehmen me pwung kin kenikenla rehn Koht. Ahpw kilang, aramas pwukat soikala mahsen en Koht koaros, oh irail kin wiewia me suwed; oh engieng en Koht mihla pohrail; oh Kauno ahpw keriahla sahpwo ong irail, oh kapaiahkihda atail pahpa kahlap oko sahpwo; mehlel, e ketin keriairaila pwehn kamwomwirailla oh kapaiahkihda atail pahpa kahlap oko irail en sapwenikihla.
Kilang, Kauno ketin kapikada sampah pwe aramas en kousoanlaie; oh e ketin kapikada sapwellime seri kan pwe ren sapwenikihla.
Oh e kin ketin apwaliada wehi pwung, oh kawehla wehi suwed akan.
Oh e kin ketin kahluwahla me pwung kan nan sahpw en inou kan, oh kamwomwala me suwed kan, oh keriahla sahpw akan ong irail.
E kin ketin kakaun nanleng wasa ileilehie, pwehki iei wasa me mwoahle kin mih ie, oh sampah iei utupen aluweluwe kan.

Oh e ketin poakohng irail akan me men wiahki ih arail Koht. Kilang, e ketin poakohng atail pahpa kahlap oko, oh e ketin inoukihong irail, iei, Eipraam, Aisek, oh Seikop; oh kin ketin tamataman inou kan me e ketin wiadahr; eri, e ahpw ketin wairailsang nan Sahpw en Isip.

Oh e ahpw ketin kainenehkinirailla sapwellime sokono nan sapwtehno; pwe irail kakeptaikaila kapehdarail kan, duwehte dahme kumwail wiahier; oh Kauno kaineneirailla pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan. E ketin kadarala sinek pwoisin kei rehrail; oh mwurin sinek ko eh keirailpenehr e ahpw ketin kaunopada wiepen arail pahn kak mwahula; oh doadoahk me irail anahne wia iei kilenglahng; oh pwehki koasoandio eh nohn mengei, de pwehki wiepeo eh mengei, tohto irail ahpw mehla.
Oh irail kin kakeptakaila mohngiongirail kan ekei pak, oh irail kin lahlahwe Moses, oh pil lahlahwe Koht; ahpw, kumwail ese me sapwellime manamano me ketin kahluwairaillahng nan sahpw en inouo.

Oh met, mwurin soahng pwukat koaros, ansouo eri lelledo me irail suwedla, iei, suwedla mehlel; oh I sehse ahpw ansou wet irail nektehn kamwomwomwala; pwe I ese me rahno uhdahn pahn lelledo me irail pahn kamwomwomwala, ihte ekei me pahn kalipilipala oh selidi.

Eri, Kauno poahngokihong ahi pahpao me e pahn kohkohla nan sapwtehn; oh mehn Suhs akan pil song kemehla ih; ei, oh kumwail pil song kemehla ih; eri, nan kapehdemwail kan kumwail wia soun kamaramas kei oh kumwail duwehte irail.

Kumwa kin mwadang wia me suwed ahpw pwand en tamanda Kauno amwa Koht. Kumwa kilangehr tohnleng men, oh e mahsenieng kumwa; ei, mie ansou me kumwa rongehr kepitien [Kauno]; oh e mahsanihong kumwa ni ngihl tikitik, ahpw kumwa sohte nsenohki, kahrehda kumwa sohte kak kehn sapwellime mahsen akan; eri, e ketin mahsaniong kumwa duwehte ngihl en nansapwe, me kahredahr sampah eh rerrer oh mwomwen me e pahn pwalpeseng.

Oh kumwail ese me sang ni manaman en sapwellime mahseno e kak kahrehda imwilahn sampah; mehlel, oh kumwail ese me sang sapwellime mahsen e kak ketin wiahieng wasa sapahrek kan en pahrekla, oh wasa pahrek kan en ohla. Eri, dahme kahrehda, kumwa kakeptakaila nan kapehdamwa kan?
Kilang, palingeniet okihlahr ahi lokolok pwehki kumwa, oh mohngiongiet medengki; I periki kumwa de lekidekla kohkohlahte. Kilang, I direkihla Ngehn en Koht, kahrehda paliwereiet sohla angih.

Oh met mwurin ei ndahiong irail soangen koasoai pwukat irail ahpw lingeringerda pahi, oh men keseiehlahng nan wasa loal nan kepin madau; oh ansou me irail kohdohng koliehdi I koasoai ong irail, nda: Ni mwaren Koht Wasa Lapalap, I ndahiong kumwail en dehr doahkeie, pwe I direkihla manaman en Koht, me kipehdi paliwereiet; oh mehmen me pahn doahkeie e pahn mengila duwehte ahlek pwoat me mengilahr; oh e pahn mwamwahlla mwohn manaman en Koht, pwe Koht pahn ketin kaloke.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ndahiong irail me irail ren dehr kaulime arail pahpao; oh re en dehr peikasaliki ar pahn sewese ie, pwe Koht me poahngoakihiengie I en wiahda sohp pwoat.
Oh I ndahiong irail: Ma Koht mahsanihongie I en wia soahng koaros, I kak wia. Ma e pahn mahsanihongie I en ndahiong pihlet, en wiepwella, e pahn wiepwella; oh ma I pahn nda, e pahn wiawi.
Oh met, ma Kauno sapwellimaniki soangen manamano, oh ketin wiahiongehr aramas akan manaman kopwuriamwei tohto, ia mwomwen e sohte pahn kak ketin kaweid ie, pwe I en kak wiahda sohp?

Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw koasoaiahieng riei ohl oko soahng toht, kahrehda arail pwonla oh sohla kak akamaiong ie; irail pil sohte kak koliehdi de doahkehkinie sendinpehrail kan, erein rahn ekei. Irail sohte men wia pwe irail en dehr mengidi pwehki manaman kehlail en Ngehn en Koht; oh e ketin ieiang ie.

Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihongie: Kapahwei pehmwen rehn riomw ohl akan, a irail sohte pahn mengidi, ahpw I pahn kamedekihrahla, Kauno mahsanih, oh met I pahn wia, pwe irail en ese me ngehi iei Kauno ara Koht.
Kedekedeo ngehi eri kapahla pehiet rehn riei ohl oko oh ira sohte mengidi mwohi; ahpw Kauno ketin itik ira, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e mahsaniher.

Oh met, ira nda: Se esehier me Kauno ketin ieianguhk, pwe se ese me manaman en Kauno me itingkitada. Oh ira pwupwidi mwohi, oh pahn pwongih ie, ahpw I sohte mweidehng ira oh I ndahiong ira: Ngehi riamwail pwutak, iei, riamwail me keieu tikitik; eri, pwongih Kauno amwa Koht, oh kahkahki semomw oh inomw, pwe kumwa en kak mour werei pohn sahpw me Kauno amwa Koht pahn ketikihong kumwa.

chapters.name: Iralaud 18
summary: Sohpo nekier—Ipwidi en Seikop oh Sosep sansaladahr—Pwihno mweselahng nan sahpw en inouo—Nein Ismael pwutak ko oh arail pwoud kan alehda peren en sampah oh kahngohdi—Nihpai eri selidi, oh kisinieng kehlail ehu eri kapwurehla sohpo—Nihpai saledekla, oh sang ni ah kapakap kisiniengo ahpw meleileidi—Aramas oko eri lella nan sahpw en inouo. Ele Sounpar 591–589 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo irail ahpw pwongiala Kauno, oh patehngie wenla mwowe; oh kiht ahpw koadoahke tuhke oh wiahda doadoahk me kapwuriamwei kaselel. Oh ekei ansou Kauno ketin kasalehiongie duwen ei pahn doadoahngki tuhke ko oh wiahkihda sohpo.

Met ngehi, Nihpai, sohte doadoahngki tuhke ko ni wiepe me semen kan wehwehki, de ni wiepe me aramas kin wiahda sohp; ahpw I wiahda ni wiepe me Kauno ketin kasalehiongie; eri, e sohte wiawi ni wiepe me aramas kin doadoahngki.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kin kalapw kohla pohn nahna, oh I kin kalapw kapakap ong Kauno; Kauno eri ketin kasalehiongie soahng kapwuriamwei tohto.

Kedekedeo mwurin ei kanekelahr sohpo, nin duwen mahsen en Kauno, riei pwutak ko eri kilangada me e uhdahn mwahu, oh me wiepen doadoahko me kaselel mehlel; eri, irail pil pwurehng karakarahkala mwohn Kauno.
Kedekedeo kepitien Kauno ahpw peido rehn ahi pahpao, me se en pwourda oh kodihla nan sohpo.

Kedekedeo mandahn rahno, mwurin aht kaunopadahr soahng koaros, wahn tuhke oh uduk tohto sang nan sapwtehno, oh lapalahn sukehn loangalap, oh soahngen mwenge kan me Kauno ketin mahsanihong kiht, se ahpw kohdihla nan sohpo, iangahki aht wisik kan oh werentuhke kan, oh soahng koaros me se wahda, nin duwen ahn emen emen sounpar; eri, se ahpw kohdihla nan sohpo, iangahki aht pwoud kan oh nait seri kan.
Oh met, ahi pahpao ahpw nainikihdahr pwutak riemen nan sapwtehno; me laudo adaniki Seikop oh me tikitiko andaniki Sosep.
Kedekedeo mwurin aht pwonte kohdihla nan sohpo, oh wahdahr dipwsou kan oh soahng kan me [Kauno] mahsanih ong kiht, se ahpw tepiada seiloak nan madau oh kisiniengo ahpw ipirkihtalahng sahpw en inouo.

Oh mwurin kisiniengo eh ipirkihtalahr erein rahn tohto, kilang, riei ko oh nein Ismael pwutak ko oh pil arail pwoud ko ahpw tepda pereperen mwahl, kahrehda ar tepda kahlek, oh koul, oh lokaia lemei, ei, lao irail manokehla soangen manaman da me kahkahluwa irail; iei, irail ahpw lemeila douluhl.

Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw salohkihda mehlel Kauno de ketin engiengda paht, oh kalokehkinkiht aht sapwung kan, oh e pahn kahrehiong aht kihrla nan kepin madau; eri, ngehi, Nihpai, tepda koasoai maledek ong irail; ahpw kilang irail lingeringerda pahi oh nda: Se sohte pahn mweidohng riat pwutak tikitiko en kaunkitada.

Kedekedeo Leiman oh Lemuel ahpw koliehdi oh pirehkiniehdi sahl kei, oh irail sarlemei ong ie; ahpw, Kauno sohte kapweiekiraildi pwe en kak ketin kasalehda sapwellime manaman, nin duwen sapwellime mahsen me e ketin mahsaniher me pid me suwed akan.
Kedekedeo mwurin arail salihiehdi ngehi eri solahr kak mwekid, kamposo, me Kauno ketin kaunopadahro, sohla doadoahk.

Eri, re sehsehla wasa re pahn kainenehlaie sohpo, eri melimel kehlail ehu ahpw wiawi, ei, kisinieng kehlail oh keper ehu, oh se peila mwuri pohn sehdo nan erein rahn siluh; oh irail tepda masepwehkada kowahlap pwe re de duhla nan sehdo; ahpw irail sohte sapwadiehda.
Oh kapahieu en rahno, me se peipeila mwurio, melimelo ahpw kehlaila mehlel.

Kedekedeo se ahpw kerenieng kihrdihla nan kepin madau. Oh mwurin aht peipeilahr mwuri pohnsedo nan erein rahn pahieu, riei pwutak ko tepida kilang me engieng en Koht mi pohra, oh ira uhdahn pahn mehla ma ira sohte pahn koluhkihla arail wiewia suwed kan; eri, ira kohdo rehi, oh lapwadadasang sahl oko ni kumwut en pehi kat, oh kilang pehi kat inenen mpwosada mehlel; oh tikelen nehi kat pil mpwosada mehlel, oh e inenen kamedek.
Ahpw, I kilenglahng ei Koht, oh I kepinga ih rahno pwon; oh I sohte kaulimahkihong Kauno ahi kahpwal akan.

Met ahi pahpao, Lihai, ndahieng ira soahng tohto, oh pil iangahki nein Ismael pwutak ko; ahpw, kilang, irail kamasakada aramas koaros me pahn koasoaiahiong irail duwen ngehi; oh ahi pahpa oh nohno pil mahlahr, oh lokolongkiher pahtou laud pwehki neira seri kan, ira luwetekihla, ei, lao ira pil wenikihdi pohn dewera peht oko.

Pwehki ara nsensuwed oh pahtou laud, oh wiewia suwed en riei pwutak ko, kahrehdahr ara kerenieng mehla oh tuhong ara Kohto; ei, ira moangepwetalahr oh nektehn mehla; ei, kereniong ira en nekinekidi nansedo pwehki ara pahtou.

Oh Seikop oh Sosep pil, wie pwulopwulte, anahne epwelpen ara nohno, ira pil pahtoula pwehki kahpwal akan en ara nohno; oh ahi pwoud pil wie sengiseng oh kapakap, oh pil nei seri ko, sohte kameleileidi mohngiong en riei pwutak ko pwe ira en sapwadiehla.

Oh manaman en Koht kelehpw, me kamasangkinirahda mehla, kahrehda ara mohngiong ko eh solahr kekeluwak; eri, ansou me ira kilangada me ira kereniengehr mwowihdi wasa loal nan madauo ira koluhkihla soahng suwed me ira wiadahro, ira eri sapwadiehda.

Kedekedeo mwurin arail sapwadiehdahro, kilang, I ale kompaso, oh e doadoahk nin duwen dahme I men en wia. Kedekedeo I ahpw kapakap ong Kauno; oh mwurin ahi kapakapiero kisiniengo tokedi, oh melimelo meleileidi, oh lapalahn eh mwelehdi.
Kedekedeo ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw katangahier sohpo, se ahpw pwurehng sereklahng ni sahpw en inouo.
Kedekedeo mwurin aht senserengkiher erein rahn tohto, se ahpw lella ni sahpw en inouo; oh se keradahla nansapwo, oh kauwada imwat impwal akan; oh kiht eri kahdanekihla wasao sahpw en inou.

Kedekedeo se ahpw tepda dei pwehl, oh padokedi werentuhke kan; mehlel, se padokedi werentuhke koaros me se wahdo sang nan sahpw en Serusalem. Kedekedeo re ahpw kekeirda mehlel; eri, se ahpw kapaikihda reken wahnsahpw.

Kedekedeo ni aht kohlongala nan sapwtehno nan sahpw en inouo, se ahpw diarada me mie soangsoangen mahn kei nanwel en sahpwo, mie kow ohl oh lih, oh ahs oh oahs, oh kuht oh kuht lawalo, oh soangsoangen mahn lawalo koaros, me aramas kak doadoahngki. Oh se ahpw diarada soangsoangen mete kan, kohl, oh silper, oh koaper.

chapters.name: Iralaud 19
summary: Nihpai wiahda pileit mete oh ntingihdi poadepen nah aramas akan—Koht en Israel pahn ketido sounpar wenepwiki mwurin Lihai eh mweselsang Serusalem—Nihpai kohpada duwen sapwellime lokolok oh kalohpwuala—Mehn Suhs akan pahn sekenikenla oh mwerpeseng lao lel ni imwin rahn akan, ansou me irail pahn pwurala rehn Kauno. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo Kauno eri mahsanihongie, eri I ahpw wiahda pileit mete pwe I en kak ntingihdi pohrail poadepen nei aramas akan. Oh I ntingihdi duwen poadoapoad en ahi pahpao pohn pileit akan me I wiahda, oh I pil ntingihdi pohwe duwen aht seiseiloakseli nan sapwtehno, oh kokohp kan en ahi pahpao; oh pil pein ahi kokohp tohto I pil ntingihdi pohwe.

Oh ansou me I wiahda [pileit ko] I sehse me Kauno pahn mahsanihongie I en wiahda pileit pwukat; eri, poadoapoad en ahi pahpao, oh pil irekidien peneinei en ah pahpa kahlap oko, oh pali laud en aht wiewia kan nan sapwtehno ntingdi pohn keieun pileit ko me I koasoaiadahr; eri, soahng ko me pwaradahr mwohn ei wiahda pileit pwukat iei, ni mehlel, ntingdier pohn keieun pileit ko.

Oh mwurin ei wiadahr pileit pwukat sang ni koasoandi, ngehi, Nihpai, alehdi kehkehlik ehu me doadoahk sarawi oh kokohp akan, me keieu kesempwal oh sansal, pahn anahne ntingdi pohn pileit pwukat; oh soahng kan me pahn ntingdi anahne nekinekla pwe ren wia mehn kaweid nei aramas akan, me uhdahn pahn sapwenikihla sahpwo, oh pil ong kahrepe kesempwal teikan, me Kauno kelehpw ketin mwahngi.

Eri, ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw ntingihdi pohn pileit teiko, me wia koasoaiepen, de pali laud en koasoaiepen mahwin kan, pingiping kan oh mwomwlahn nei aramas akan. Oh met I wiadahr, oh padahkihong nei aramas akan dahme irail uhdahn pahn wia mwurin ei pahn sohla mie rehrail; oh me pileit pwukat pahn kohieng ehu ehu dih en mwuhr akan, de sang rehn emen soukohp kolahng rehn emen, lao Kauno ketikihong irail ekei koasoandi tohrohr.

Oh koasoaipen ahi wiahda pileit pwukat pahn ntingdi mwuhr; oh met, kilang, I pahn doulahng nan dahme I koasoaiahier; oh met I pahn ntingihda pwe soahng kan me sarawi en kak nekinekla ong kamarainpen nei aramas akan.

Ahpw, soahng sarawi kei te me I ntihngihdi pohn pileit kan. Oh met, ma I sapwungala, e pil duwehte irail akan me kin sapwungala mahs; I sohte peikidiki ahi sapwung kan pwehki aramas teiko, ahpw pwehki pein ahi soakoahiek, nin duwen aramas, iei me I peikidiki.

Pwe soahng kan me ekei aramas kin kesempwaliki, ong paliwar oh palingehn, ekei sohte kin katapaniki oh re kin tiakpeseng. Mehlel, me duwehte aramas akan arail tiakidi Koht en Israel; I nda, tiakidi me wehwehki—re sohte katapaniki, oh sohte men rong sapwellime kaweid akan.
Oh kilang e pahn ketido, nin duwen mahsen en tohnlengo, sounpar wenepwiki mwurin ahi pahpao eh mweselsang Serusalem.

Oh, E pahn wiemwahlla rehn tohn sampah pwehki arail wiewia suwed kan; eri irail pahn kaloke ih, oh e pahn ketin lokolongki; oh irail pahn woakih ih, oh e pahn lokolongki. Mehlel, irail pahn kandipih ih, oh e pahn lokolongki, pwehki sapwellime limpoak kalahngan oh sapwellime kanengamah ong aramas akan.

Oh Koht, en atail pahpa kahlap oko, me kahluweirail sang Isip, sang nan kalidu, oh pil ketin kamakamaur irail nan sapwtehno, iei, Koht en Eipraam, oh Aisek, oh Koht en Seikop, me ketin mweidala pein ih, nin duwen me tohnlengo mahsanih, ni eh ketin wia aramas emen, nan pehn aramas suwed akan, nin duwen Sihnok eh mahsanih, oh pahn ketin kalohpwuhla, nin duwen kokohp en Nehum, oh pahn ketin nekinekidi nan sousou, nin duwen mahsen en Sihnos, me e koasoaia me pid duwen rahn siluh me pahn rotorot, me pahn wia kilel en sapwellime pwoulao ong irail akan me pahn towehda deke kan en nansed, ahpw mehlel ong irail akan me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel.

Pwe iei me soukohpo mahsanih: Kauno Koht uhdahn pahn ketila rehn peneinei en Israel koaros ni rahno, ekei irail pahn rong kepitie, pwehki arail pwung, ong komourparail oh arail peren laud, oh ekei pahn rong posopos en nahnsapwe oh kilang lioal en sapwellime manaman, sang ni melimel, kisiniei, oh ediniei, oh rotorot moasul, oh pwalpeseng en sampah, oh sang nahna kan me pahn ileilehda.

Oh soukohp Sinos mahsanih me soahng pwukat koaruhsie uhdahn pahn wiawi. Oh paip akan en sampah pahn pwalpeseng; oh pwehki mwahiei en sampah, nahnmwarki tohto pohn deke kan en nansed Ngehn en Koht pahn ketin sair irail, ren werikihda: Koht en sampah ketin wie lokolok.

Oh soukohpo mahsanih, irail akan me mihmi Serusalem pahn lokolok rehn aramas koaros, pwehki arail kalohpwuala Koht en Israel, oh wekidala arail mohngiong kan, soikala manaman oh kilel kopwuriamwei kan, oh manaman oh lingan en Koht en Israel.

Oh soukohpo mahsanih, pwehki arail wekidala arail mohngiong kan, oh kailongki Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail pahn wie saruaruseli, oh mwomwala, oh aramas pahn kepitikinirail oh kapailokeirail, oh wehi koaros pahn kailongkinirail.

Ahpw, soukohpo mahsanih, ni ansou me rahno pahn lelledo, me irail solahr pahn wekidala arail mohngiong kan sang Me Sarawi en Israel-o, e pahn ketin tamanda inou kan me e ketin wiahiongehr arail pahpa kahlap oko.
Ei, e pahn ketin tamanda sahpw deke kan; mehlel, Kauno mahsanih, e pahn ketikihpene aramas koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah, nin duwen mahsen en soukohp Sihnos.
Ei, soukohpo mahnsanih, sampah pwon pahn kilang komourlahn Kauno; wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros pahn kapaida.
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ntingihdier mepwukat ong nei aramas akan, pwe I en kak kamantikih irail ren tamataman Kauno arail Soundor.
Eri, I koasoaiongehr peneinei en Israel koaros, ma iei irail pahn alehdi soang pwukat.

Pwe kilang, palingeniet doadoahk laud, me kapwangaiehda kahrehda nan koakonei kat luwetala, pwehki irail akan me mihmi Serusalem; pwe ma sohte kalahngan en Kauno, me kasalehiongie duwen irail, duwehte eh ketin wiahiong soukohp en mahs oko, I pil pahn iang mehla.

Oh e ketin kasalehiong soukohp en mahs oko soahng koaros me pid irail; oh e pil ketin kasalehieng [soukohp] tohto duwen kitail; eri, e kesempwal kitail en ese duwen irail pwehki e ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko.

Kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, ahpw padahkihong riei pwutak ko soahng pwukat; kedekedeo ngehi wadek ong ira soahng tohto, me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko, pwe ira en kak ese duwen sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk nan sahpw teikan, rehn aramas en mahs oko.

Oh I wadek ong ira soahng tohto me ntingdier nan pwuhk kan en Moses; ahpw I en kak koangoange ira ni unsek ira en kamehlele Kauno ara Soundoar, I wadek ong ira nting kan me Soukohp Aiseia ntingiadahr; pwe I kin karasahiong kitail pwuhk sarawi koaros, pwe en kak wia kamwahupatail oh kamarainpatail.

Eri I koasoaieng ira, nda: Kumwail rong mahsen kan en soukohpo, kumwail me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel, ehu rah me tipwsangehr; kumwail rong mahsen kan en soukohpo, me ntingdier ong peneinei en Israel koruhsie, oh kumwail momourki, pwe kumwail en kak ahneki koapwoaroapwoar duwehte riamwail ko me kumwail tipwasangehr; pwe ih duwen koasoai me soukohpo ntingihdier.

chapters.name: Iralaud 20
summary: Kauno ketin kasalehiong Israel Sapwellime koasoandi kan—Israel pilipildahr nan kisiniei en lokolok oh en kohkohlahsang Papilon—Tehk Aiseia 48. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kumwail rong met, kadaudok en Seikop, me kin adaniki Israel, oh me kohsang nan pihl en Suda, de sang nan pihl en pepdais, me kahukihla ni mwaren Kauno, oh kosekose Koht en Israel, ahpw irail sohte kin kahukihla mehlel de pwung.
Ahpw, irail kin koasoaia me irail iei towe mehlel en kahnimw sarawio, ahpw irail sohte kin koapworopworki Koht en Israel, me iei Kauno Wasa Lapalap; me mware iei Kauno Wasa Lapalap.
Kilang, I kalohkidahr dahme pahn wiawi sangete ni tapio; oh e kepwilipwilwei sang nan douwaseiet, oh I kasaleiraildahr. I mwadangete kasalehda.
Oh I wia met pwehki I ese me ke keptakai, oh tepinweremwen kekeluwak rasehng mete, oh tomwemwen rasehng pirahs.

Oh I kadehdedahr sang nin tapio dahme pahn lelohnguhk; mwohn eh leledo I kasalehienguhkehr; oh I kasalehienguhk pwe ken dehr koasoaia—Ahi dikadik en eni me wia, oh ahi sansal likamw, oh dikadik eni mete me elehda mepwukat eh pweida.
Ke kilangehr oh rongehr mepwukat koaruhsie; oh ke sohte pahn dehdehki? Oh me I kasalehienguhkehr soahng kapw akan me pahn wiawi, de pil soahng rir kan, oh ke sohte ese duwen soahng pwukat.
Re ahpwtehn sansalada ansouet, oh kaidehn e sangete ni tapio, de pil mwohn rahno me ke saik rong duwen met, pwe ken dehr nda—Kilang I esehier duwen mepwukat.
Ei, oh ke sohte rong duwen met; ei, ke, sohte wehwehki; ei, sang ansouo sohte rohng ehu lelohnguhk; pwe I ese me sohte me kak likihiuk, oh ke wia aramas kahngohdi men sangete ni omw ipwidio.
Ahpw, pwe [aramas] en kepinga mwarei kahrehda ei kolokol ei engieng, oh I pahn kolokol oh sohte kaweiukala.
Pwe, kilang, I kamwakeleiukadahr, I piluhkadahr nan kisiniei en lokolok.
Ong pein kamwahupei, iei, ong pein kamwahupei I pahn wia met, pwe I sohte pahn mweidohng mwarei en sohla wahuwi, oh I sohte pahn mweidohng emen en iang ahneki lingan me ahi kelehpw.
Rong ie, kowe Seikop, oh Israel me I malipedohr, pwe ngehi iei ih; Ngehi me tapi, oh ngehi me pil imwi.
Nin limei kat me pil wiadahr poahsoan en sampah, oh palimaun en pehi kat me sohngedi pahnlahng. I malipe sampah oh lahng oh ira eri patpene uhda.

Kumwail koaruhsie, pokonpene, oh rong; ihs nanpwungarail me kalohkihengirailehr soahng pwukat? Kauno ketin poakehng ih; ei, oh e pahn ketin kapwaiada sapwellime mahsen me e ketin kasalehdahr sang rehrail; oh e pahn ketin wiahiong Papilon dahme e ketin kupwurki, oh e pahn ketin kaloke mehn Kaldea kan.
Kauno pil mahsanih; Ngehi Kauno, ei, I mahsanihier; ei, I malipehdo pwe en kalohk, I kahluhwa, oh e pein dipwirawihda en pweida.
Keido limwahi; I sohte kin mahsen rir; sangete nin tapio, ngehi me mahsen sangete ansou me e kalohkdao; oh Kauno Koht, oh sapwellime Ngehno, me ketin kadariehdo.
Oh Kauno, amwail Soundoar, me Sarawien Israel mahsanih; Kauno amwail Koht me ketin padahkihonguhk ken keirda, me ketin kaweiduhk nan ahl me ke pahn keidie, iei ngehi me wiahier met.
Ma ke peikieng ahi kosonned akan—ahmw popohl pahn rasehng pillap pwoat, oh ahmw pwung pahn rasehng ilok kan en nan madau.
Kadaudokomw kan pahn tohto rasehng pihk [en ni oaroahr]; noumw seri kan rasehng rahr [en ni oaroahr]; edeo sohte pahn manoknokla de mwomwla mwohi.
Kumwail kohkohweisang nan Papilon, kumwail tangasang mehn Kaldea kan, kumwail kalohki ni amwail kokoulseli nin sampah; kumwail ndinda: Kauno ketin doarehlahr sapwellime ladu Seikop.
Oh irail sohte men nimpilda; e ketin kahluwa irail nan sapwtehno; e ketin kupwurehda pihl en kusieisang nan paip ehu ong irail; e pil ketin pwalangpeseng paipo oh pihl kusieisang loale.
Oh mehndahte eh ketin wiahdahr mepwukat koaros, oh pil soahng kapwuriamwei teikan, Kauno mahsanih, me suwed akan sohte pahn ahneki popohl.

chapters.name: Iralaud 21
summary: Masaiao pahn ketin wia kamarainpen Mehn Liki kan oh pahn ketin kasaledakala irail kan me sensel nan imweteng—Ni imwin rahn akan Israel pahn kapwurupwurkipene manaman—Nahnmwarki kan pahn apwalih irail duwehte arail pahpa—Tehk Aiseia 49. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met: Kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, rong ie, kumwail koaruhsie me lekideklahr oh pakasaralahr pwehki wiewia suwed en kaun kan en nei aramas akan; iei, kumwail koaruhsie me lekideklahr, me kamweremwerpesengehr wasateikan, me wia nei aramas, kumwail peneinei en Israel. Kumwail me kin koukousoan ni deke kan oh wasa doh kan, kumwail rong ie; Kauno ketin piliedahr mwohn ei ipwidi; E ketin malipehkinie edeiet ni ahi nohno eh liseiankinie.
Oh e ketin wiahda eweiet duwehla kedilahs keng pwoat; nan mwetehn ni limeo e ketin nekidiehla, oh wiakiniehla arep kaselel pwoat; nan sapwellime deupen arep e ketin nekidiehla;
Oh mahsanihong ie: Israel, kowe me nei ladu me I pahn linganikihda.
I ahpw patohwan, I wie doadoahkehr ni soh katepe, I wia uwen ei kak oh sohte lipwe oh sohte katepe; mehlel, Kauno me pahn ketin pahkiniehda, oh ahi doadoahk rehn Koht.

O met, Kauno—me ketin piliehda nan kapehd en inei me I en wiahla sapwellime ladu, pwe I en kapwurehdo Seikop reh—tehn Israel sohte pahn pwurpene, ahpw I pahn kelinganla mwohn silangin Kauno, oh ei Koht pahn ketin wia kakehlepei.

Oh e ketin mahsanih: Mehkot mengei ehu me kowe nei ladu me pahn kasapwilada kadaudok en Seikop akan, oh kapwurehdo mehn Israel kan me luwehdi. I pil pahn wiahkinuhkala kamarainpen Mehn Liki kan, pwe ken kak wia komourpei wasa koaros ni sampah.

Kauno, Soundoar en Israel, me Sarawio, me aramas kin mwamwahliki, me wehi kan kin kailongki, [ketin mahsanih] ong ladu en kaun akan: Nahnmwarki kan pahn mahsanihukada oh ketida, sohpeidi kan pahn pil pwongihuk, pwehki Kauno me ketin loalopwoat.

Eri Kauno ketin mahsanih: Kumwail deke kan en nansehd, I kin rong kumwail oh ni rahn en komour eh pahn leledo I pahn seweseikumwail; oh I pahn doareikumwailla, oh kiheng kumwail nei ladu en wiahda inou ehu ong aramas akan, pwe kumwail en pwurehng soandi nan sapwamwail me ansouet olahr;

Pwe ken kak patohwanohng irail me sensel kan: Kumwail saledekla; irail kan me mihmi nan rotorot: Kumwail kohdo nan marain. Irail pahn mwengemwengeseli, oh arail mohs akan pahn mihla wasa kan me ileile.
Re sohte pahn duhpekla de men nimpilda, karakar en ketipin pil sohte pahn kamadakirailla; pwe ih me kin ketin poakohngirail pahn ketin kaluhwairallahng ni pwarer en pihl kan.
Oh I pahn wiahkihla ahi nahna kan koaruhsie ahl lap pwoat, oh elei kan pahn lapalapala.
Kilang, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, mepwukat pahn kohdo sang wasa doh kan; oh re pahn kohdo sang paliepeng oh palikapi; oh re pahn kohdo sang nan sahpw en Sinim.

Kumwail [tohn] nanleng kan, kumwail koul; oh sampah, kumwail perenda; pwe patenehn irail akan me mih palimese pahn pwurehng pwurodo; oh nahna kan, kumwail tepda kokoul; pwe re sohlahr pahn kalokolok; pwe Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahwiala sapwellime aramas akan, oh pahn ketin kupwurkalahngan ong sapwellime kan me wie lokolok.
Ahpw, kilang, Saion koasoaiahier: Kauno ketin keseielahr, oh ahi Kauno ketin likidmelieielahr—ahpw [Kauno] pahn ketin kasalehda me e sohte ketin wia met.
Pwe lih emen kak moanokehla nah seri pwelel me kin dihdi, me e sohte pahn poakpoake wahn edio? Ei, re kak manokehla, ahpw I sohte pahn manokeikumwailla, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan.
Kilang, I ntingihkumwaildier nan pei kat; amwail kehl akan wie mihmihte mwohi ansou koaros.
Noumwail seri kan pahn powehdi amwail imwintihti kan; oh irail akan me kamwomwkumwaillahr pahn pokousla.

Sarada oh kilang dahme wiewiawi; irail koaruhsie pokonpenehr, oh irail pahn kohdo rehmw. Oh nin duwen Ngehi, Kauno ketin mahsanih, ke pahn kapwatkihda likou kaselel, oh katengehdi duwehte lih kamwohd emen eh kin kapwatikihda.
Pwe sapwemwet olahr oh tehnlahr, oh sahpwemw ohlao, pahn koaitilahr ong kumwail koaros en kousoanlaie; oh irail akan me kamwomwkumwaillahr pahn lekidekila dohlahsangkumwail.
Mwurin tepin noumw [seri] eh mehla, seri kan me ke pahn nainekihda, pahn pwurehng ndahienguhk: Sahpwet nohn tikitik ong ie; kitail anahne sahpw laud me kitail en kousoanie.

Kowe eri pahn mengimengiloalki: Ihs me kaipwiedi ong ie [seri] pwukat, pwe I solahr neitik, oh I depwenlahr, sella liki, oh sansaruwaruseli? Oh ihs me apwalihada [seri] pwukat? Kilang, I kin wie kalakalapwukte; irail pwukat, ia wasa re kohsangie?
Kauno Koht eri mahsanih: Kilang, I pahn kapahla limeiet rehn Mehn Liki kan, oh ketikihong irail ahi koasoandi; oh irail pahn wahdo noumw pwutak kan, oh noumw serepein kan pahn mi pohn pwopwerail ko.

Oh nanmwarki kan pahn apwalihiuk duwehte pahpa men, oh lih nanmwarki kan pahn katungoaleiuk duwehte nohno men; irail pahn kin poaridi mwohmw, oh kamwakelehsang pwehl ni patehn nehmw kan; oh ke ahpw pahn dehdehkihla me ngehi me Kauno; pwe irail akan me kin koapworopworkinie, sohte pahn sarohdi.
Pwe mie me kak adiasang [aramas] kehlail men dipwisou ehu me e koledi, de kapitala kalapwuhs men me kolkoldi pahn kosonned?

Ahpw Kauno ketin mahsanih, me kalapwuhs kan pahn pehdsang rehn me kehlail kan, oh dipwisou me alahldi pahn kapwurupuwrsang rehn me lemei meno; pwe I pahn uhwong oh pelianda irail akan me pahn uwohng uhk, oh I pahn kapitala noumw seri kan.

Oh irail akan me kin kalokeikumwail I pahn kamwengehkin irail pein udukarail; irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntahrail duwehte ar pahn nim wain mem; oh aramas koaros eri ahpw pahn dehdehkihla me iei ngehi Kauno, amwail Sounkomour oh amwail Soundoar, me ketin wia Wasa Lapalap en Seikop.

chapters.name: Iralaud 22
summary: Israel pahn mwarahkpeseng wasa koaros nan sampah—Mehn Liki kan pahn apwalieki oh sewesehki Israel rongamwahuo nan imwin rahn akan—Israel pahn kopwurupwurpene oh komourla, oh me suwed kan pahn isihsla duwehte dihpw meng—Wein tepelo pahn kamwomwomwala, oh Sedan pahn selidi. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met e wiawiher me mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei wadekehr soahng kan me ntingdier pohn pileit pirahs ko, riei ohl oko ahpw kohdo rehi oh kalelapak rehi: Ia wehwehn soahng pwukat me ke wadekehr? Kilang, re pahn kak wehwehki duwen soahng kan me pid palingehn, me pahn wiawi nin duwen palingehn oh kaidehn ni paliwar?
Oh ngehi, Nihpai, ndahieng ira: Kilang ire pwukat kasansalohngehr soukohpo sang kepitien Ngehno; pwe sang rehn Ngehno me soahng koaros me kin kodohng aramas kin kasansalohng soukohp kan.
Eri, soahng kan me I wadekehr pid duwen koaros mour en sampah oh mour en palingehn; pwe e sansal me ansou keren peneinei en Israel kan pahn mwarahkpeseng wasa koaros ni sampah oh nan wehi kan koaros.

Oh kilang, mie aramas tohto me mehn Serusalem ko sehselahr. Ei, pali laud en kadaudok en Israel ko pakahrlahr; oh irail mwarahkpesengehr pohn sahpw deke kan; oh kitail sohte ese wasa me re mihmi ie, ihte me kitail ese me irail pakahrlahr.

Oh pwehki arail pakahrlahr, soahng pwukat kokohpdahr me pid duwen irail, oh pil duwen irail koaros me pahn kohdo mwuhr pahn kamweremwerpeseng oh salongala, pwehki Me Sarawi en Israelo; pwe mongiongirail kan pahn keptakaila oh uhongada ih; eri, irail pahn kamweremwerpeseng nan wehi kan oh aramas koaruhsie pahn kailongkinirail.

Ahpw, mwurin Mehn Liki kan arail pahn apwalih irail, oh Kauno ketin kapahlahr limeo pohn Mehn Liki kan oh wiahda sapwellime koasoandio, oh irail wahda [nein mehn Israel] seri kan, oh irail pwekadahr oh wa [nein mehn Israel] serepein kan pohn pwopwerail kan, kilang soahng pwukat wia mehkot me pid sampah. Ih duwen inou sarawi kan me Kauno ketin wiahiongehr atail pahpa kahlap oko; oh e wehwehki kitail nan rahn kohkohdo kan, oh pil riatail koaros me wia kisehn peneinei en Israel.

Oh e wehwehki me ansouo pahn leledo me mwurin peneinei en Israel kan koaros arail pahn kamweremwerpesengehr oh salongalahr, Kauno Koht pahn ketin wiahda wehi kehlail ehu rehn Mehn Liki kan, iei, e pahn wiawihda pohn sahpwet; oh irail pahn kamwarakpeseng kadaudoketail kan.

Oh mwurin kadaudoketail kan arail pahn kamweremwerpesengehr, Kauno Koht pahn ketin usehlahte oh wia doadoahk kapwuriamwei rehn Mehn Liki kan, me pahn kesempwalong kadaudoketail kan; eri, met rasehng Mehn Liki kan arail apwahpwali irail oh weuwairail nan pehrail oh pohn pwopwerail kan.

Oh met pil pahn kesempwal ong Mehn Liki kan; oh kaidehn Mehn Liki kan te ahpw ong peneinei en Israel kan koaros, me pahn kasalehda inou kan me Sahm nanleng ketin wiahiengehr Eipraam, me mahsanih: I pahn kapaiahkihda aramas en sampah koaros kadaudokemw.
Oh riei ko, I men kumwa en ese me keinek kan koaros en sampah sohte kak kapaida lao [Kauno] pahn ketin kasalehieng wehi kan wiepen nin limeo.
Eri, Kauno Koht uhdahn pahn ketin kasalehiong wehi koaros wiepen nin lime kan, ni eh pahn ketikiheng peneinei en Israel kan sapwellime inou kan oh rongamwahuo.

Eri, e pahn kapitirailla sang selidi, oh irail pahn pwurehng pwurpene nan sahpw en sohso; oh irail pahn kohsang nan kepikirot oh rotorot; oh irail pahn ese me Kauno iei arail Sounkomour oh arail Soundoar, Koht manaman en Israelo.

Oh ntahn mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, me iei lih suwed en sampah pwono, pahn uhwongada pein irail; pwe irail pahn mahwinpene nanpwungarail, oh pein neirail kedilahs kan pahn kemeirailla, oh irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntarail.

Oh wehi koaros me pahn mahwinieng kumwail, peneinei en Israel, pahn moromorada nanpwungarail, oh irail pahn pwupwidiong nan pwoahr me irail weiradao pwe ren lidipieki sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan. Oh irail koaruhsie me pahn peieng Saion pahn kamwomwala, oh lih suwed lapo, me kapirakialahr sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi pwung kan, me iei, mwomwohdiso ndand oh suwedo, pahn rengkpeseng oh lapalahn pwupwidi pahn wiawi.

Pwe kilang, soukohpo mahsanih, ansou pahn lelledo mwadang me Sehdan pahn sohte ahneki manaman nan mongiong en aramas akan; pwe rahno pahn lelledo me koaros me pohnmwahso oh irail akan me kin wiewia suwed pahn duwehla tuhke me sohte wah; oh rahno pahn lelledo me irail pahn isihsla.
Pwe ansouo pahn mwadang leledo me sapwellimen Koht engieng unsek pahn mwerediong pohn aramas koaros; pwe e sohte pahn ketin mweidehng me suwed akan en kamwomwala me pwung kan.

Eri, e pahn ketin doarehkihla me pwung kan sapwellime manaman, ma iei mie anahnepen sapwellime engieng unsek pahn wiawi, oh me pwung kan pahn poadoandoarla, arail imwintihtih kan pahn kamwomwkihla kisiniei. Eri, me pwung kan en dehr masak; pwe iei me soukoupo mahsanih, irail pahn komourla, ma iei irail pahn komourkihla kisiniei e pahn wiawi.

Kilang, riei ohl oko, I ndahiong kumwa, me soahng pwukat pahn mwadang wiawi mwurin ansou kis; ei, kamaramas pahn wiawi, oh kisiniei, oh ediniei moron pahn mie; oh e pahn kipehdi sampah; oh e pahn sansal ong aramas ma re pahn kakeptakaiala ar mohngiong kan ong Me Sarawi en Israelo.
Pwe kilang, me pwung kan sohte pahn kamwomwomwla; pwe ansouo pahn leledo me irail me kin peieng Saion pahn kalipilipala.

Oh Kauno pahn ketin kaunopadahng sapwellime aramas akan ahlo, pwe mahsen en Moseso en kak pweida, me ketihtihki: Kauno amwail Koht pahn ketikihong kumwail soukohp men, me duweiehte; kumwail pahn rong soahng koaros me e pahn padahkihong kumwail. Oh e pahn wiawi ma mehmen sohte pahn rong soukohp menet pahn kalipilipasang nan pwungen aramas akan.
Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, kalohkihong kumwail, me soukohp menet me Moses mahsaniher iei ih me Sarawi en Israelo; eri, e pahn ketin wia kopwung ni kadeik pwung.
Oh me pwung kan sohte anahne masak, pwe irail me sohte pahn namenekla. Ahpw wehin sehdano, me pahn wiawihda nan pwungen aramas akan, iei wehio me kokouda ong irail me mih nan pali uduk—

Pwe ansou pahn mwadang leledo me mwomwohdiso koaros me wiawihda pwe re en kepwepwehla, oh koaros me wiawihda pwe re en ahneki manaman pohn aramas, oh irail akan me wiawihda pwe re en ndandla mwohn sampah, oh irail me kin rapahkihte ineng en paliwararail oh dipwisou en sampah, oh kin wiewia soangoasoangen wiewia suwed kan; iei, ni mehlel, irail koaros me iang wehin tepelo me uhdahn pahn masapwekada, oh saloh, oh rerrer; irail me pahn lekidekdi nan pwelpar; iei irail me pahn isihsla duwehla dihpw meng; oh met iei duwen mahsen en soukohpo.

Oh ansou pahn mwadang leledo me aramas pwung kan pahn kahluhla sang nan kehl duwehte koupwul kan, oh me Sarawi en Israelo pahn ketin kaunda sang ni mweimwei en kaun, oh kehl, oh manman, oh lingan mehlel.

Oh e pahn ketin kapokonepene sapwellime seri kan sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah; oh e pahn ketin wadekedi sapwellime sihpw kan, oh irail pahn ese ih; oh e pahn mie ehute pelen sihpw oh emente silepe; oh e pahn ketin kamwenge sapwellime sihp kan, oh irail pahn kin diar kenerail mwenge reh.

Oh pwehki wiewia mwahu en sapwellime aramas akan, Sehdan pahn sohla ahneki manaman; eri, e sohte pahn lapwada erein sounpar kei; pwe e sohte pahn ahneki manaman en kaunda mohngiong en aramas akan, pwe irail pahn momourki mour pwung, oh me Sarawi en Israelo pahn ketin kakaun irail.
Oh met kilang, ngehi, Nihpai, ndahiong kumwail me soahng pwukat koaruhsie pahn wiawi nin duwen paliuduk.
Ahpw, kilang, wehi koaros, keinek koaros, lokaia koaros, oh aramas koaros pahn padoandoarla rehn me Sarawi en Israelo ma irail pahn koluhla.
Oh met ngehi, Nihpai, kairalahr ahi koasoi; pwe I sohte pahn doula koasoakoasoia duwen mepwukat.
Eri, riei ko, I men kumwa en kamehlele me soahng koaros me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs ko mehlel; oh re kadehdehki me aramas anahne peikieng kosonned akan en Koht.

Eri, kumwail dehr medewe me ngehi oh ahi pahpao kelehpw me kadehdehki mepwukat, oh pil padahkihong kumwa. Eri, ma kumwa pahn peikieng kosonned akan, oh dadaurete lel imwi, kumwa pahn komourla ni imwin rahn akan. Oh met mehlel. Amen.

summary: Duwen Lehi oh ah werek Sariah, oh nah pwutak pahmen, oh iet adarail kan, (tepsang me laud) Leimen, Lemuel, Sam, oh Nihpai. Kauno kapariki Lihai en kohkohlahsang nan sahpw en Serusalem, pwehki e kohpada suwed en aramas ako oh irail song en kawehla ah mour. E wahda ah peneinei oh seiseiloangki rahn siluh nan sapwtehno. Nihpai kahrehda rie pwutak kau oh pwurala nan sahpw en Serusalem pwe ren ale poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan. Duwen arail lokolok kan. Irail pwoudkihda nein Isimael serepein kan. Irail wahda arail peneinei kan oh kohkohla nan sapwtehno. Arail lokolok kan oh kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno. Ahl me irail seiseiloak loalle. Irail lella ni sehdo. Rien Nihpai pwutak kau akupwungieng. E katokeirahdi, oh wiahda sohp pwoat. Irail kahdaniki wasahu Paundipul [de Sapwen Rahk]. Irail kotehla sehdo oh kolahng nan sahpw en inouo, oh pil soahng teikan. Met iei duwen ahn Nihpai nting; me wehweki ngehi, Nihpai, me ntingihdi poadoapoad wet.

chapters.name: Iralaud 1
summary: Lihai kohpada duwen sahpw en saledek—Kadaudoke kan pahn kamweremwerpeseng oh kamakam ma irail soikala me Sarawien Israelo—E koangoangehki nah pwutak ko irail en pwuhrieng nan tehtehn mahwen en pwung. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kedekedeo mwurin ngehi, Nihpai, ei kaimwiseklahr ahi padahk ong riei ohl oko. Aht pahpao, Lihai, pil koasoaiahieng irail soahng tohto, oh padahkiheng irail, uwen soahng tohto me Kauno ketin kupwurmwahuieki irail ni e ketin kaluhwairail sang nan sahpw en Serusalem.
Oh e padahkiheng ira duwen arail kahngohdi nansedo, oh sapwellimen Koht kalahngan me doarehla arail mour, kahrehda arail sohte mwowihdi nansedo.
Oh e padahkihong irail duwen sahpw en inouo, me irail sapwenkihla—ia uwen kalahngan en Kauno ni eh ketin kehkehlingkihong kiht sen mweselsang nan sahpw en Serusalem.
Pwe, kilang, e koasoaia, I kilangadahr kaudiahl ehu, me kahrehda I esehier me Serusalem kamwomwomwlahr; oh ma kitail mihmihte nan Serusalem kitail uhdahn pahn pil mehla.

Ahpw, e koasoaia, mendahte atail kahpwal akan, kitail sapwenkihlahr sahpw en inou ehu, sahpw ehu me wia sahpw kaselel sang sahpw teikan; sahpw ehu me Kauno Koht ketin inoukihong ie me e pahn wia ehu sahpw en sohso ong kadaudokei kan. Ei, Kauno ketin inoukihong ie sahpw wet, oh ong nei seri kan kohkohlahte, oh pil koaros me Kauno pahn ketin kahluwahdo sang nan wehi teikan.
Eri, ngehi, Lihai, kohpadahr nin duwen Ngehno eh kin ketin doadoahk loaleiet, me sohte me pahn kohdo nan sahpw wet ihte ma limen Kauno me ketikiniraildo.

Eri, sahpwet kasarawihongehr irail akan me e pahn ketikihdo. Oh ma irail pahn papah nin duwen kosonned akan me ketkihong irail, sahpwet pahn wia sahpw en saledek ong irail; eri, irail sohte pahn kin lohdi; ma ehng, a pwehki arail dihp me kahrehda; pwe ma diparail akan pahn mie a sahpwet pahn keriahla pwehki irail, ahpw ong me pwung de mwahu kan e pahn wia sahpw kapai kohkohlahte.
Oh kilang, e mwahu ma sahpwet pahn wie ekiek pwe wehi teikan en dehr ese; pwe kilang, wehi tohto pahn sahpwenikihla sahpwet, me pahn kak kahrehda sohla wasahn sohso.

Eri, ngehi, Lihai aledier inou ehu, ma aramas akan me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihdo sang nan sahpw Serusalem pahn kolokol sapwellime kosonned akan, irail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh re pahn tohrohrasang wehi teikan koaruhsie, pwe irail en kak sapwaniki sahpw wet. Oh ma re pahn peikiong sapwellime kosonned akan irail pahn kapaida pohn sahpw wet, oh sohte me pahn kak tiahksuwedihrail, de kihsang sapwarail sahpw en sohsohu; oh irail pahn koukousoan ni onekpek kohkohlahte.

Ahpw kilang, ansouo pahn leledo me irail pahn pwupwikihdi ar sohte pwoson, mwurin arail alehier kapai laud tohto sang ni limen Kauno—[irail] marainkidahr duwen kepikipikdahn sampah, oh aramas koaros, esehlahr sapwellimen Kauno doadoahk kesempwal oh kapwuriamwei kan sangete ni tapio; manaman kohiengirailehr pwe ren wia mehkoaros sang ni pwoson; re ese kosonned akan koaros sangete ni tapio, oh sang ni sapwellime kalahngan poatoapoat ong nan sahpw en inou kesempwal wet—kilang, I nda, ma rahno pahn lelodo me irail pahn soikala Me Sarawi en Israelo, Mesaia mehlelo, arail Soundoar oh arail Koht, kilang, irail pahn pakadeikada rehn sounkopwung pwungo.
Ei, e pahn wahdo ekei wehi kan rehrail, oh e pahn kiheng irail manaman, oh e pahn kihsang irail sahpw oko oh sapwenikihla, oh e pahn kamarakirailpeseng oh kalokeirail.
Ei, mahwin pahn wiwiawi mwurin ehu ehu dih kan, oh kilel tohto pahn pwarohng irail; eri, nei pwutak ko, I men kumwail en tamataman; mehlel, I men kumwail en rong mwahu ahi kaweid kan.

Kumwail menlao pwourda; pwourdahsang amwail meirkelik, ei, sang nan amwail memeir nan ehl, oh itikasang selmete kan me salihkumwailpenehr, me wia selmete kan me kin saliedi aramas akan, me kin waikiraildilahng nan wahu en lokolok soutik oh pahtou poatoapoat.

Pwourda! oh kesihnenda sang nan pwehl, oh rong kaweid en amwa pahpa oh nohno me likeilapalahr, me kumwa pahn kereniongehr saripidi nan sousou me kopou oh meleilei, wasa me sohte aramas en seiloak kak pwurasang; mwurinte ansou kis I pahn pwuralahng nan pwehl.
Ahpw kilang, Kauno ketin doareiehsangehr nan ehl; I kilangehr sapwellime lingan, oh sapwellime limpoak kipeiedier kohkohlahte.
Oh I koapworopworki me kumwa pahn tamataman oh kolokol sapwellimen Kauno koasoandi kan oh kosonned akan; kilang, met kapwunode nan ahi mour sangete ni tapio.

Ekei pak mohngiongiet kin toutoukihla nsensuwed, pwe I periki, engieng en Kauno amwa Koht de kohdi pohmwa ni unsek pwehki keptakai en amwa mohngiong kan, kumwa eri pahn lekidekla oh kasohrala kohkohlahte;

De, keria ehu uhdahn pahn kohieng kumwa nan erein dihen aramas ngeder; oh kumwail pahn kin mahwin, oh lelohng nan lehk laud, oh aramas pahn kailokinkumwail, oh tepelo pahn kin sansalih oh kakahluwa kumwail ni nsene.

Nei pwutak ko, ele soahng pwukat sohte kak wiawihong kumwail, ahpw kumwail en wia aramas pilipil oh keniken rehn Kauno. Ahpw kilang, kupwure pahn pweida; pwehki sapwellime koasoandi kan kin pwung kohkohlahte.

Oh e mahsaniher me: Nin duwen amwail pahn kin kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; ahpw ma kumwail sohte pahn kin kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekidekla sang mwohn sihlangi.

Oh met palingeni en kak perenikinkumwa, oh ahi mongiong en kak mweselsang sampah ni peren pwehki kumwa, pwe I en dehr seridi nan ahi sousou ni nsensuwed oh pahtou, kesihnendahsang nan pwehl, nei pwutak ko, oh wiahla ohl, oh nantihong ahneki lamalam ehu oh mohngiong ehu, ehupene ni mehkoaros, pwe kumwail en dehr wiahla lidu;
Pwe kumwa en dehr riahkihla keriah kamedek ehu; oh pil, kumwa de kahrehda engieng en Koht pwungo eh pahn kamwomwkumwahla, iei, kamwomwalahn palingehn oh paliwar.
Pwourda, nei pwutak kan; pwuhriong nan tehtehn mahwin en pwuhng. Itikasang selmete kan me salihkumwaildier, oh pidohisang nan mour likamw, oh kesihnendahsang nan pwehl.

Kumwa tokedihsang amwa kahngohdi ong riamwa pwutak, me kin lamalam mwahu, oh kin peikiong kosonned kan sangete ansouo me kitail mweselsang Serusalem; oh me wia dipwisou en doadoahk ni limen Koht, pwe en waikitaildohng nan sahpw en inou; pwe ma sohte ih, kitail mekilahr dupek nan sahpwtehno; ahpw, kumwa song kihsang ah mour; ei, oh e lokolok laud pwehki kumwa.

Oh I salohda kowahlap oh perikihda pwehki kumwa, pwe e de pwurehng lokolok; pwe kilang, kumwa kin karaun likamwih me e kin song en ahneki manaman pohmwa oh kaunkumwahda; ahpw I ese me e sohte kin song en ahneki manaman pohmwa oh kaunkumwahda, ahpw e kin rapahki lingan en Koht, oh kamwahupamwa kohkohlahte.

Oh kumwa kin lingeringer pwehki e kin koasoi inen ong kumwa. Kumwa kin nda me e kin ngihl kehlail ong kumwa; kumwa kin nda me e lingeringer pahmwa; ahpw kilang, ngihl kehlailo me iei kehlail en manaman en mahsen en Koht, me kin ieiang ih; oh dahme kumwa kahdaneki lingeringer wia koasoi mehlel, nin duwen dahme kohsang rehn Koht, me e sohte kak ekihla, me kin kasalehda ni eimah amwa wiewia suwed kan.

Oh e konehng manaman en Kohto en ieiang ih, iei ni ansou me e pahn ruwese kumwa en peikiong. Ahpw kilang, kaidehn ih [me ruweseikumwa, ahpw Ngehn en Kauno mwo me kin ketin ieiang ih, me kin ketin kasarapeseng ewe oh ketin kalokaia karehda e sohte kak nennenla.

Oh met nei pwutak, Leimen, oh pil Lemuel oh Sam, oh pil nei pwutak kan me wia nein Ishmael, kilang, ma kumwail pahn rong mwahu ahn Nihpai kaweid kan kumwail sohte pahn mwomwala. Oh ma kumwail pahn rong ih mwahu I pahn kihong kumwail kapai, iei, keieu en ahi kapai.
Ahpw ma kumwail sohte pahn rong ih mwahu I pahn kihsang kumwail keieu en ahi kapaio, iei, ahi kapaio, oh e pahn uhd kohieng ih.

Oh met, Sohram, I men padahkihong uhk: Kilang, ke wia nein Leipen ladu; ahpw, ke pil iang pakahriei sang nan sahpw en Serusalem, oh I ese me ke wia kempoakepah mehlel men ong nei pwutak, Nephi, kohkohlahte.

Eri, pwehki ahmw loalopwoat, kadaudokemw kan pahn kapaida rehn kadaudoke kan, irail pahn paiamwahu ansou reirei pohn sahpwet; oh sohte mehkot pahn kawehla de kerempwa arail paiamwahu pohn sahpwet kohkohlahte ihte wiewia suwed nan pwungarail me pahn kahrehda.
Eri, ma ke pahn peikiong kosonned akan en Kauno, Kauno pahn kasarawiala sahpwet pwe en wia kapaipen kadaudokemw kan iangahki kadaudoken nei pwutako.

chapters.name: Iralaud 2
summary: Komourla kin wiawi sang rehn Mesaia Sarawio—Saledek en pilipil (nsenen aramas) kesempwalong mour oh keirda—Adam pwupwidi pwe aramas en kak miehla—Aramas ahneki saledek en pilada mour soutuk oh maiauda. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met, Seikop, I pahn koasoai ong uhk: Nan rahn en ahi kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno kowe me tepin ipwidi. Oh kilang, ke lokolongki apwal akan oh pahtou laud ni omw pwulopwul, pwehki lemei en riomw pwutak kan.
Ahpw, Seikop, nei seri me tepin ipwidi nan sapwtehno, ke wehwehkiher duwen lapalap en Koht; oh e pahn kasarawihla ahmw lokolok kan ong ni kamwahupemw.

Eri, ke pahn kapaikihda, oh ke pahn iang poadoandoarla rehn riomw pwutak, Nihpai; oh erein ahmw ansou ke pahn kin papah ahmw Koht. Eri, I ese me ke pahn komourlahr, pwehki pwung en ahmw Soundoaro; pwe ke kilangehr me ni unseklahn ahnsou e pahn ketido pwe en ketikihong aramas komourparail.

Oh ni ahmw pwulopwul ke kilangehr sapwellime lingan; eri, meid pai kowe duwehte irail akan me e pahn ketin pwarohng oh papah ni paliwar; pwe Ngehno kin duduwehte, aio, rahnwet, oh kohkohlahte. Oh ahlo kaunopdahr sangete pwupwudi en aramas, oh komourla mweimweidahr.

Oh aramas akan aledier kaweid me itarong irail en kak ese me mwahu sang me suwed. Oh kosonnedo kohiengehr aramas akan. Oh sang ni kosonnedo sohte war ehu me pwung; de, sang ni kosonnedo aramas akan kalipilipalahr. Ei, sang ni kosonned en sampah irail kalipilipalahr; oh pil, sang ni kosonned en palingehn irail irairdisang me mwahuo, oh pahn paisuwed kohkohlahte.
Eri, Mesaia Sarawio me kin ketin komourala aramas; pwehki e mediren kalahngan oh mehlel.

Kilahng, e meirongkihla pein ih pwehki dihp, pwe en kak kapwaiada kaimwseklahn kosonnedo, ong irail akan me pahn ahneki mohngiong karakarahk oh ngehn peik; oh ihte me kak kapwaiada kaimwseklahn kosonnedo.

Eri, ia uwen kesempwalpen soahng pwukat en kak sansalohng aramas koaros nan sampah, pwe irail en kak ese me sohte aramas emen kak pato mwohn silangin Koht, ihte sang ni wiewia pwung kan, oh mahk, oh kalahngan en Mesaia Sarawio, me ketin tohnmeteikihla pein ih nin duwen mehlahn paliwar, oh pwurehng iasada sang ni manaman en Ngehno, pwe en kak ketin kaiasada me melahr akan, pwe ih me tepin iasada.
Eri, ih me ketin wia tepin meirong ong Koht, nin duwen eh pahn ketin wia weliepen aramas koaruhsie; oh irail koaros me pahn pwosonla ih pahn komourla.

Oh pwehki poadoandoarlao ong koaros, aramas koaros pahn kohdo rehn Koht; eri, irail pahn kesihnen mwohn silangi, pwe ren pakadeikda reh nin duwen mehlel oh sarawi me e sapwellimanki. Eri, pwehki pweidahn imwilahn kosonnedo me [Ih] me Sarawio ketikidahr, kahrehda kalokoloko me wia kisehn kosonnedo, kalokoloko me wia kisehn kosonnedo kin pelian pereno me pil wia kisehn kosonnedo, [oh pereno] me kin kapwaiada imwilahn tomwo.

Pwe e konehng en mie pelien soahng koaros. Ma soh, nei pwutak me tepin ipwidi nan sapwtehno, mour pwung sohte kak mie, pil duwehte mour suwed, pil duwehte mour sarawi de paisuwed, duwehte mwahu oh sakanakan. Eri, soahng koaros kin anahne patpene oh wiahla ehu; eri, ma [e pahn] wartehieu, e duwehte me e mehla, me sohte mour de pil sohte mehla, sohte kasuwedpe de pil kamwahupe, sohte kaperenpe de paisuwedpe, de pil wehwehpe de sawehwehpe.

Eri, e pahn wiawihda ni eh wia mehkot me mwahl; eri e pahn sohte kahrepen eh kepikipikda. Eri, met pahn kawehla erpit en Koht oh kahrepen sapwellime doadoahk poatopoat kan, oh pil manaman, oh kalahngan, oh pwuhng en Koht.

Oh ma ke pahn nda me sohte kosonned, ke pil pahn nda me sohte dihp. Ma ke pahn nda me sohte dihp, ke pahn pil nda me sohte pwung. Oh ma sohte pwung e pil pahn sohte peren. Oh ma sohte pwung de peren, eri pil pahn sohte kalokolok de nsensuwed. Oh ma sohte soahng pwukat, e pil pahn sohte Koht. Oh ma sohte Koht sohte kitail, oh pil sampah; pwe e sohte pahn mie kepikipikdahn soahng kan, de pil saledek en pein mwekid de mwekidiki mehkot; eri, soahng koaros sohte pahn mie.

Oh ansouet, nei pwutak kan, I padahkihong kumwail soahng pwukat pwe en wia kamarainpamwail oh kamwahupamwail; pwe mie Koht emen, oh e ketin kapikadahr soahng koaros, nanleng oh sampah, oh audapara koaros, soahng koaros me kin pein mwekid oh soahng koaros me kin kamwakidada.

Oh pwe en kak kapwaiada kaimwsekpen kahrepen sapwellime [doadoahk] poatoapoat kan ong aramas, mwurin eh ketin kapikada tepin samatail oh inatail, oh mahn en nan mohs oh menpihr kan, oh ni mehlel, soahng koaros me kepikipikda, e konehng en mie pelien mehkoaros; duwehte wahntuhke me keinepwio eh pelian tuhkehn komouro; me ehu mem a ehu katik.
Eri, Kauno Koht ketin mweidehng aramas en pein wia nsene. Eri, aramas sohte kak pein wia nsene ihte ma e pahn alehdi kasongosong sang emen de mehteio.

Oh ngehi, Lihai, nin duwen soahng koaros me I wadekehr, nin duwen dahme ntingdier, me mie tohnleng en Koht men, me pwupwudisang nanleng; eri, e wialahr tepel men, sang ni e wiahda me suwed mwohn silangin Koht.

Oh pwehki eh pwupwudihsang nanleng, oh nsensuwedla mehlel kohkohlahte, e kin songosongen kansensuwediala aramas koaros. Eri, serpent en kawaho, me iei tepelo, me wia pahpahn likamw koaros, ndahieng Ihp: Tungoale wahntuhke me sohte mweimweien, a ke sohte pahn mehla, ahpw ke pahn duwehla Koht, me mwahngih me mwahu oh me suwed.
Oh mwurin Adam oh Ihp ara tungoalehda wahntuhke me sohte mweimweio, ira ahpw pokouslahsang nan mwetuwel en Iden, pwe ira en koadoahke pwehlen sampah.
Oh ira nainekihda seri kei; mehlel, peneinei en sampah pwohn.

Oh ahn aramas ansou kareireila, nin duwen kupwur en Koht, pwe irail en kak koluhla ni arail momour; eri, arail ansou wialahr ansoun kasongosong, oh arail ansou kareireila, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno Koht kosonned akan me e ketikihongehr sapwellime aramas akan. Pwe e ketikidahr kosonned pwe aramas koaros en koluhla; pwe e ketin kasalehiengehr aramas koaros me irail salongalahr, pwehki sapwungalahn arail nohno oh pahpao.

Oh met, kilang, ma Adam sohte sapeik e sohte pahn pwupwudi, ahpw e pahn mihmihte nan mwetuwel en Iden. Oh soahng koaros me kepikipikda pahn duduwehte ni mwomwen ar kepikipikdao; oh re pahn duwehwehte kohkohlahte, oh sohte imwi.
Oh ira sohte pahn nainekihda seri; eri ira pahn mihmihte nan mour me mwakelekel, sohte ahniki peren, pwe ira sohte ese nsensuwed; sohte wiewia mwahu, pwe ira sohte ese dihp.
Ahpw kilang, soahng koaros wiawidahr nin duwen erpit en Ih me mwahngih soahng koaros.
Adam pwupwidi pwe aramas en kak miehda; oh aramas mie, pwe irail en kak peren.

Oh Mesaiao ketido ni unseklahn ansou, pwe en ketin doarehla aramas akan sang ni pwupwilao. Oh pwehki arail mwakelekeladahr oh pitisangehr pwupwilao irail saledeklahr kohkohlahte, esehlahr me mwahu sang me suwed; kakehr pein wia nsenerail oh sohte anahnepen mwekidiki nsenen emen, ihte sang ni kalokolok en kosonnedo me [pahn wiawi] ni keimwseklahn rahn lapalapo, nin duwen kosonned akan me Koht ketikidohr.

Eri, aramas akan ahneki saledek en momour; oh soahng koaros me aramas anahne kohiengirailehr. Oh irail ahneki saledek en pilada mour soutuk oh maiauda, sang Sounsawas lapalap en aramas koaros, de pilada mehla oh selidi, nin duwen selidi oh manaman en tepelo; pwe e kin nannantihong aramas koaros en nsensuwedla mehlel duwehte ih.

Oh met, nei pwutak kan, I men kumwail en kilenglahng Sounsawas lapalapo, oh rong mwahu sapwellime kosonned kesempwal akan; oh loaloapwoatieng sapwellime mahsen akan, oh pilada mour soutuk, nin duwen kupwur en sapwellime Ngehn Sarawio.
Oh dehr pilada mehla soutuk, nin duwen ineng en paliwar oh me suwed me kin ieiang, me kin kiheng ngehn en tepelo manaman en widing, pwe en waikuhkedihla nan ehl, pwe en kaunuhkada nan pein ah wehi.

I koasoaia kaweid mwotomwot pwukat ong kumwail koaruhsie, nei pwutak kan, nan imwilahn ahi mour; oh I pilada palien kaweid kesempwalo, nin duwen mahsen akan en soukohp. Oh sohte ehu soahng tohrohr me I mwahuki ihte kamwahupen palingenimwail kan kohkohlahte. Ahmen.

chapters.name: Iralaud 3
summary: Sosep nan Isip kilangada nan kaudial mehn Nihpai ko—E kohpada duwen Joseph Smith, ohl sarawi en imwin rahn; duwen Moses, me pahn kapitala Israel; oh duwen Pwuhk en Mormon eh pahn kohdo. Ele Sounpar 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met I pahn koasoaienguhk, Sosep, nei me keieu tikitik. Ke ipwidi nan ansou me diren kahpwal nan sapwtehno; ei, ahmw nohno naitikihiukedi nan ansou me I ahneki kapwal laud.

Oh Kauno en pil ketin kasarawihkinuhkala sahpw wet, me wia sahpw ehu me keieu kesempwal, ong kadaudokemw kan oh kadaudek en riomw pwutak kan en iang sohsohki, pwe ken nsenamwahuki kohkohlahte, ma ke pahn kin kapwaiada kosonned akan en Me Sarawi en Israelo.
Oh met, Sosep, nei pekindihdi, me tikada nan sapwtehn ahn ahi kahpwal akan, Kauno en kupwuramwahwihiuk kohkohlahte, pwe kadaudokomw kan en dehr kamwomwomwla douluhl.
Pwe kilang, ke wia kadaudokei; oh ngehi emen kadaudoken Sosep me wisikla nan Isip ni eh wia lidu. Oh inou kan me Kauno ketin wiahiongehr Sosep inenen kesempwal mehlel.

Eri, Sosep kilangehr mehlel atail mwehi. Oh e aledier ehu inou sang Kauno, me sang nan kadaudoke kan Kauno Koht pahn ketin kasapwilada ehu kadaudok pwung en Israel; kaidehn Mesaia, ahpw ehu kadaudok me katohrohrala, ahpw, ren tamatamante me nan sapwellimen Kauno inou kan Mesaia pahn pwarehng irail ni imwin rahn akan, sang ni manaman en ngehno, ni eh pahn wairailsang nan rotorot kolahng nan marain—mehlel, sang nan rotorot oh mour en lidu kolahng nan mour saledek.
Pwe Sosep kadehdehki mehlel, ketihtihki: Kauno ei Koht pahn ketin kasapwilada ohl sarawi men, me pahn ketin wia ohl sarawi kesempwal men ong kadaudokei kan.

Ei, Sosep ketihtihki ni mehlel: Ih met mahsen en Kauno ongie: Ohl sarawi pilipilda men I pahn kasapwilada sang nan kadaudokemw kan; oh e pahn kenikenla rehn kadaudokemw kan. Oh I pahn kehkehlingkiheng me e pahn wiahda doadoahk ehu ong kadaudokemw kan, rie ohl akan, me pahn katapan mehlel ong irail, mehlel pwe en sewese irail ren esehla inou kan me I wiahiengehr ahmw pahpa kahlap oko.
Oh I pahn kiheng kosonned ehu me e sohte pahn wia ehu doadoahk tohrohr, ihte doadoahk me I pahn kehkehlingkihong ih. Oh I pahn wiahieng en lapalapala mwohn meseiet; pwehki e pahn wia ahi doadoahk.
Oh e pahn lapalapala duwehte Moses, me I koasoaiahier me I pahn kasapwilada ong kumwail, pwe en kapitala nei aramas akan, kumwail peneinei en Israel kan.
Oh I pahn kasapwilada Moses pwe en kapitla nei aramas akan sang nan sahpw en Isip.

Ahpw I pahn kasapwilada ohl sarawi men sang nan kadaudokomw kan; oh I pahn kihong manaman en kalohki ahi mahsen ong kadaudokomw kan—Kauno pil mahsanih, oh kaidehn kalohkihte ahi mahsen, ahpw pil koangoangehkin irail ahi mahseno, me pahn kalohkehng irailehr.

Eri, kadaudokemw kan pahn nting; oh kadaudoken Suda kan pahn nting; oh soahng kan me kadaudokemw kan pahn ntingiedi, oh pil soahng kan me kadaudoken Suda kan pahn ntingihdi, pahn ehupene, ni ahr pahn kapwungala padahk likamw kan oh kameleileiedi pingiping kan, oh wiahda meleilei nanpwungen kadaudokemw kan, oh sewesei irail ren esehla duwen arail pahpa kahlap oko ni imwin rahn akan, oh pil ahi inou kan, Kauno me mahmahsen.
Oh e pahn kehlailla sang ni powehdi luwet, ni rahno me ahi doadoahk pahn tepda rehn nei aramas akan koaros, pwehn onehda sapahl, kumwail peneinei en Israel, Kauno me mahmahsen.

Oh iei met kokohp en Sosep, me ketihtihki: Kilang, Kauno pahn ketin kapaiada ohl sarawio; oh irail akan me pahn song kemehla pahn lohdi; pwe inou wet, me I aledier sang rehn Kauno, ong kadaudokei kan pahn pweida. Kilang, I ese mehlel duwen inou wet eh pahn pweida;
Oh edeo pahn duwehte edeiet; oh e pahn duwehte eden ah pahpao. Oh e pahn duweiehte; pwe dahme Kauno pahn ketikihdo sang ni limeo, sang ni manaman en Kauno pahn kamourala nei aramas akan.
Iei, ih met me Sosep kohpadahr: I kamehlele met, duwehte ei kamehlele inou en Moses; pwe Kauno me ketin mahsanihongie, I pahn kolokol kadaudokemw kan kohkohlahte.

Oh Kauno mahsanih: I pahn kasapwilada Moses; oh I pahn kiheng ah manaman nan sokon pwoat; oh I pahn kiheng ih ahi koasoandi en tenek ni nting. Ahpw I sohte pahn lapwahda lewe, pwe en kalapw lokolokaia, pwe I sohte pahn wiahieng en wiahla aramas kadek lokaia. Ahpw I pahn ntingieng ahi kosonned, sang ni pein sendinpehi; oh I pahn kihong emen uhneipwa.

Oh Kauno ahpw pil mahsanihongie: I pahn kasapwilada emen kadaudokemw kan; oh I pahn kiheng emen uhneipwa. Oh ngehi, kilang, I pahn kiheng en ntingihda nting kan en kadaudokemw kan, me pahn kohieng kadaudokemw kan; oh wiliepe uhneipwa en kadaudokemw kan pahn pakairki.

Oh mahsen kan me e pahn ntingiedi pahn iei mahsen kan en ahi erepit me I kesempwaliki pahn kalohk ong kadaudokemw kan. Oh e pahn duwehte kadaudokemw kan arail lukulukuwer sang nan pwelpar; pwe I ese arail pwoson.
Oh irail pahn lukuwer sang nan pwelpar; iei, mehlel ong riarail ohl akan, mendahte dih tohto melahr mwohrail. Oh e pahn wiawi me mwurin arail lukuwer pahn kohwei, nin duwen arail koasoai sansal kan.

Pwehki arail pwoson arail koasoai kan pahn peiwei sang nan eweiet ong riarail ohl akan me wia kisehn kadaudokemw; oh arail soakoahiek en koasoai kan I pahn kakehlakahla nan arail pwoson, ni arail pahn tamataman inou kan me I wiahiong arail pahpa kahlap oko.
Oh met, kilang, nei pwutak Sosep, iei duwen me ahi pahpa kahlap oko kohpadahr.
Eri, ke kapaidahr pwehki inou wet; pwe kadaudokemw kan en dehr kamwomwomwla, pwe irail pahn rong mahsen kan en pwuhko.

Oh mie emen me kehlail nanpwngarail pahn sansalada, me pahn wiahda doadoahk mwahu, ni koasoai oh ni wiewia, e pahn wiahla dipwisoun doadoahk ni limen Koht, ni pwoson kehlail, pwe en wiahda doadoahk kapwuriamwei kan, oh wia soahng kan me kesempwal mwohn silangin Koht, pwehn kapwaiada onohnsapahl en peneinei en Israel kan, oh kadaudoken riomw kan.

Oh met, meid pahi kowe, Sosep. Kilang, ke pwulopwul; eri rong mwahu kaweid en riomw pwutak, Nihpai, oh mahsen kan me I ndahieng uhk pahn pweiong uhk. Tamataman mahsen kan en ahmw pahpa me pahn nektehn mehla. Ahmen.

chapters.name: Iralaud 4
summary: Lihai kaweid oh kapaiada nah seri kan—E kapilsalehdala oh seridi—Nihpai kapinga kalahngan en Koht—Nihpai likih Kauno kohkohlahte. Nan Pwungen pahr 588–570 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met, Ngehi, Nihpai me koskoasoaia duwen kokohp akan me ahi pahpao koasoaiahier, duwen Sosep, me wisiklahngehr nan Isip.

Pwe kilang, e kohpada mehlel duwen kadaudoke kan. Kokohp malaulau me kesempwal sang dahme e ntingihdier. Oh e kohpada duwen kitail, oh neitail dih en mwuhr akan. Oh irail ntingdier nan pileit pirahs akan.

Eri, mwurin ahi pahpao eh kaimwsekala ah koskoasoaia duwen ahn Sosep kokohp akan, e ekerala nein Laman seri kan, nah pwutak kan oh nah serepein kan, oh patohwanohng irail: Kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, me wia nein nei mesenih seri kan, I men kumwail en rong ahi kaweid.

Pwe Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih: Nin duwen amwail pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan kumwail pahn pweida nan sahpwo; oh nin duwen amwail sohte pahn kapwaiada ahi kosonned akan kumwail pahn lekdeksang mwohn sihlahngi.

Ahpw kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, I sohte kak kohdihla nan ahi sousou lao I pahn kihong kumwail kapai. Pwe kilang, I ese me ma kumwail kaiahnda ni pwungin momour kumwail sohte pahn salongasang.
Eri, ma kumwail riahla, kilang, I kihong kumwail kapai, pwe amwail keriao en kohsang pohmwail oh mihla rehn amwail nohno oh pahpa kan.
Eri, pwehki ahi kapaio, Kauno Koht sohte pahn mweidehng kumwail en kamwomwomwla; eri, e pahn ketin mahk ong kumwail oh kadaudokemwail kan kohkohlahte.
Kedekedeo mwurin ahi pahpao eh kaimwsakalahr ah kaweid ong nein Laman pwutak kan oh serepein kan, e ahpw lukweriala reh nein Lemuel pwutak ko oh serepein ko.

Oh e patohwanohng irail, ketihtihki: Kilang, nei pwutak kan oh nei serepein kan, me wia nein nei keriemen en pwutak nah seri kan; kilang I kihong kumwail kapaiohte me I kihongehr nein Laman pwutak ko oh serepein ko; eri, kumwail sohte pahn uhdahn kamwomwomwla; ahpw ni imwilao kadaudokemwail kan pahn kapaida.
Kedekedeo ni ansou me ahi pahpao kaimwsakala eh kaweid ong irail, kilang, e uhd koasoaiehng nein Ismael nah pwutak ko, iei, oh tohn ihmweo koaros.

Oh mwurin eh kaimwsakalahr ah patohieng irail, e uhd patohwanohng Sam, ketihtihki: Meid pai kowe, oh kadaudokemw kan; pwe ke pahn sohsohki sahpwo duwehte riomw pwutak Nihpai. Oh kadaudokemw kan pahn kapatapatehng kadaudoke ko; oh ke pahn duwehte riomw pwutako, oh kadaudokemw kan pahn duwehte kadaudoke ko; oh ke pahn paiamwahu erein ahmw mour.

Kedekedeo mwurin ahi pahpa Lihai, eh koasoaiengehr tohn imweo koaros, nin duwen pepehm en ah mongiong oh Ngehn en Kauno me ketiket reh, e ahpw likeilapalahr. Kedekedeoh e kapilsalehdalahr, oh e ahpw seridi.
Kedekedeo mwurinte rahn kei me e kapilsalehdalao, Laman oh Lemuel oh nein Ismael pwutak ko ahpw lingeringerda pahi pwehki sapwellimen Kauno kaweid kan.

Pwe Ngehi, Nihpai, itoitehng I en kawehwehong irail duwen sapwellimen Kauno mahsen; eri I kawehwehongirailehr soang tohto, oh ahi pahpao pil koasoai ong irail mwohn eh kapilsalehdalao. Tohto dahme e ketihtihki ko ntingdi pohn nei pileit teiko; pwe pali laud en aht poadoapoad ntingdi pohn nei pileit teiko.

Oh pohn mehkan I ntingihdi soahng kan me pid palingeni, oh iren pwuhk sarawi tohtoh me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs kan. Pwehki palingeni kin perenki iren pwuhk sarawi kan, oh ahi mohngiong kin doandoanropwe ire kan, oh I ntingihdi pwe nei seri kan en kak esehla oh paieki.
Kilang, palingeni kin perenki soahng kan me sang rehn Kauno; oh ansou koaros I kin doandoaropwe nan ahi mohngiong mehkoaros me I kilangehr oh rongehr.

Ahpw, mendahte kalahngan en Kauno eh kin ketin kasalehongie sapwellime doadoahk kaselel oh kapwuriamwei kan, nan mohngiongiet kin weriweriki: Ngehi aramas paisuwed men! Ei, mohngiongiet pahtou pwehki paliwereiet; palingeni nsensuwed pwehki ahi sapwung kan.
Pwehki kasongosong kan oh dihp akan me kin mengei en kaluweteiehla eh kipeiehdier.
Oh ansou me I kin inangih peren, mongiongiet kin mwahiei pwehki dipei kan; ahpw, I ese ihs me I pahn kopworopworki.
Ei Koht me wia kakehlepei; ih me ketin kahluwaie sang nan ahi kahpwal akan nan sapwtehno; oh ketin doandoareie pohn sehd en nan madauo.
E ketin audehkinie sapwellime limpoak, lao e kipehdi paliwereiet.
E ketin kalowehdi ahi imwintihtih kan, karehieng arail masepwehkada.
Kilang, e ketin karongehier ahi pekipek nihrahn, oh e ketkihongiehier erepit nan ahi ouraman kan nihpwong.
Oh nihrahn I kin eimahki ahi kapakap mwohn silangi; iei, ngileiet kin leladahla powe; oh tohnleng kan ahpw kohdihdo oh seweseie.

Oh pohn pehnpihr kan en sapwellime Ngehno me e ketin wahkiniehdahla pohn nahna me uhdahn ileile kan. Oh meseikat kilangehr soahng kapwuriamwei kei, iei, me kapwuriamwei sang dahme aramas kak kilang; eri I keinepwdihsang I en ntingihraildi.

Eri maingko, ma I kilangehr soahng kapwuriamwei kan, ma Kauno ni eh ketdihdo oh ketkihdi pein ih rehn aramas akan oh kasalehongirail kupwurkalahngan, dahme ahi mohngiong pahn mwahieiki oh palingeni nsensuwedki, oh paliwereiet wiakaula, oh ahi kehlail luwetkihla, pwehki ahi kahpwal akan?
