Oh dahme I pahn lohdihki nan dihp, pwehki paliwereiet? Iei, dahme I pahn mweidehngki kasongosong kan, en wiahda dowen me suwedo nan ahi mohngiong pwehn kawehla ahi onopek oh kahpwalihala palingeniet? Dahme ahi imwintihtih kan pahn kahrehkihda ahi lingeringer?
Palingeni, pwourda! Dehier pwurehng luwetla nan dihp. Mohngiongi, perenda oh dehier wiahda dewen imwintihti en palingeniet.
Dehr pwurehng lingeringer pwehki ahi imwintihti kan. Dehr kaluwetehla ahi kehl pwehki ahi kahpwal akan.
Ahi mohngiong perenda oh lukwerlahng Kauno, oh patohwan: Maing ahi Kaun, I pahn kapinga komwi kohkohlahte; iei, palingeniet pahn pereperenkin komwi, maing Koht, komwi me wia ahi paipalap en komour.
Maing Kaun, komw kak ketin doarehla palingeniet? Komw kak ketin kapitiehsang ahi imwintihti kan? Komw kak ketin seweseie pwe I en kak masak sansal en dihp?

Ewen kehl en ehl en kin ritidi mwohi ansou koaros, pwehki mohngiongiet karakarahk oh ngehniet peik! Maing Kaun, komw dehr ketin ritingedihsangie ewen kehl en omwi pwung mwohi, pwe I en kak keid nan ahl en wahu karakarahk, pwe I en kak inenweite nan ahl patapat!

Maing Kaun, komw ketin kapelkiniepene sapwellimomwi likoun pwung! Maing Kaun, komw ketin kaunopada ahl me pahn kapitiehsang ahi imwintihtih kan! Komw ketin kainenehla wasa I pahn weidie! Komw dehr ketin mweidehng takai en dipekelekel mwohi—ahpw komw ketin kamwakelehda mwohi, oh dehr ketin kerempwahla ahi ahl, ahpw ahl en ahi imwintihti kan.

Maing Kaun, Komwi me I kin likih, oh I pahn likih komwi kohkohlahte. I sohte pahn likih kehl en aramas; pwe I ese me mehmen me kin likiala kehl en aramas e kin riahkihla. Iei, mehmen me kin likiala aramas de kehlkihla aramas e kin riahkihla.

Iei, I ese me mehmen me pahn peki, Koht pahn kupwur sapan oh ketkiheng ih. Iei, ei Koht pahn ketkihengie, ma I peki ni pwung; eri ngileiet pahn sansal ong komwi; iei, I pahn lukuwerwih komwi, ei Koht, me wia paipalap en ahi pwung. Kilang, ngileiet pahn peidahwei rehmwi kohkohlahte, ahi paipalap oh ei Koht poatoapoat. Ahmen

chapters.name: Iralaud 5
summary: Mehn Nihpai ko tohrohrsang mehn Laman ko, kolokol kosonned en Moses, oh kauada tehnpas sarawi—Pwehki mehn Laman ko arail soupwoson, irail pahn lekdeksang mwohn sihlang en Kauno, oh riahla, oh wiahla kalokepen mehn Nihpai kan. Nan Pwungen Pahr 588–559 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Kilang, Ngehi, Nihpai, likuweriongehr Kauno Koht, pwehki riei pwutak ko ara lingeringer.
Ahpw kilang, ara lingeringer pahi ahpw laudla, kahrehong ara song en kemeiehla.

Iei, ira kaulimahkinie, ketihtihki: Riata pwutak tikitiko kin leme me e pahn kaunkitailda; oh kahpwal laud kitail ahneki pwehki ih; eri, kitail kemehla, pwe kitail en dehr nohn lokolongki ah koasoi kan. Pwe kilang, kitail sohte pahn wiahki ih atail kaun; pwehki kitail me laud, kitail me ahneki pwuhng en kaunda aramas kat.
Met I sohte anahne ntingihdi pohn pileit pwukat koasoai en kaulim koaros me ira wiahiengie. Ahpw e itarete I en nda, me ira song en kemeiehla.
Kedekedeo Kauno ahpw kaperkinie, me I en kohkohlahsang irail oh sopohla nan sapwtehno, oh irail koaros me men iangie.

Eri, kedekedeo Ngehi, Nihpai, wahda ahi peneinei, oh iangahki Sohram oh ah peneinei, oh riei pwutak laud me adaniki Sam oh ah peneinei, oh riei pwutak tikitik riemen me adaniki Seikop oh Sosep, oh iangahki riei serepein kan, oh irail koaros me men iangie. Oh koaros me men iangie ko iei irail me kamehlele sapwellimen Koht kehkehlik kan oh kaudiahl kan; eri, irail peikiong ahi koasoai kan.
Oh se wahda imwat impwal kan oh soahng koaros me se kak wahda, oh seiloangki erein rahn tohto kei nan sapwtehno. Oh mwurin aht seiseiloangkiseli erein rahn tohto kei se kauwada imwat impwal akan.
Oh nei aramas akan pwungkihda me se pahn kiheng eden wasao Nihpai; eri, wasao adankihla Nihpai.
Oh irail koaros me iangiedohu kahdankinirailla aramas en Nihpai.
Oh se nantiheng kolokol sapwellimen Kauno kadeik pwung kan, oh koasoandi kan, oh kosonned akan ni mehkoaros, nin duwen kosonned en Moses.
Kauno eri ketin ieiang kiht; oh se ahpw tepda pweida kouwahlap; pwe se padokedi weren tuhke, oh se ahpw dolung wah tohto. Oh se tepda apwalihda polohn sihpw kan, oh kou kan, oh soangen mahn teikan.
Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, pil wahdo rekohd kan me ntingdier pohn pileit prahs kan; oh iangahki mpwei, de kompas, me kaunopdahr sang ni limen Kauno ong ahi pahpao, nin duwen dahme ntingdiero.
Kedekedeo se ahpw tepda pweida kouwahlap, oh kaparaparala nan sahpwo.

Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, ale nein Leipen kedlahso, oh ahpw wiahda kedlahs tohto me duwehte naho, pwe aramas me ansou wet kahdanikilahr mehn Laman kan de kohdo oh kemeikitala; pwe I esehier arail kailongkinie oh nei seri kan oh irail akan me wia nei aramas.
Oh I padahkiheng nei aramas akan irail en kauada ihmw akan, oh irail en koadoahke tuhke, oh airon, koper, prahs, sdihl, oh kohl, oh silper, oh mete kesempwal akan, me rekla wasao.

Oh ngehi, Nihpai, kauada tehnpas sarawi ieu; oh I kauada ni mwomwen tehnpas sarawi en Solomon ihte e sohte wiawihkihda kidelapen dipwsou pweilaud; pwe soangen dipwsou pweilaud ko sohte kak dierek nan sahpwet, eri, e sohte kak kokouda duwehte tehnpas sarawi en Solomono. Ahpw wiepen doadoahk en kauwadao rasehngete tehnpas en Solomono; oh koasoandi en doadoahko lingan kouwalahpie.
Kedekedeoh Ngehi, Nihpai, kaweidkiheng nei aramas akan ren kin pwersek, oh doadoahngki pehrail kan.
Kedekedeoh irail ahpw men I en wiahla arail nahnmwarki. Ahpw ngehi, Nihpai, sohte pwungki en mie nahnmwarki; ahpw, I kapwaieng irail nsenerail sang ni manman me I kolokol.

Oh kilang, mahsen en Kauno pweidahr rehn riei ko, nin duwen me e mahsanier, me I pahn wiahla ara kaun oh soun padahk. Eri, I wiaier ahr kaun oh soun padahk, nin duwen sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan, lao lel ansou me re song en kemeiehlao.

Eri, mahsen en Kauno pweidahr me e ketin mahsanihongie, ketihtihki: Ma irail sohte pahn rong ahmw kaweid kan, irail pahn lekidek sang mwohn sihlangin Kauno. Oh kilang, irail ahpw lekideksangehr mwohn sihlangi.

Oh e ketin keriakinirail keria ieu me inenen kalok, pwehki arail suwed. Pwe kilang arail mongiong kan keptakai ong ih, ihme kahrehda arail duwehla takai kekeluwak; eri, nin duwen arail pwetepwet, oh masamwahu oh lingan, Kauno me ketin kahrehda kilirail akan e tontonla pwe nei aramas akan en dehr men patehng irail.
Oh Kauno Koht mahsanih: I pahn kahrehda noumw aramas akan pahn kailongkinirail, ma irail sohte pahn kohluhkihla arail mour suwed akan.
Oh mehmen me pahn pwoudikihda emen kadaudokerail kan e pahn riahkihla; pwe re pahn alehdi soangen keriaohte. Oh e pweidahr pwehki Kauno me ketin mahsanih.
Oh pwehki keria me milahr pohrailo irail wialahr aramas pohnkahke kei, audaudki tiahk suwed oh widing, oh kin kohla nanwel rapahki mahn lawalo kan.

Oh Kauno Koht mahsanihongie: Irail pahn kin kaloke kadaudokemw kan, pwe kadaudokemw kan en kin tamatamanie; oh ma kadaudokemw kan pahn manokeiehla, oh sohte kapwaiada ahi mahsen kan, re pahn kalokeirail lao irail kamwomwomwla.
Kedekedeoh Ngehi, Nihpai, kasarawihla Seikop oh Sosep, pwe ira en wiahla samworou oh soun padahk ong nei aramas akan nan sahpwo.
Kedekedeoh se nsenamwahu nan aht mour.
Oh sounpar silihsek ahpw douer powe mwurin aht mweselsang Serusalem.
Oh Ngehi, Nihpai, ntintingih rekohd kan pohn nei pileit kan, me I wiahda, duwen nei aramas akan lelodo met.
Kedekedeoh Kauno Koht mahsanihongie: Wiahda ekei pileit; oh ke pahn ntingihdi soahng tohto powe me mwahu mwohn sihlangi, pwe en wia kamwahupen noumw aramas.
Eri, Ngehi, Nihpai, kohla oh wiahda pileit kan me I ntingihdier mepwukat powe pwe I en peikieng sapwellimen Kauno kosonned akan.
Oh I ntingihdier soang kan me Koht kupwur pereniki. Oh ma nei aramas akan perenki kupwur en Koht akan irail pahn perenki ahi nting kan me ntingdi pohn pileit kat.
Oh ma nei aramas akan inangih esehla duwen poadepen mehn mahs oko re anahne rapahki nan nei pileit teiko.
Oh I kak koasoaia me sounparehr pahisek douer powe, oh se mahweniongehr oh nanpwungsuwediong riat ko.

chapters.name: Iralaud 6
summary: Seikop soiahda poadoapoad en mehn Suhs akan: Arail lohdi pahn mehn Papilon kan oh kopwurupwurla; doadoahk oh kalohpwualahn Me Sarawi en Israel; sawas me mehn liki kan sewesehkin irail; oh kopwurupwurdohn mehn Suhs akan ni imwin rahn akan ma irail pahn kamehlele Mesahiao. Nan pwungen pahr 559–545 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Mahsen en Seikop, rien Nihpai, me e kaweidkihong aramas en Nihpai kan:

Kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, Ngehi, Seikop, Koht ketin malipeie, oh kasarawielahr ni wiepen sapwellime koasoandi sarawio, oh kamanamanla sang rieio, Nihpai, me kumwail kin wiahki amwail nahnmwarki de silepemwail, oh me kumwail kin koapwoaroapwoarki en wia doarepemwail, pwe kilang kumwail ese me I kaweidkinkumwailehr soangen kaweid tohtoh kouwalahpie.

Ahpw, I pwurehng kaweid kumwail; pwe kamwahupen palingenimwail akan me I nsenohki. Iei, I inenen pwunodkin kumwail; oh kumwail esehier met. Pwe I kin ngoangki panawi kumwail; oh I padahkihong kumwail mahsen en ahi pahpao; oh I padahkiheng kumwail duwen soahng kan koaros me ntingdier, sangete ni kepikipikdahn sampah.

Oh met, kilang, I pahn kaweidkin kumwail duwen soahng koaros me wiewiawi met, oh me pahn wiawi mwuhr; eri, I pahn wadekehng kumwail mahsen en Aiseia. Oh mahsen pwukat me riei pwutako mwahuki I en kaweidkin kumwail, pwe en wia kamwaupemwail, pwe kumwail en kak esehla oh kawauwieki mwaren Koht.

Oh met, mahsen me I pahn wadekada kan iei mahsen kan me Aiseia ketihtihki duwen peneinei en Israel kan; eri, kumwail en karasahiong pein kumwail, pwe kumwail wia kisehn peneinei en Israel. Oh soahng tohto me Aiseia ketihtihkier me kumwail me kumwail kak karasahiong pein kumwail, pwe kumwail iei peneinei en Israel.

Oh Iet mahsen oko: Kauno Koht mahsanih: Kilang, I pahn kapahwei limeiet pohn wein mehn liki kan, pwehn kasalehda ahi koasoandi sansal kan ong aramas akan; oh irail ahpw pahn kol pehn noumwail pwutak kan oh kahreirail, oh pahn wa noumwail serepein kan pohn pwopwerail akan.

Oh nahnmwarki kan pahn kin apwalih kumwail duwehte pahpa kan, oh lih nahnmwarki kan pahn kin apwalih kumwail duwehte nohno kan; irail pahn poaridi mwohmmwail, oh kamwakelehsang pwelipar en patehn nehmmwail kan; oh kumwail pahn dehdeki me ngehi me Kauno; pwe mehmen me kasikasikie sohte pahn namenekla.
Oh met Ngehi, Seikop, pahn kawehwehda duwen mahsen kat. Pwe kilang, Kauno ketin kasalehongie irail ko me mehn Papilon ko kemelahr oh salihdier, me mih Serusalem, iei, wasa me se kohsangie.

Ahpw, Kauno ketin kasalehongie me irail pahn pwurehng pwurodo. Oh e pil ketin kasalehongie me Kauno Koht, Me Sarawi en Israelo, pahn ketin pwaredohng irail ni paliwar; oh mwurin eh pahn pwaredohng irail, irail pahn kaloke oh kalohpwuala ih, nin duwen dahme tohnlengo padahkihongie.
Oh mwurin arail pahn kasalehong Me Sarawi en Isrealo arail keptakai oh pohnmwahso, kilang, e pahn ketin kadeik irailda. Rahno pahn kohdo me irail pahn lokolok oh ahneki kahpwal.

Eri, mwurin arail pahn pekousla, tohnlengo mahsanih, tohto irail pahn lokolongki, ahpw sohte pahn mehkihla, pwehki ahn me loaloapwoat kan arail kapakap akan; irail pahn mwerpeseng, oh kamakam, oh kailok; ahpw, Kauno pahn ketin mahkohng irail, ma irail pahn kamehlele arail Sounkomouro, irail pahn pwurehng pwurpene nan sapwerail sahpw akan me re sohsohki.

Oh meid pahi mehn Liki Kan, me soukohpo ntingihdier duwe; pwe kilang, ma re pahn koluhla oh sohte mahwiniong Saion, oh dehr iangala mwomwohdiso lahlahwe lapo, irail pahn komourla; pwe Kauno Koht pahn ketin kapwaiala sapwellime inouo me e ketin inoukihongehr sapwellime seri kan; oh kahrepe wet me soukohpo ntingiekihdi mepwukat.

Eri, irail me pahn mahwiniong Saion oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas en inouo pahn kamwakelehsang pwelipar en patehn nehnrail akan; oh sapwellimen Kauno aramas akan sohte pahn namenekla. Pwe aramas me kin kasikasik Kauno iei irail sapwellime; pwe irail me kin kaskasikte ketdohn Mesaiao.

Oh kilang, nin duwen mahsen en soukohpo, Mesaiao pahn ketdo keriau pwehn ketin kapwurepene sapwellime aramas akan; eri, e pahn ketin pwarehng irail ni manaman oh lingan kouwahlap, oh kamwomwala arail imwintihti kan, eri ni ansou me rahno pahn lelodo irail ahpw pahn kamehlehla; oh e sohte pahn kamwomwala irail akan me kamehlele.

Oh irail me sohte kamehlele pahn kamwomwomwla, nan kisiniei, oh melimel, oh rerrer en sahpw, oh kakerehdi nta, oh soumwahu, oh lehk. Oh irail ahpw pahn dehdehki me Kauno Koht, iei Me Sarawi en Israel.
Dipwisou kan pahn kapwurupwursang me lapalap, de me sensel kan pahn lapwada?

Kauno me Mahmahsen: Irail akan me sensel pahn me lapalap akan pahn saledekla, oh dipwisou lohdi kan me aramas lemei kalowehdi pahn kopwurupwursang; pwe Koht Wasa Lapalahpie pahn kapitala sapwellime aramas en inouo. Kauno me Mahmahsen: I pahn pelian irail akan me pahn pelian kumwail—

Oh irail me kin kalokeikumwail, I pahn kamwengehkin irail pein udukerail; oh irail pahn sakaukihla pein ntahrail rasehng wain me iou; oh koaros pahn dehdehki me Ngehi Kauno iei ahmwail Sounkomour oh Soundoar, Wasa Lapalahpie en Seikop.

chapters.name: Iralaud 7
summary: Seikop peusehla wadewadek sang nan Aiseia: Aiseia karasaraski mesaiao—Mesaiao pahn sapwellimaniki koaiek en koasoakoasoi—E pahn ketin sohpeisang soun kamakam akan—E sohte pahn likamwada—Karasahiong Aiseia 50.
verses: Ei, Kauno mahsanih: ia duwe, I kadarkumwailahr, de I keseikumwailahr douluhl? Iei met Kauno mahsanih: Ia nein amwail nohno kisinlikoun kamweid? Ihs me I mweidkumwailahng, de ihs me I pweipwandeng me I netkinkumwailahng? Ei, ihs me I netkinkumwailehng? Kilang, pwehki dipemwail akan me kumwail pein netkinkumwailla, oh pwehki amwail sapwung kan amwail nohno mweisang.

Eri, ahnsou me I kohdo, sohte aramas; ahnsou me I lukuwer, mehlel, sohte me sapeng. Kumwail peneinei en Israel kan, ia duwe, limei kat sohte kak lellewei rehmwail pwe en doareikumwailla, de I sohte ahneki manman en kapitkumwaila? Kilang, I kak kamadahkihda nan madau ahi mahsen, I kawekala pilap akan ong sapwtehn oh arail mwahmw akan matala pwehki pihl akan ar madada, oh irail mehkihla arail men nimpil.
I kin karotongehla pahnlahng, oh I kin perehkihla likoun nsensuwed.

Kauno Koht ketkihongie ewen aramas semen, pwe I en kak ese ia mwomwen ahi pahn koasoai ong kumwail, Peneinei en Israel kan. Ni ahnsou me kumwail kin luwet e kin pangipaninginie I en sangkenei. E kin ketin panginiehda pwe I en rong duwehte me semen men.
Kauno Koht ketin ritingadahr salengeiet, oh I sohte kahngohdiong, de pil sohpeisang.
I mweideng irail en wokih pohnseweie, oh sohte irehdi ar lahlaweie. I sohte kin ruksang ar kandipih meseie oh kanamenekihe.
Ar lahlaweie sohte pahn kamedekeiehla, pwe Kauno Koht pahn soweseie. Eri I pahn kanangamahiong duwehte takai kehlail ehu, pwe I ese me I sohte pahn namenekla.
Oh Kauno ketin karanih ie, oh e kin ketin doareiehla. Ihs me pahn pelian ie? Mweidehng sen kesihnen pene. Ihs me kin wiahiong ie kahpwal? Mweidehng en keido, pwe I pahn kemehki ahi koasoai kehlail.
Pwe Kauno Koht pahn ketin sowese ie. Oh irail koaros me pahn uhwong ie, kilang, irail koaros pahn sohrala duwehte likou me kul kan pahn kangala.
Ihs rehmwail me kin wauneki Kauno, me kin peikiong mahsen en sapwellime ladu, me kin kekeid nan rotorot oh sohte marain?

Kilang kumwail koaros me kin sounda kisiniei, me kin kapikapil kin kumwail dimwamwahi kan, kekeid nan pein amwail marain en kisiniei oh nan dimwamwahi kan me kumwail pein parada. Met kumwail pahn alehsang ie—kumwail pahn mehla nan amwail nsensuwed.

chapters.name: Iralaud 8
summary: Seikop usehla wadawadek sang nan Aiseia: Ni imwin rahn akan, Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahuih Saion oh kapwurehdo Israel—Me aleier kamaiauparail pahn kohdo Saion ni peren laud—Karasapene Aiseia 51 oh 52:1–2. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Rong ie mwahu, kumwail akan me kin wiewia me pwung. Kilenglahng paipalap me kumwail paldihsang ieo, oh nan pwoahr me kumwail weiweidahsang ieo.
Kilenglahng amwail pahpa kahlap Eipram oh Sara me kaipwihkumwaildi; pwe I malipehda ih kelehpw oh kapaiada.

Pwe Kauno pahn ketin koaloalamwahuih Saion, ong koaros me kousoan nan mohn ihmw kan; oh e pahn ketin wekidala sapwtehno en duwehla Ihden, oh e pahn duwehla sapwellimen Kauno mwetuwelo. Peren oh nsenamwahu pahn mie wasao, kaping kalahngan oh ngihlen koul en kaping.
Kumwail rong ie, nei aramas akan; oh rong ahi mahsen kan, Kumwail tohn ahi wehi; pwe I pahn kadarewei kosonned ehu, oh I pahn wiahiong ahi koasoandi en wia kamarainpen aramas akan.
Ahi pwung me keren; I kadarewehr komour, oh limei kat pahn kadeik aramas akan. Deke kan pahn awiawih ie, oh irail pahn kin koapwoaroapwoarki limei kat.

Kilengdagla nanleng, oh kilengdihla pohn sampah; pwe nanleng pahn sohrasang duwehte ediniei, oh sampah pahn meringla duwehte likou mering; oh irail kan me kin mihmi loale pahn mehla pil duwehte. Ahpw ahi komour pahn kohkohlahte, oh ahi pwung sohte pahn sohrala.

Kumwail rong ie, kumwail akan me kin mour pwung, aramas akan me I ntingihdier ei kosonned akan nan ar mohngiong kan, kumwail dehr masak ma aramas kasarowei kumwail, de pil masak arail wiewia suwediong kumwail.
Pwe loangenmwet kan pahn kangirailla duweht likou ehu, oh mwahs pahn kangirailla duwehte ar kin kang winen sihpw. Ahpw ahi pwung pahn kohkohlahte, oh ahi komour pahn sang ehu dih lel ehu dih.
Maing Kaun, komw ketin opala wasa! Ketikihda sapwellimomwi manaman; Duwehte mahso. Kaidehn komwi me ketin doakoapeseng Rahap, oh kawehla drakono?
Kaidehn komwi me ketin kamadahda sehd loallo; me ketin wiahda ahl ong irail me komw ketin doarehla kau pwe irail en keidloale?

Eri, irail akan me Kauno ketin kamaiaudahr pahn pwurodo oh wie kokoul kohdo nan Saion; oh re pahn peren poatopoat oh wiahla aramas sarawi kei; oh re pahn alehdi nsenamwahu oh peren; pahtou oh nsensuwed pahn sohrala.
Ngehi iei Ih me ketin koaloalamwahwih kumwailo. Kilang, ihs kumwail me kumwail pahn masangki aramas, me uhdahn pahn mehla, me wia nein aramas, me uhdahn pahn duwehla dihpw?

Oh [kumwail] moanokehla Kauno me ketin wiaikumwailda, me ketin sohngedier nanleng, oh koasoanedier poahsoan kan en sampah, oh [kumwail] usehlahte masepwehk rahn koaros, pwehki [amwail masak] lingeringer mwuledek en imwintihtio, me mwomwen me e onopadahr en keweikumwailla? Oh ia ahn imwintihtio lingeringeren?
Me selidi kan pahn kasaledekla ansou mwadang, oh re sohte pahn mehla nan imweteng, oh re sohte pahn men mwengehda.
Ahpw ngehi me Kauno amwail Koht, me kupwurehda iloak kan en pwungupwungidek; mwarei iei Kauno, Wasa Lapalap.

Oh ngehi me kin kihong kaweid nan awamwail akan, oh perehkin kumwail mwetehn ni limei kat, pwe I en kak sohngedi pahn lahng oh koasoanehdi poahson kan en sampah, oh mahsanihong Saion: Kilang, kumwail iei nei aramas.
Serusalem pirida, pwourda, oh kesihnenda, ke nimalahr kep en lokolok me Kauno ketikihonguhkehr nan sapwellime engieng—ke nimalahr mwoahrok en nan kepo oh wasaskiseli.
Oh nanpwungen nah pwutak kan me e naitikihdier, sohte me kak kahluwa; nanpwungen nah pwutak kan me e apwaliada sohte me kak kolada peh.
Noumw pwutak riemen pwukat me samwodohr rehmw, ihs me pahn poakeiukala —ke ohla oh kamwomwalahr, oh lehk oh mahwin lelohnguhk—oh ihs me I pahn kansenamwahuiekin uhk?

Noumw pwutak kan lipwongmasalahr, ihte meh riemenet me saik; irail kin wonohn ni ewen ahl akan koaros; duwehte kouwol lawalo men eh lohdi nan uhk ehu, re kehnehr engieng en Kauno, oh omw Koht ketin angiangihrailda.
Eri kumwail rong met, kumwail wie lokolok, oh sakaulahr, ahpw kaidehn wain me kahrehda.

Kauno ketin mahsanih, Kauno oh amwail Koht pahn ketin kasalehda pwung en sapawellime aramas akan; kilang, I ketikihsangehr nan pehmwail kan kep en lokoloko, mwoarok en nan kep en ahi engieng; kumwail solahr pahn pwurehng nim.
Ahpw I pahn kiheng nan pehn irail kan me kahpwalihiukalahr; me kin ndahiong uhk: Dairukedi, pwe se en kak sok pohmw—oh ke kin wendieng nanial oh re kin sok pohmw likamwete kowe pwehl.
Saion, pirida, pwourda oh kehlailada; pwuhrieng nan ahmw likou kaselel kan, kowe Serusalem, kahnimw sarawi: pwe sang met kohla me samin kan solahr pahn pidolong nan omw kahnimw.
Serusalem, sipedasang rehmw pwelipar akan; kesihnenda, mwohndieng nan dewemwen; sapwadasang sahl me pire tepinweremwen, kowe serepein lidu en Saion.

chapters.name: Iralaud 9
summary: Seikop kawewehda me mehn Suhs akan pahn pwurpene nan sapwerail sahpw en inou kan—Tomwo pwaindahr aramas sang ni Pwupwidio—Paliwar en me melahr akan pahn iasadahsang nan sousou, oh ngenerail akan sang nan ehl oh sang paradais—Irail pahn pakadeikda—Tomwo doarehla sang mehla, ehl, tepelo, oh lokolok soutuk—Me pwung kan pahn komourla nan wehin Koht—Kalokolok en me dipan akan koasoandier—Me Keieu Sarawi en Israel me wia silepen ewen kehlo. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met, riei ohl akan, I wadekadahr soahng pwukat pwe kumwail en kak ese duwen inou kan me Kauno ketin inoukihongehr peneinei en Israel kan koaros—

Me e ketin mahseniongehr mehn Suhs akan, sang rehn sapwellime soukohp sarawi kan, sangete nin tapio, sang ehu dih lel ehu dih, lao lel ansouo me irail pahn kapwuredohng nan mwomwohdiso mehlel oh sapwellimen Koht kehl; ansou me irail pahn kapwurupwurodohng nan uhdakarail kan, oh soandieng nan sapwerail sahpw en inou kan.
Kilang, riei pwutak kesempwal akan, I ndahieng kumwail soahng pwukat pwe kumwail en perenda, oh sarada kohkohlahte, pwehki kapai kan me Kauno Koht pahn ketikihong noumwail seri kan.
Pwe I ese me tohto rehmwail raparapahkiher en ese soahng pwukat; eri I ese me kumwail ese me paliwaratail kan uhdahn pahn mehla oh sohrala; ahpw, nan paliwaratail kan kitail pahn kilahng Koht.

Ei, I ese me kumwail ese me e pahn ketin pwarohng irail ni paliwar nan Serusalem, wasa me kitail kohsang ie; pwe e konehng en uhdahn ketido rehrail; pwe e koasoandi me Soun Kepikipik lapalapo pahn ketin mweidala pein kahlapeo pahn manaman en aramas, oh pwoukihla aramas koaros, pwe aramas koaros en mihla pahn sapwellime manaman.

Pwehki aramas koaros uhdahn pahn mehla, pwe en kapwaiada sapwellimen Soun Kepikipik lapalapo koasoandi kalahngano, e konehng en mie manaman en iasada, oh iasadao konehng en wiawihong aramas pwehki pwupwidio; oh sapwung me kahrehda pwupwidio; oh pwehki aramas ar pwupwulahr irail kalipilipasangehr mwohn sihlangin Kauno.

Eri, e konehng en wia tomw me poatopoat—ma e sohte pahn wia tomw me poatopoat, soahng me kin mwerepeseng sohte kak kieweklahng ni soahng me sohte kak mwerepeseng. Eri, keieun kopwung me wiawihong aramas pahn duweduwehte kohkohlahte. Oh ma ih met me wiawi, paliwar pahn wonohn oh matala oh mweredieng pohn sampah, oh sohla kak pwourda.

Eri [ia uwen kaselel en] sapwellimen Koht erepit, sapwellime kalahngan oh mahk! Pwe kilang, ma paliwar pahn sohla kak pwourda, palingnitail kan pahn duwehla tohnleng me pwupwidihsang mwohn sihlangin Koht Soutuk, oh wiahla tepelo, oh sohla kak pwourda.

Oh ngenitail kan uhdahn anahne duwehla ih, oh kitail wiahla tepel kei, tohnleng en tepel, ritidihsang mwohn sihlangin atail Koht, oh mihla pahn pahpahn likamw akan, nan nsensuwed, duwehte pein ih; ei, ong ih me pitiedi tepin atail nohno oh pahpa, me kin kawekala pein ih en duwehte tohnleng en marain, oh kamwakidada aramas akan en wia doadoahk en mwersuwed rir kan en kamaramas oh soangoasoangen doadoahk rotorot rir koaros.

Eri ia uwen kaselel en kalahngan en atail Koht, me ketin kaunopadadahr ahl pwe kitail en pitisang nan pehn eni kamasepwehk menet; iei, enio, mehla oh ehl, me I kin kahdaniki mehlahn paliwar, oh pil mehlahn palingehn.
Oh pwehki duwen sapwellimen atail Koht ahl en komourlao, Me Sarawi en Israel, mehlahn paliwar wet, me I koasoaiao, pahn kapwurehda mehlahu; me iei mehlahn nan sousou.

Oh mehla me I koasoaiao, me iei mehlahn palingehn, pahn kapwurehda mehlahu; me iei mehlahn nan ehl; eri, mehla oh ehl pahn kapwurehda ara mehla ko, oh ehl pahn kapwurehda ngehn me e kalewehdi ko, oh sousouo pahn kapwurehda paliwar akan me e kalewehdi, oh paliwar oh ngehn en aramas akan pahn pwurehng pwurpene; oh met pahn wiawi sang ni manaman en iasadahn Me Sarawi en Israelo.

Ia uwen kaselel en sapwellimen atail Koht koasoandio! Pwe pil ehu kahrepe, paradais en Koht pahn kapwurehda ngehn en me pwung kan, oh sousou pahn kapwurehda paliwar en me pwung; oh ngehno oh paliwaro pahn pwurehng pwurpene, oh aramas koaros pahn sohla kak mwerpeseng, oh solahr kak mehla kohkohlahte, oh irail wialahr aramas mour kei, ahneki marain unsek duwehte atail ese ni paliwar, ihte atail marain [nan mour poatoapoat] pahn unsek.

Eri, kitail pahn wehwehki ni unsek atail sapwung kan, oh atail samin kan, oh atail kilisou; oh me pwung kan pahn wehwehki unsek arail peren kan, oh arail wiewia pwung kan, oh kapwatkihda likou mwakelekel, iei, likou en wiewia pwung.

Kedekedeo ni ansou me aramas koaros pahn powehdi keieu en mehla wet oh mourda, pwehki ar sohlahr kak mehla, irail uhdahn pahn uh mwohn mwoalen kopwung en Me Sarawi en Israelo; oh kopwungo ahpw pahn wiawi, oh irail udahn pahn pakadeikda nin duwen sapwellimen Koht kadeik sarawi.

Oh ni mehlel, nin duwen Kauno eh ketin ieias, Kauno Koht ketin mahsanih, oh iei sapwellime mahsen poatoapoat, me sohte kak sohrala, me iei irail akan me pwung pahn dadaurete ar pwung, oh irail akan me samin pahn samisaminte; eri, me samin kan iei tepelo oh nah tohnleng kan; oh irail pahn kohla nan kisiniei poatoapoat, me kaunopadahng irailehr; oh arail lokolok duwehte lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me mpwulen kisinieio kin lullul poatoapoat oh sohte kak uhdi.
Ia uwen kaselel oh pwuhng pahrek en atail Koht! Pwe e kin ketin kalelehla sapwellime mahsen kan koaros, oh mahsen ko kin pwilido sang nan douwaseo, oh sapwellime kosonned uhdahn pahn pweida.

Ahpw, kilang, me pwung kan, iei souleng en Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail akan me kin kamehlele Me Sarawi en Israelo, irail akan me kin kanengamahieng lohpwu kan en sampah, oh mehndahkihla kanamenekpe, irail me pahn sohsohki wehin Koht, me kaunopadahng irailehr sangete ni tepdahn poahsoan en sampah, oh irail pahn pereperen kohkohlahte.

Ia uwen kaselel en kalahngan en atail Koht, me Sarawi en Israelo! Pwe e ketin doarehsangehr sapwellime souleng kan eni kamasepwehko me iei tepelo, oh mehla, oh ehl, oh lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me iei lokolok sohte imwi.
Ia uwen kaselel en sarawi en atail Koht! Pwe e ketin mwahngih soahng koaros, oh sohte mehkot me e sohte mwahngih.

Oh e ketidihdo sampah pwe en kak ketin kamaurala aramas koaros ma irail pahn rong mwahu kepitie; pwe kilang, e ketin lokolongkiher ahn aramas koaruhsie medek, mehlel, medek en aramas koaros me ipwidi, ohl akan, lih akan, oh seri kan, me wia kisehn peneinei en Adam.
Oh e ketin lokolongkiher met pwe iasada en kak wiawihong aramas koaruhsie, pwe koaros en kak kesihnenda mwowe ni rahn en kadeik lapalapo.
Oh e ketin mahsanihongehr aramas koaros me re anahne koluhla, oh pepdaisla ni mware, ahneki pwoson unsek ni Me Sarawi en Israelo, ma soh re sohte kak komourla nan wehin Koht.
Oh ma re sohte pahn koluhla oh kamehlele mwareo, oh pepdaisla ni mwareo, oh dadaur lel imwi, re pahn kalipilipla; pwe Kauno Koht, Me Sarawi en Israelo, me ketin mahsaniher.

Eri, e ketikidahr kosonned ehu; oh ma sohte kosonned e sohte pahn mie kalokolok; oh ma sohte kalokolok e sohte pahn mie kadeikpen kalokolok; oh ma sohte kadeikpen kalokolok, kalahngan en Me Sarawi en Israelo me pahn apwalih irail, pwehki tomwo; pwehki sapwellime manaman me ketin doareiraillahr.

Pwe tomwo kaitaralahr pwung en sapwellime pwuhng pahrek rehn irail akan me sohte iang alehdi kosonnedo, irail pitisangehr eni kamasepwehko, mehla oh ehl, oh tepelo, oh lehn kisiniei oh suwepel, me iei lokolok poatopoat; oh irail kopwurupwurlahng rehn Koht me ketikihong irail esingek, iei Me Sarawi en Israelo.
Ahpw meid suwed ong ih me alehdi kosonnedo, ei, me alehdi kosonned en Koht kan koaros, duwehte kitail, oh kawehla, oh kawehla mwahl ah rahn en kaunopada, pwe meid apwal ong aramaso!

Ia uwen widing en koasoandi en me suwedo! Ia uwen noahrok, oh luwet, oh pweipwei en aramas! Ansou me re kin esehla re kin lemehieng me re loalekeng, oh re kin sohla rong mwahu kaweid en Koht, pwe re kin pohnsehsehla, oh medemedewe me re esehier soang koaros, eri, arail loalekengo kin likamwala oh e sohte pahn sewese irail. Oh irail pahn lekidekla.
Ahpw loalekengla mwahu ma re pahn rong kaweid en Koht.

Ahpw meid suwed ong me kepwehpwe kan, me kepwehpwehki soahng kan en sampah. Pwehki arail kepwehpwe irail kailongkihla me semwehmwe kan, oh irail kaloke me opampap kan, oh irail poakehng arail dipwisou kan; eri, re kin wiahki ar koht ar dipwisou kan. Oh kilang, arail dipwsou kan pahn pil iang irail lekidekla.
Oh meid suwed ong me salengepon kan me sohte pahn rong; pwe irail pahn lekidekla.
Meid suwed ong me masukun kan me sohte pahn kilang; pwe irail pil pahn lekidekla.
Meid suwed ong me sohte sirkumsaisla ni mohngiongarail, pwe wehwehki pein diparail kan pahn kalokeirail ni imwilahn rahn.
Meid suwed ong aramas likamw men, pwe e pahn lekidekidihla nan ehl.
Meid suwed ong soun kamaramas emen me kin kemehla aramas ni pein nsene, pwe e pahn mehla.
Meid suwed ong irail me kin kamwahl, pwe irail pahn lekidekidihla nan ehl.
Ei, meid suwed ong irail akan me kin pwongih dikadik en eni kan, pwe tepel en tepel koaros kin perenikinirail.
Oh, ni oaralap, meid suwed ong irail kan me kin mehla nan diparail kan; pwe irail pahn pwurala rehn Koht, oh udiahl silangi, oh mihmihte nan diparail kan.

Eri, riei ohl oko, tamataman uwen kamasepwehk en wiahda sapwung ong Koht Sarawio, oh pil uwen kamasepwehk en lohdieng pahn kasongosong en me keieu widingo. Tamataman, [imwilahn nsenohki] momour en sampah iei mehla, oh [imwilahn nsenohki] momour en palingehn iei mour soutuk.

Eri, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kumwail rong ahi kaweid kan. Tamataman kalahngan lapalap en Me Sarawi en Israelo. Dehr nda me I koasoai apwal ong kumwail; pwe ma kumwail pahn wia met, kumwail pahn uhwongada me mehlelo; pwe I koasoaiahieng kumwailehr mahsen akan en amwail Sounkapikadao. I ese me mahsen mehlel kan kin apwal ong soangen samin koaros; ahpw aramas pwung kan sohte kin masak, pwe re poakohng me mehlelo oh re sohte kin rerada.

Eri, riei ohl kesempwal akan, kohdo rehn Kauno, Me Sarawio. Tamataman me sapwellime ahl akan me pwung. Kilang, ahl me aramas pahn keidieo me tehtikitik, ahpw inen kohwei mwowe, oh me wia silepen ewen kehlo iei Me Sarawi en Israelo; oh e sohte kin ketin kadoadoahkih ladu wasao; oh sohte ehu ahl tohrohr likin ewen kehlo; pwe sohte me kak pitiedi, pwe mware iei Kauno Koht.

Oh mehmen me pahn letelet, e pahn ketin ritingadahng; ah me erepit, oh me loalokonglahr, oh irail akan me kepwehpwe, me pohnmwahsohki arail loalokong, arail erepit, oh arail kepwehpwe—iei, e kin ketin kalahdikinirail; oh ma irail sohte pahn kesehla soahng pwukat, oh wiahkinirail aramas pweipwei kei mwohn Koht, oh ma re sohte pahn karakarahkala mehlel, e sohte pahn ketin ritingadahng irail.
Ahpw soahng kan me pid me erepit oh loalekeng pahn ekiekla sang irail kohkohlate—iei, pereno me kaunopdahngehr souleng kan.

Eri, riei ohl kesempwal kan, tamataman ahi kaweid. Kilang, I pahn kapwuhrasang ahi likou, oh siped mwohmwail; I kapakapkihong Koht me ketin wia komourpei, me ketin kasawih ie ni eh kin mahsanih ie; eri, kumwail pahn ese ni imwilahn rahno, ni ansou me aramas koaruhsie pahn pakadeingki arail wiewia kan, pwe Koht en Israel en ketin kadehde me I sipedasangehr dipamwail kan sang ahi mour, oh I ahpw kesihnenda mwowe ni mwakelekel, oh I sohte pahn pwukoahki ntahmwail.
Eri, riei ohl kesemwpwal akan, [kumwail] sohpeisang dipamwail akan; kamweidpeseng nein [tepel] selmete me pahn mwadang salihkumwaildi; kohdo rehn Koht me iei paipalap en komourpamwail.

Kaunopada amwail mour kan ong rahn lingano ni ansou me pwuhng pahrek pahn wiawihong irail me pwung kan, me iei rahn en kadeiko, pwe kumwail en dehr roikikipene amwail masakapwehkda mehlel; pwe kumwail en dehr tamataman dipamwail kan, oh itoitieng en wehkada [oh koasoia]: [Komwi me] sarawi, sapwellimomwi kadeik me sarawi, Maing Kaun Koht Wasa Lapalap—ahpw I ese ahi sapwung kan; I kasapwungelahr sapwellimomwi kosonned, oh I en pein pwukoahki ahi sapwung kan; oh tepelo kaleweiedier, pwe I lohdiengehr pahn ah kalokolok mwuledek.

Ahpw kilang, riei ohl oko, e kesempwal I en kasalehiong kumwail duwen soahng kamasepwehk kan me uhdahn pahn wiawi? Ia duwe I anahne kamwakid kumwailda ma amwail madamadau kan mwakelekel? Ia duwe I anahne lokaia sansal ong kumwail ni duwen padahk mehlel kan ma sohte dipamwail?

Kilang, ma kumwail aramas sarawi kei I pahn koasoaiahieng kumwail duwen sarawi; ahpw pwehki amwail sohte sarawi, oh kumwail kin wiahkinie amwail sounpadahk men, e konehng I en padahkihong kumwail duwen pwukoahkihdi dihp.
Kilang, ahi mour kin sautiki dihp, oh mohngiongi kin pereniki soahng pwung kan; oh I pahn kepinga mwar sarawi en ei Koht.

Kohdo, riei ohl oko, kumwail koaros me men nimpil, kumwail kohdo ni wasahn nimpihlo; oh kumwail me sohte noumwail mwohni, kohdo pwain oh mwenge; mehlel, kohdo pwain wain oh melik me sohte anahne mwohni oh sohte pweipwei.

Eri, kumwail dehr netiki mwahl noumwail mwohni kan ong me sohte katepe, de koadoahke mehkot me sohte pahn kaitarahla amwail anahn. Nantihong rong ie mwahu, oh tamataman mahsen kan me I koasoaiahier; oh kohdo rehn Me Sarawi en Israelo, oh kamadipwki soahng me sohte kak mehla, de pil [sohte] kak ohla, oh mweidehng amwail mour en nsenamwahukihla amwail mworouroula.

Kilang, riei ohl kesempwal akan, tamataman mahsen akan en amwail Koht; [kumwail] kapakap ong ih ansou koaros nirahn, oh kaping kalahngankihong mware sarawio nihpwong. Mweidehng amwail mohngiong kan en pereperen.

Oh kilang uwen kaselel en sapwellimen Kauno inou kan, oh uwen kaselel en eh ketikihdi pein ih rehn aramas akan; oh pwehki sapwellime manaman, oh sapwellime kalahngan oh mahk, e ketin inoukihong kitail me kadaudoketail kan sohte uhdahn pahn kamakamala, nin duwen paliwar, ahpw e pahn doareirailla; oh irail pahn wiahla ehu rah me pwung en peneinei en Israel nan dih en mwuhr akan.
Oh met, riei ohl oko, I men padahkihong kumwail laudsang mepwukat; ahpw lakapw me I pahn kanekehla luhwen ahi kaweid ong kumwail. Ahmen.

chapters.name: Iralaud 10
summary: Seikop kawehwehda me mehn Suhs akan pahn kalohpwuala arail Koht—Irail pahn kamweremwerpeseng lao irail tepda kamehlele Ih—Amerika pahn wia sahpw en saledek wasa me sohte nahnmwarki pahn kaunda—Kumwail en ehuong Koht oh komourla sang ni sapwellime Kalahngan. Ele Sounpar 559–545 Mwohn Krais.
verses: Oh met ngehi, Seikop, pwurehng koasoaieng kumwail, riei ohl kesempwal oko, duwen rah pwung wet me I koasoaiadahr.

Pwe kilang, inou kan me kitail alehdier iei inou kei ong kitail nan mour wet; eri, nin duwen dahme I kilangehr me kidelepen neitail seri pahn mehla pwehki arail sohpwoson, ahpw, Koht pahn ketin kupwurehla me ngeder; oh neitail seri kan pahn kopwurupwurodo, pwe irail en kak alehdi dahme pahn kamarainiekin irail duwen mehlel en arail Soundoaro.

Eri, ni duwen ei koasoaiahieng kumwail, e kesempwal me Krais—pwe tohnlengo padahkihong ie pwohng me met iei pahn mware —[e] pahn ketido rehn mehn Suhs akan, rehn irail akan me inenen suwed nan sampah; oh irail pahn kalohpwuala ih—pwe iei me konehng atail Koht [pahn kalohpwuala], oh sohte ehu wehi nan sampah me pahn kak kalohpwuala arail Koht.
Pwe ma manaman kapwuriamwei kan pahn wiawihong wehi teikan re pahn koluhla, oh ese me ih iei arail Koht.
Ahpw pwehki samworou widing kan oh wiewia suwed kan, irail akan nan Serusalem pahn uhwong ih, pwe en kalohpwuhla.

Eri, pwehki arail wiewia suwed akan, kamwomwomwala kan, lehk kan, soumwahu lusulus kan, oh mahwin pahn wiawihong irail; oh irail akan me sohte pahn kamakamala pahn kamweremwerpeseng nan wehi kan koaros.

Ahpw kilang, Kauno Koht mahsanih: Ni ansou me rahno pahn leledo me irail pahn kamehlele ie, me ngehi iei Krais, eri inou me I wiahiongehr arail pahpa kahlap oko pahn pweida nan mour wet, pohn sampah, pwe irail en [alehdi] sapwerail sahpw en sohso.

Kedekedeo irail ahpw pahn kopwurupwurpene sang nan [wehi kan] me irail soulahngehr ie, sang pohn dekehn nan sehd akan, oh sang ni keimw pahieu en sampah; oh Kauno mahsanih me wehin Mehn Liki kan pahn linganla mwohn silangi ni arail pahn kapwureirailahng nan sapwerail sahpw en sohso.

Mehlel, nahnmwarki en Mehn Liki kan pahn kin apwalih irail duwehte pahpa men, oh arail lih nahnmwarki kan pahn apwalih irail duwehte nohno men; eri, inoun Kauno kan ong Mehn Liki kan inenen kesempwal, pwe ih me ketin mahsanih, oh ihs me kak uhwong?
Ahpw kilang, Koht mahsanih, sahpwet pahn wia ehu sapwemwail sahpw en sohso, oh Mehn Liki kan uhdahn pahn ale kupwuramwahu pohn sahpwet.
Oh sahpwet pahn wia sahpw en saledek ong Mehn Liki kan, oh sohte nahnmwarki men pohn sahpwet, me pahn kaunda Mehn Liki kan.
Oh I pahn kakehlahda sahpwet pwehn doarehsang wehi teikan.
Oh Koht mahsanih, mehmen me pahn mahwinieng Saion pahn kamwomwomwla.

Pwe mehmen me pahn kasapwilada emen nahnmwarki pwehn pelian ie pahn kamala, pwe ngehi, Kauno, nahnmwarki en nanleng, me pahn wia arail nahnmwarki, oh I pahn wia kamarainpen irail akan me kin rong ahi mahsen kan kohkohlahte.

Eri, iei kahrepe wet, me pahn kaunsakala ahi inou kan me I inoukihongehr aramas akan, me I pahn wiahiong irail nan mour wet. I pahn kawehla doahk en rotorot rir kan, oh kamaramas, oh wiewia suwed kan.

Eri, irail me pahn mahwinieng Saion, koaros mehn Suhs oh Mehn Liki, koaros me sensel oh me kalidu, koaros ohl oh lih, pahn kamwomwomwala; pwe iei irail me rasohng lih en netin paliwar en sampah pwon; pwe atail Koht ketin mahsanih me irail me sohte kin uhpalihkinie kin pelian ie.
Pwe I pahn kaunsakala ahi inou kan me I inoukihohngehr aramas akan, me I pahn kapwaiong irail nan mour wet—

Eri, riei ohl kesempwal oko, atail Koht ketin mahsanih: I pahn kaloke kadaudokemwail akan sang ni ei pahn doadoahngki Mehn Liki kan; ahpw, I pahn kamwuterekehla ahn Mehn Liki mohngiong kan, pwe irail en kak duwehla pahpa men ong irail; eri, Mehn Liki kan pahn ale kupwur mwahu oh iang wadawadieng nan peneinei en Israel.

Eri, I pahn kasarawiala sahpwet ong kadaudokemwail kan, oh ong irail me pahn iang patehng wadawadieng kadaudokemwail kan nan sahpw en arail sohso kohkohlahte; pwe Koht mahsanihong ie me sahpwet iei sahpw me keniken sang sahpw koaruhsie, eri Koht mahsanih, I men aramas koaros me pahn kousoanla [nan sahpwo] en pwongih ie.

Oh met, riei ohl kesempwal oko, [kumwail] esehier me atail Koht kalahngano ketikihongkitailehr kamarain en soahng kopwuriamwei pwukat, kitail tamataman ih, oh pwilikihdi dipatail kan, oh dehr nsensuwed, pwe kitail sohte lekidekla; mendahte, atail pokous sang nan sapwetail sahpw en inouo; ahpw kitail kahluhlahngehr sahpw mwahu, pwe Kauno ketin kaunopadahr eletail nansed, oh kitail mihmiher pohn dehkehn nansed.

Ahpw mehd kapwuriamwei sapwellimen Kauno inou kan ong irail akan me mihmi pohn deke kan; eri pwehki eh mahsanih deke kan, uhdahn mie [deke] me tohtohsang met, oh riatail teikan pil wie koukousoan wasa ko.
Pwe kilang, Kauno Koht kin ketin kahluwahsang mehn Israel kan ekei ansou, nin duwen kupwure. Oh met kilang, Kauno ketin tamataman irail koaruhsie me tipwsangehr, eri e pil ketin tamataman kitail.
Eri, mohngiongimwail kan en perenda, oh tamataman me kumwail ahneki saledek en pein pilada nsenemwail—en pilada ahl en mehla poatopoat de ahl en mour soutuk.

Eri, riei ohl kesempwal oko, kumwail ehuong kupwur en Koht, a kaidehn ong nsenen tepelo oh paliwar; oh tamataman, mwurin amwail ehuongehr Koht, [kumwail en ese] me ihte sang ni kalahngan en Koht me kumwail kak komourla.

Eri, sang ni manaman en iasadao, Koht en ketin kaiasada kumwail sang mehla, oh sang ni manaman en tomwo, en pil ketin komourkumwailla sang mehla poatopoat, pwe kumwail en kak pidelong nan wehi soutuk en Koht, pwe kumwail en kak kapingkihong ih sapwellime kalahngan sarawi. Ahmen.

summary: Koasoaiepen mehlahn Lihai, rien Nihpai ohl oko uhongada ih. Kauno ketin kehkehlingkihong Nihpai en kohkohla nan sapwtehno. Ah seiseiloak nan sapwtehno, oh pil soahng teikan.
